Any effects that would affect the wielder of the wand instead affect the closest creature to the grenade when it goes off.

entries: The grenade explodes immediately if a creature places it in an extradimensional space or teleports while in possession of it. The effects of the explosion will be felt at both the origin and terminus of the teleportation, but only affecting all creatures within 30 feet of either location.

item.name: 夜視護目鏡
entries: 當穿戴這副暗色鏡片時，你具有60尺範圍的黑暗視覺。若你已經具有黑暗視覺，則穿戴這副護目鏡時將會使它的範圍增加60尺。

item.name: Goggles of Object Reading
entries: These leather-framed goggles feature purple crystal lenses. While wearing the goggles, you have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕}) checks made to reveal information about a creature or object you can see.
In addition, you can cast the {@spell 鑑定術} spell using the googles. Once you do so, you can't do so again until the next dawn.

item.name: 金幣(gp)
entries: 一般的貨幣會有數個不同的幣值單位在市面上流通，且其面額會根據鑄造它們所使用的金屬的相對價值來決定。三種最常見的貨幣是金幣(gp)、銀幣(sp)、和銅幣(cp)。
一枚金幣，可以讓一個角色購買一個腰包、50尺的優質繩索、或一頭山羊。一名純熟（但並不傑出）的工匠每天可以賺取一枚金幣。儘管金幣本身並不常被直接使用，但黃金仍然是衡量財富的標準單位。當商人們商談着的交易涉及價值千百金幣的貨物或服務，其交易本身通常不會涉及貨幣的交換。更確切的說，金幣只是衡量價值的標準，而實際交易中使用的則是金條、信用狀、或其他值錢的商品。
一枚金幣值十枚銀幣，銀幣是普通人之間最盛行的貨幣。一枚銀幣可以僱傭一名勞動者工作一整天、購買一扁瓶的燈油、或是在簡陋旅館的一夜休眠。
一枚銀幣值十枚銅幣，銅幣則常見於勞動者和乞丐之間。一枚銅幣能買一根蠟燭、一支火炬、或是一支粉筆。
除此之外，使用其他貴重金屬鑄造的罕見貨幣有時也會出現在寶藏中。珀金幣(ep)和鉑金幣(pp)源自於衰落帝國和失落的王國，且當它們被用於交易時也偶爾會引起猜忌與懷疑。一枚珀金幣價值五枚銀幣，而一枚鉑金幣則價值十枚金幣。
一枚標準貨幣的重量約爲三分之一盎司，所以五十枚貨幣重約一磅。

item.name: Gold basin with rubies (Legion of Dusk)
珀金絲裝飾的黃金鳥籠
item.ENG_name: Gold bird cage with electrum filigree

item.name: Gold chalice set with emeralds (Legion of Dusk)
鑲有四顆海藍寶石的黃金項鍊
item.ENG_name: Gold circlet set with four aquamarines

item.name: 鑲有紅色石榴石作爲眼睛的金龍梳
item.ENG_name: Gold dragon comb set with red garnets as eyes

item.name: 金龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿着這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對火焰傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30裏內最近的金龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 鉑金絲裝飾的黃金首飾盒
item.ENG_name: Gold jewelry box with platinum filigree

item.name: Gold jewelry box with platinum filigree (Brazen Coalition)
內部繪有彩繪肖像的黃金鍊墜盒
item.ENG_name: Gold locket with a painted portrait inside

item.name: Gold locket with a painted portrait inside (Legion of Dusk)
Gold pendant with black onyx (Legion of Dusk)
Gold ring with turquoise (Legion of Dusk)
Gold-plated ceremonial helmet and pauldrons (Legion of Dusk)
Golgari Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Golgari, allows you to cast {@spell 糾纏術}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Golgari's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Golgari Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Golgari guild
entries: Made from deep green jade with black veins, this keyrune has an insectile shape. It can transform into a {@creature giant scorpion} for up to 6 hours. The scorpion has an Intelligence of 4 and can communicate with you telepathically while it is within 60 feet of you, though its messages are largely limited to describing the passage of potential prey.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature giant scorpion}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 閃避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Gravenhollow Compass Ring
entries: This gold ring is fitted with a star ruby worth 1,000 gp. A {@spell 偵測魔法} spell reveals that the gem radiates a faint aura of divination magic. The gem's star-shaped core is a magical compass that guides the ring's wearer along the safest, shortest route to Gravenhollow.

item.name: Greater Silver Sword
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has psionic ability
entries: This magic weapon grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While you hold the sword, you have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws, you are immune to being charmed, and you have resistance to psychic damage. In addition, if you score a critical hit with it against a creature's astral body, you can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

item.name: Green Copper Ewer
entries: Any poisonous liquid poured into the ewer is instantly transformed into an equal amount of sweet wine. Furthermore, a creature that grasps the ewer's handle can command the ewer to fill with 1 gallon of wine, and it can't produce more wine until the next dawn.

item.name: Green Dragon Mask
entries: This mottled green mask is surmounted by a frilled crest and has leathery spiked plates along its jaw. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: You have resistance against poison damage. If you already have resistance to poison damage from another source, you instead have immunity to poison damage. If you already have immunity to poison damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to poison damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Charisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense 盲視} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Draconic. You also have advantage on any Charisma check you make against Green Dragons.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/Day) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries: You can breathe underwater.

item.name: 綠龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿着這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對毒素傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30裏內最近的綠龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: 榴彈發射器
entries: 以一個動作，一個角色可以將榴彈投擲到最多60尺遠的一點。若使用榴彈發射器，該角色可以將榴彈投射到最多120尺遠的位置。

item.name: Grimoire Infinitus
entries: Several of these spellbooks with gilded pages and silver-plated covers were created during the Age of Arcanum, but only one has been found since the Calamity ended. The book has an infinite number of pages, is three inches thick, eight inches wide, twelve inches long, and weighs three pounds.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: Most of the book is blank, but the following spells are recorded in the first pages of the tome: {@spell 警報術}, {@spell 反魔法結界}, {@spell 畢格比之掌}, {@spell 枯萎術}, {@spell 魅惑人類}, {@spell 困惑術}, {@spell 操控天氣}, {@spell 創造不死生物}, {@spell 偵測思想}, {@spell 變巨/縮小術}, {@spell 恐懼術}, {@spell 預視術}, {@spell 氣化形體}, {@spell 守衛銘文}, {@spell 通曉傳奇}, {@spell 李歐蒙小屋}, {@spell 羣體暗示術}, {@spell 假象術}, {@spell 迷蹤步}, {@spell 魔鄧肯忠犬}, {@spell 虹光噴射}, {@spell 衰弱射線}, {@spell 無聲幻影}, {@spell 傳送術}, and {@spell 雷鳴波}.

You can use the grimoire as your spellbook, and you can scribe new spells into it as normal. When you prepare wizard spells using the grimoire, the number of wizard spells you can prepare increases by 1.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Grimoire Infinitus reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: While you carry the spellbook, you have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
When you prepare wizard spells using the grimoire as your spellbook, the number of spells you can prepare increases by 1 again.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Grimoire Infinitus reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: You can now use your Arcane Recovery feature twice between long rests, rather than once.
When you prepare wizard spells using the grimoire as your spellbook, the number of spells you can prepare increases by 1 again.

item.name: Grovelthrash
entries: Crafted from a single piece of obsidian, this warhammer of Torog hums with magical energy and is carved with the images of faces screaming in pain.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Grovelthrash is a sentient neutral evil weapon with an Intelligence of 18, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 19. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Infernal.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A covetous {@creature ultroloth} named Ciria lives within Grovelthrash. The weapon values material possessions and doling out pain. It compliments its wielder whenever they claim treasure and takes pleasure in harming others.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The warhammer grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal and Infernal.

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with an attack using this warhammer, you can deal an extra {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage to the target. If you do, you take {@damage 1d6} psychic damage. The warhammer deals double damage to objects and structures.
While holding this weapon, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) checks made to discern a lie spoken in a language you understand.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the warhammer reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
You gain a burrowing speed equal to your walking speed. You can use your burrowing speed to move through sand, loose earth, mud, or ice, not solid rock.

When a creature you can see within 30 feet of you hits you with an attack while you are wielding the warhammer, you can use your reaction to deal an amount of psychic damage to that creature equal to the damage you took from the attack. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the warhammer reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.

When you have fewer hit points than half your hit point maximum, the warhammer deals an extra {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage on a hit. You can burrow through solid rock at half your burrowing speed and leave a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in your wake.

As an action, you can use the warhammer to cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 17): {@spell 地震術}, {@spell 融身入石}, or {@spell 塑石術}. Once a spell has been cast using the warhammer, that spell can't be cast from the warhammer again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Gruul Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Gruul, allows you to cast {@spell 強迫決鬥}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Gruul's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Gruul Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Gruul guild
entries: This crude keyrune is cobbled together from bits of rubble, broken glass, bone, and animal hair. One end resembles a horned beast. On command, the keyrune transforms into a ceratok, a horned creature much like a {@creature rhinoceros} (and with the same statistics). It remains in its ceratok form for 1 hour.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a ceratok. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 閃避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 守護者紋章
entries: 這枚紋章是一位神祇或一種超自然傳承的徽章。作爲一個動作，你可以將徽章附上一套護甲或一面盾牌或移下。
徽章具有3發充能。當你穿戴着附有徽章的護甲或裝備着附有徽章的盾牌，且你或一個距離你30尺內且你可見的生物受到一次重擊時，你可以用一個反應並消耗1發充能將重擊命中改爲普通命中。
徽章在每天黎明時恢復所有已消耗的充能。

item.name: Gulthias Staff
entries: Made from the branch of a Gulthias tree (see the {@creature twig blight||blights} entry of the Monster Manual), a Gulthias staff is a spongy, black length of wood. Its evil makes beasts visibly uncomfortable while within 30 feet of it. The staff has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} of its expended charges daily at dusk.
If the staff is broken or burned to ashes, its wood releases a terrible, inhuman scream that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. All blights that can hear the scream immediately wither and die.

entries.name: Vampiric Strike
entries: The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. On a hit, it deals damage as a normal quarterstaff, and you can expend 1 charge to regain a number of hit points equal to the damage dealt by the weapon. Each time a charge is spent, red blood oozes from the staff's pores, and you must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be afflicted with short term madness (see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

entries.name: Blight Bane
entries: While you are attuned to the staff, blights and other evil plant creatures don't regard you as hostile unless you harm them.

item.name: 角瓶火藥
entries: 火藥主要用於將子彈推出手槍或步槍的槍管，或用以製造炸彈。火藥通常裝在小型木桶或防水的角瓶中出售。
點火引燃裝滿火藥的容器將會使之爆炸，對距離它10尺內的生物造成火焰傷害(角瓶火藥{@damage 3d6})。藉由成功通過一次DC 12的敏捷豁免可以將這個傷害減半。點燃一盎司的火藥會使它劇烈燃燒持續1輪，散發出30尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。

item.name: 小桶火藥
entries: 火藥主要用於將子彈推出手槍或步槍的槍管，或用以製造炸彈。火藥通常裝在小型木桶或防水的角瓶中出售。
點火引燃裝滿火藥的容器將會使之爆炸，對距離它10尺內的生物造成火焰傷害(小桶火藥{@dice 7d6})。藉由成功通過一次DC 12的敏捷豁免可以將這個傷害減半。點燃一盎司的火藥會使它劇烈燃燒持續1輪，散發出30尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。

item.name: 古爾特的巨斧
entries: 在冰斧之年(123 DR)，冰霜巨人領主 古爾特 在一場戰爭中敗給了 烏斯伽 加多夫松——後來成爲烏斯伽特野蠻人的領袖——這場戰爭標誌着人類戰勝德薩林谷地的巨人統治。 古爾特的巨斧被埋在莫古之冢裏，直到被挖出並帶回深水城。 在這座城市的地下墓穴中躺了幾十年後， 冰霜巨人冒險家 哈什納格 得到了這把斧頭，以表彰他對深水城的貢獻。 烏斯伽特野蠻人一眼就能認出這種武器並攻擊任何使用它的巨人。
使用此魔法武器造成的攻擊和傷害骰將獲得 +1 加值。 它是給巨人體型使用的，重 325 磅，命中時造成 {@dice 3d12} 揮砍傷害，如果目標是人類，則額外造成 {@dice 2d12} 揮砍傷害。
當週圍的溫度降到 0 華氏度以下時，斧頭就會像火炬一樣發光。 在這種情況下不能關閉光源。
以一個動作，你可以施放一個製造冷凍傷害而不是火焰傷害的 {@spell 灼熱金屬} (DC 13 豁免)。一旦這個能力被使用，它就不能再使用，直到第二天黎明。

item.name: Hacking Tools
entries: This kit contains the hardware and software necessary to allow access into most computer systems and electronic devices. Proficiency with hacking tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any Intelligence checks you make to connect to or make use of a computer system or electronic device. The kit fits snugly in a backpack or toolbox.

item.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} psychic damage and is {@condition 目盲} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition 目盲}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

item.name: 雷神之錘
entries: 你在使用這把魔法武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值。

entries.name: 巨人剋星(需同調)
entries: 你必須穿戴一條{@item 巨人力量腰帶}(任意一種)和{@item 食人魔力量護手}才能與這把武器同調。這個同調會在你卸下其中任何一件裝備時終止。當你與這把武器同調並持握它時，你的力量值增加4點且可以超過20，但不能超過30。當你在使用這把武器對一個巨人所進行的攻擊檢定中骰出了20時，該巨人必須成功通過一次DC 17的體質豁免，否則它將死亡。

這把錘子同時含有5發充能。當與它同調時，你可以消耗1發充能並將這把錘子投出，以它進行一次遠程武器攻擊，如同它具有20尺正常射程和60尺長射程的投擲屬性一樣。若該攻擊命中，這把錘子將釋放出可以在最遠300尺的距離外被聽見的雷鳴聲。目標和所有距離它30尺內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 17的體質豁免，否則被{@condition 震懾}直到你的下個回合結束。這把錘子會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d4+1}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Hand Drum
entries: A double-headed skin drum fitted with handles along its side.

item.name: Hand of Vecna
entries: Seldom is the name of Vecna spoken except in a hushed voice. Vecna was, in his time, one of the mightiest of all wizards. Through dark magic and conquest, he forged a terrible empire. For all his power, Vecna couldn't escape his own mortality. He began to fear death and take steps to prevent his end from ever coming about.

{@creature Orcus|MTF}, the demon prince of undeath, taught Vecna a ritual that would allow him to live on as a {@creature lich}. Beyond death, he became the greatest of all liches. Even though his body gradually withered and decayed, Vecna continued to expand his evil dominion. So formidable and hideous was his temper that his subjects feared to speak his name. He was the Whispered One, the Master of the Spider Throne, the Undying King, and the Lord of the Rotted Tower.

Some say that Vecna's lieutenant Kas coveted the Spider Throne for himself, or that the sword his lord made for him seduced him into rebellion. Whatever the reason, Kas brought the Undying King's rule to an end in a terrible battle that left Vecna's tower a heap of ash. Of Vecna, all that remained were one hand and one eye, grisly artifacts that still seek to work the Whispered One's will in the world.

The {@item Eye of Vecna} and the Hand of Vecna might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. The hand is a mummified and shriveled left extremity.

To attune to the eye, you must gouge out your own eye and press the artifact into the empty socket. The eye grafts itself to your head and remains there until you die. Once in place, the eye transforms into a golden eye with a slit for a pupil, much like that of a cat. If the eye is ever removed, you die.

To attune to the hand, you must lop off your left hand at the wrist and the press the artifact against the stump. The hand grafts itself to your arm and becomes a functioning appendage. If the hand is ever removed, you die.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The {@item Eye of Vecna} and the Hand of Vecna each have the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Properties of the Hand
entries: Your alignment changes to neutral evil, and you gain the following benefits:

items: Your Strength score becomes 20, unless it is already 20 or higher.
Any melee spell attack you make with the hand, and any melee weapon attack made with a weapon held by it, deals an extra {@dice 2d8} cold damage on a hit.

The hand has 8 charges. You can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 死亡一指} (5 charges), {@spell 睡眠術} (1 charge), {@spell 緩速術} (2 charges), or {@spell 傳送術} (3 charges). The hand regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. Each time you cast a spell from the hand, it casts the {@spell 暗示術} spell on you (save DC 18), demanding that you commit an evil act. The hand might have a specific act in mind or leave it up to you.

entries.name: Properties of the Eye and Hand
entries: If you are attuned to both the hand and eye, you gain the following additional benefits:

items: You are immune to disease and poison.
Using the eye's X-ray vision never causes you to suffer {@condition 力竭}.
You experience premonitions of danger and, unless you are {@condition 無力}, can't be surprised.
If you start your turn with at least 1 hit point, you regain {@dice 1d10} hit points.

If a creature has a skeleton, you can attempt to turn its bones to jelly with a touch of the Hand of Vecna. You can do so by using an action to make a melee attack against a creature you can reach, using your choice of your melee attack bonus for weapons or spells. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.
You can use an action to cast {@spell 祈願術}. This property can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

entries.name: Destroying the Eye and Hand
entries: If the {@item Eye of Vecna} and the Hand of Vecna are both attached to the same creature, and that creature is slain by the {@item Sword of Kas}, both the eye and the hand burst into flame, turn to ash, and are destroyed forever. Any other attempt to destroy the eye or hand seems to work, but the artifact reappears in one of Vecna's many hidden vaults, where it waits to be rediscovered.

item.name: Harbor Moon
entries: Platinum crescent inset with electrum, about three inches long with a hole large enough for a {@item nib|wdh} to fit in (1 harbor moon = 5,000 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Harkon's Bite
entries: A dire wolf tooth dangles from this simple cord necklace. While you wear it, the necklace grants you a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Curse
entries: Attuning to Harkon's Bite curses you until either Harkon Lukas removes the necklace from you or you are targeted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic. As long as you remain cursed, you cannot remove the necklace.

Upon donning or removing the necklace, whether you are attuned to it or not, you are afflicted with {@variantrule Player Characters as Lycanthropes|mm|werewolf lycanthropy} as detailed in the Monster Manual. The curse lasts until the dawn after the next full moon. If you are still wearing the necklace at this time, you are afflicted with the lycanthropy again.

item.name: 易容帽
entries: 當穿戴這頂帽子時，你可以使用一個動作以隨意從它施放{@spell 易容術}。這個法術會在這頂帽子被摘除時結束。

item.name: 害蟲之帽
entries: 這頂帽子含有3發充能。當持握這頂帽子時，你可以使用一個動作以消耗1發充能並說出一個命令語，由你選擇召喚出一隻{@creature 蝙蝠}、一隻{@creature 青蛙}或一隻{@creature 老鼠}。被召喚的生物將神奇地出現在出現在這頂帽子裏，並試圖儘快地離開你。該生物對你並非友善但也沒有敵意，且它不處於你的控制之下。它將會如同尋常生物一般行動，且會在1小時之後或當它的生命值歸零時消失不見。這頂帽子會在每天日出時恢復所有已消耗的充能。

item.name: 巫術帽
entries: 這頂陳舊、錐形的帽子被金色新月和羣星所裝飾。當你穿戴這頂帽子時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你可以使用這頂帽子作爲你法師法術的法器。
你可以嘗試施放一個你不知道的戲法。這個戲法必須被列在法師法術列表中，且你必須進行一次DC 10的智力（{@skill 奧祕}）檢定。若檢定成功，則你成功施放該法術。若檢定失敗，則該法術也將施放失敗，且用於施放該法術的動作也將被浪費。無論成功與否，你直到完成一次長休之前都不能再使用這個特性。

item.name: Hazirawn
entries: A sentient (neutral evil) greatsword, Hazirawn is capable of speech in Common and Netherese. Even if you aren't attuned to the sword, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. If you are not attuned to Hazirawn, you deal an extra {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage when you hit with the weapon.

entries.name: Increased Potency
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, its bonus on attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and a hit deals an extra {@dice 2d6} necrotic damage (instead of {@dice 1d6}).

entries.name: Spells
entries: Hazirawn has 4 charges to cast spells. As long as the sword is attuned to you and you are holding it in your hand, you can cast {@spell 偵測魔法} (1 charge), {@spell 偵測善惡} (1 charge), or {@spell 偵測思想} (2 charges). Each night at midnight, Hazirawn regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges.

entries.name: Wounding
entries: While you are attuned to the weapon, any creature that you hit with Hazirawn can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

item.name: 智力頭帶
entries: 當你穿戴這條頭帶時，你的智力值變爲19。若你在未穿戴它時的智力值就已經爲19或更高，則這條頭帶對你將不會有任何效果。

item.name: 醫療工具組
entries: 這套工具組是一個包含繃帶、藥膏、和夾板的皮革囊袋。這套工具組有十次使用額度。以一個動作，你可以消耗一次這套工具組的使用額度，以使一個生命值爲0的生物的傷勢穩定，而不需要進行一次感知（{@skill 醫療}）檢定。

item.name: 織心入門
entries: 這本書樸實無華，聞起來時有隨機一種你喜歡的氣味。 這本書在被找到時，包含了以下法術： {@spell 嫌惡/共感術}, {@spell 魅惑人類}, {@spell 支配人類}, {@spell 注目術}, {@spell 催眠圖紋}, {@spell 修改記憶} 和 {@spell 暗示術}。你可以將其作爲法術書。
當你持握這本書時，你可以將其作爲你法師法術的法器。
這本書具有3發充能，且每天黎明時恢復 {@dice 1d3} 發已消耗的充能。你持握它時，可以通過以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花費1分鐘時間研究這本書，你可以消耗1發充能來將你的一道已準備法術替換爲書中的另一道法術。新法術必須是惑控學派的法術。
當你施展一道惑控系法術時，你可以消耗1發充能讓目標在對抗法術的第一個豁免檢定上具有劣勢。

item.name: Heartstone
entries: This lustrous black gem allows a {@creature night hag} to become ethereal while it is in her possession. The touch of a heartstone also cures any disease. Crafting a heartstone takes 30 days.

item.name: Hell Hound Cloak
entries: This dark cloak is made of cured {@creature hell hound} hide. As an action, you can command the cloak to transform you into a {@creature hell hound} for up to 1 hour. The transformation otherwise functions as the {@spell 變形術} spell, but you can use a bonus action to revert to your normal form.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This cloak is cursed with the essence of a {@creature hell hound}, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell 移除詛咒} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the cloak, keeping it within reach at all times.

The sixth time you use the cloak, and each time thereafter, you must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the transformation lasts until dispelled or until you drop to 0 hit points, and you can't willingly return to normal form. If you ever remain in {@creature hell hound} form for 6 hours, the transformation becomes permanent and you lose your sense of self. All your statistics are then replaced by those of a {@creature hell hound}. Thereafter, only {@spell 移除詛咒} or similar magic allows you to regain your identity and return to normal. If you remain in this permanent form for 6 days, only a {@spell 祈願術} spell can reverse the transformation.

item.name: 光輝頭盔
entries: 這個耀眼的頭盔上鑲嵌着{@dice 1d10}顆鑽石、{@dice 2d10}顆紅寶石、{@dice 3d10} 顆火蛋白石、和{@dice 4d10}顆蛋白石。任何從頭盔上摘下的寶石都將粉碎成塵。當所有寶石都被摘下或摧毀，這個頭盔將失去它的魔力。
當穿戴它時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你可以使用一個動作以施放下列其中一個法術（豁免DC 18），使用這個頭盔的其中一顆特定類型的寶石作爲構材：{@spell 晝明術}（蛋白石）、{@spell 火球術}（火蛋白石）、{@spell 虹光噴射}（鑽石）、或{@spell 火牆術}（紅寶石）。該寶石將在法術施放時被摧毀，並從頭盔上消失。
只要這個頭盔上還有至少一顆鑽石，它就會在30尺半徑範圍內有至少一個不死生物時散發出30尺半徑的微光光照。任何在該範圍內開始它回合的不死生物都將受到{@dice 1d6}光耀傷害。
只要這個頭盔上還有至少一顆紅寶石，你就具有對火焰傷害的抗性。
只要這個頭盔上還有至少一顆火蛋白石，你就可以使用一個動作並說出一個命令語，以使你正持握的一把武器迸發出火焰。這團火焰將散發出10尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸10尺的微光光照。這團火焰對你和該武器是無害的。當你使用這把熾焰武器以一次攻擊命中目標時，目標將受到額外的{@dice 1d6}火焰傷害。這團火焰將持續直到你使用一個附贈動作再次說出其命令語、或直到你丟下或收起該武器。

entries: 當你在穿戴這個頭盔期間因爲在一次對抗法術的豁免檢定中失敗而受到火焰傷害時，骰一顆{@dice d20}。若擲骰結果爲1，則這個頭盔將從它剩下的寶石中散發出無數光輝射線。每個除了你以外，距離此頭盔60尺內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 17的敏捷豁免，否則將被其中一道射線擊中，並受到等同於此頭盔上剩餘寶石數量的光耀傷害。這個頭盔和它的寶石接着將被摧毀。

item.name: 通曉語言頭盔
entries: 當穿戴此頭盔時，你可以使用一個動作從中隨意施放{@spell 通曉語言}法術。

item.name: Helm of Devil Command
item.reqAttune: by a creature that can speak Infernal
entries: This bulky, eyeless helmet is made for a {@creature pit fiend} but magically resizes to fit the heads of other wearers.

While wearing the helm, you can see out of it as though you weren't wearing it. In addition, you know the exact location and type of all devils within 1,000 feet of you. You can telepathically communicate with a devil within range, or you can broadcast your thoughts to all devils within range. The devils receiving your broadcasted thoughts have no special means of replying to them.

The helm has 3 charges. As an action, you can expend 1 charge to cast {@spell 支配怪物} (save DC 21), which affects devils only. (The spell fails and the charge is wasted if you target any creature that's not a devil.) If a devil can see you when you cast this spell on it, the devil knows you tried to charm it. The helm regains all its charges 24 hours after its last charge is expended.

If you are not a devil, using the helm's {@spell 支配怪物} property in the Nine Hells has a 20 percent chance of attracting a {@creature narzugon|MTF}, which arrives on the back of a {@creature nightmare} mount in {@dice 1d4} hours. The narzugon tries to recover the helm, killing you if necessary to obtain it. If it gets the helm, the narzugon tries to deliver it to its infernal master.

item.name: 心靈感應頭盔
entries: 當穿戴此頭盔時，你可以使用一個動作以從它施放{@spell 偵測思想}法術（豁免DC 13）。只要你仍專注於這個法術，你就可以使用一個附贈動作以對你正專注的該生物傳送一個心靈消息。當你持續專注於它的期間，它也可以使用一個附贈動作進行回覆。
當以{@spell 偵測思想}專注於一個生物時，你可以使用一個動作以從此頭盔對該生物施放{@spell 暗示術}法術（豁免DC 13）。一旦你這麼使用，這個暗示能力直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 傳送頭盔
entries: 這個頭盔含有3發充能。當穿戴它時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗1發充能以從它施放{@spell 傳送術}法術。這個頭盔會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Helm of the Gods
entries: While wearing this helm, you know whether there is a celestial or fiend within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located, provided the creature isn't behind total cover.

Whenever you finish a long rest while wearing the helm, you can pray to one of the gods listed on the Helm of the Gods table and store the listed spell in the helm, replacing any spell that is already stored there. The save DC for the spell is 13.
The helm has 3 charges. To cast a spell from the helm, you must expend 1 charge, and the helm regains {@dice 1d3} charges daily at dawn.

rows: Athreos
{@spell 防護善惡}
Ephara
{@spell 聖域術}
Erebos
{@spell 造成傷勢}
Heliod
{@spell 光導箭}
Iroas
{@spell 英雄氣概}
Karametra
{@spell 神莓術}
Keranos
{@spell 雷霆斬}
Klothys
{@spell 糾纏術}
Kruphix
{@spell 噪音暗語}
Mogis
{@spell 煉獄叱喝}
Nylea
{@spell 妖火術}
Pharika
{@spell 次級復原術}
Phenax
{@spell 魅惑人類}
Purphoros
{@spell 熾炎斬}
Thassa
{@spell 鑑定術}

item.name: Helm of the Scavenger
entries: This ornate chair is designed to propel and maneuver a ship through space.

entries.name: Passive Properties
entries: The following properties of the helm come into play even when no creature is attuned to it:

items: When placed aboard a vessel weighing between 1 and 100 tons, the helm generates an envelope of fresh air around the ship while it is in the void of space (but not underwater). This envelope extends out from the edges of the hull in all directions for a distance equal in length to the vessel's beam, so that creatures aboard and near the ship can breathe normally in space. The temperature within the air envelope is 70 degrees Fahrenheit.

When placed aboard a vessel weighing between 1 and 100 tons, the helm generates an artificial gravity field while the ship is in the void of space, so that creatures can walk on the ship's decks as they normally would. Creatures and objects that fall overboard bob in a gravity plane that extends out from the main deck for a distance equal in length to the vessel's beam.

entries.name: Active Properties
entries: The sensation of being attuned to the helm is akin to being immersed in warm water. While attuned to the helm, you gain the following abilities while you sit in it:

items: You can use the helm to propel the vessel across or through water and other liquids at a maximum speed in miles per hour equal to your highest-level unexpended spell slot.
You can use the helm to propel the vessel through air or space at a maximum speed in miles per hour equal to your highest-level unexpended spell slot × 10.
Provided you have at least one unexpended spell slot, you can steer the vessel, albeit in a somewhat clumsy fashion, in much the same way that oars or a rudder can maneuver a seafaring ship.
Whenever you like, you can see what's happening on and around the vessel as though you were standing in a location of your choice aboard it.

entries.name: Drawback
entries: While attuned to the helm, you cannot expend your own spell slots.

item.name: Helm of Underwater Action
entries: While wearing this brass helmet, you can breathe underwater, you gain {@sense 黑暗視覺} with a range of 60 feet, and you gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

item.name: 赤鐵礦
entries: 灰黑色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 麻繩(50尺)
entries: 繩索，無論是由大麻或絲綢製成，都具有2點生命值，且可以藉由一次DC 17的力量檢定將它給掙斷。

item.name: 草藥工具
entries: 這套工具組包括了各式各樣的器具，像是修剪器、研鉢及研杵、以及的囊袋和小瓶等，被藥草師用於製作藥物和藥水。熟練於這套工具組能讓你將你的熟練加值加到任何你在爲了辨識或應用藥草時所進行的屬性檢定中。同時，你必須要熟練於這套工具組才能製造{@item 解毒劑|phb}和{@item 治療藥水|phb}。
additionalEntries: 草藥工具熟練項允許你辨認植物並安全地提取有效成分。

additionalEntries.name: 組件
entries: 草藥工具包括裝藥材的袋子、採集草藥的剪鉗和皮手套、研鉢和藥杵，以及幾個玻璃瓶。

additionalEntries.name: 奧祕
entries: 你對藥材的性味歸經和功能主治的瞭解，使你在對植物進行魔法研究或試圖鑑定藥劑時具有額外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 調查
entries: 當你調查一個長有植物的區域時，草藥工具熟練項能幫助你發現那些其他人可能會忽視的細節或線索。

additionalEntries.name: 醫藥
entries: 你對草藥醫學的掌握有助於提高你使用藥用植物治療疾病和創傷的水平。

additionalEntries.name: 自然、求生
entries: 當你在野外旅行時，你的草藥技能有助於辨認植物和找到一般人不知道的食物來源。

additionalEntries.name: 辨認植物
entries: 僅僅通過外觀和氣味，你就能快速辨認出大部分植物。

additionalEntries.caption: 草藥工具
rows: 發現植物
辨別藥劑

item.name: Hew
entries: This +1 battleaxe deals maximum damage when the wielder hits a plant creature or an object made of wood. The axe's creator was a dwarf smith who feuded with the dryads of a forest where he cut firewood. Whoever carries the axe feels uneasy whenever he or she travels through a forest.

item.name: 霍華德的便利袋
entries: 這個揹包有着一箇中央囊袋和二個側袋，各自連接着一個異次元空間。每個側袋各自可以容納最多20磅重的物質，且體積不能超過2立方尺。中間的大囊袋則可以容納最多8立方尺，或最多80磅重的物質。無論它裝了什麼，這個揹包的重量永遠爲5磅。
將一個物體放入便利袋時使用與對象交互的規則。從便利袋中取出一件物品則需要你使用一個動作。當你伸入便利袋以找尋某個特定物品時，該物品將永遠神奇的位於最上層。
這個便利袋擁有幾個限制。若它超載、或若一個尖銳的物體將它戳破或把它撕裂，則這個便利袋將因此破裂並被摧毀。若便利袋被摧毀，則它裝載的東西將永遠遺失，儘管遺失的神器永遠會再次出現於某處。若這個便利袋被裏外翻轉，則它裝載的東西將無傷地掉落而出，且這個便利袋必須被恢復原狀才能夠被再次使用。若一個需要呼吸的生物被放入便利袋內，該生物可以存活最多10分鐘，在這之後它將開始窒息。
將便利袋放入由{@item 次元袋}、{@item 便攜式次元洞}或類似物品所創造的異次元空間中，將會立刻摧毀這兩件物品，並打開一道通往星界位面的傳送門。這道傳送門將產生載這兩件物品被放入彼此的位置。任何距離這道傳送門10尺內的生物將被吸進門內，並被送往星界位面中的一處隨機地點。這道傳送門接着將會關閉。這道傳送門僅限單向傳送，且無法再次被打開。

item.name: 霍華德的便利香料包
entries: 這個綁腰囊袋看起來空空如也，且含有10發充能。當持握這個囊袋時，你可以使用一個動作以消耗1發充能，說出任意一種非魔法食物調味料的名稱（像是鹽、胡椒、番紅花、或芫荽），並接着從囊袋中拿出一小搓你想要的調味料。這一搓調味料的份量足以調理一份餐點。這個囊袋會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d6+4}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Heward's Hireling Armor
entries: A number of Kwalish's experiments were attempts to research the works of the legendary mage Heward, who first crafted what he named hireling armor. While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. In addition, the armor's animated straps can assist with the drawing and sheathing of weapons, such that you can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one.

This armor also has six pockets, each of which is an extradimensional space. Each pocket can hold up to 20 pounds of material, not exceeding a volume of 2 cubic feet. The armor always weighs 10 pounds, regardless of its pockets' contents. Placing an object into one of the armor's pockets follows the normal rules for interacting with objects. Retrieving an item from a pocket of the armor requires you to use an action. When you reach into a pocket for a specific item, the item is always magically on top.

Placing the armor inside an extradimensional space created by a {@item bag of holding}, a {@item Heward's handy haversack}, or a similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

item.name: Hide of the Feral Guardian
entries: It is believed that this polished and beautifully detailed leather armor was a gift from Melora, bestowed on a long-forgotten archdruid and champion of the natural world before the terrors of the Calamity.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the armor in its dormant state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The armor grants you a +1 bonus to AC.

While you are transformed by an effect that replaces any of your game statistics with those of another creature, you have a +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls, and you retain the benefits of this armor.

As an action, you can use the armor to cast {@spell 變形術} on yourself, transforming into a {@creature giant owl} while retaining your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the armor reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The AC bonus of the armor increases to +2.
While you are transformed by an effect that replaces any of your game statistics with those of another creature, your bonus to melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1 (to +2).
When you cast the {@spell 變形術} spell using this armor, you can transform into a {@creature cave bear}.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the armor reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The AC bonus of the armor increases to +3.
While you are transformed by an effect that replaces any of your game statistics with those of another creature, your bonus to melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1 (to +3).
When you cast the {@spell 變形術} spell using this armor, you can transform into a {@creature guardian wolf|EGW}.

item.name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind
item.reqAttune: by a cleric or paladin of good alignment
entries: The Holy Symbol of Ravenkind is a unique holy symbol sacred to the good-hearted faithful of Barovia. It predates the establishment of any church in Barovia. According to legend, it was delivered to a paladin named Lugdana by a giant raven—or an angel in the form of a giant raven. Lugdana used the holy symbol to root out and destroy nests of vampires until her death. The high priests of Ravenloft kept and wore the holy symbol after Lugdana's passing.
The holy symbol is a platinum amulet shaped like the sun, with a large crystal embedded in its center.
The holy symbol has 10 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Hold Vampires
entries: As an action, you can expend 1 charge and present the holy symbol to make it flare with holy power. Vampires and {@creature vampire spawn} within 30 feet of the holy symbol when it flares must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition 麻痹} for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns to end the effect on itself.

entries.name: Turn Undead
entries: If you have the Turn Undead or the Turn the Unholy feature, you can expend 3 charges when you present the holy symbol while using that feature. When you do so, undead have disadvantage on their saving throws against the effect.

entries.name: Sunlight
entries: As an action, you can expend 5 charges while presenting the holy symbol to make it shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The light is sunlight and lasts for 10 minutes or until you end the effect (no action required).

item.name: 聖水(扁瓶裝)
entries: 以一個動作，你可以將扁瓶中的內容物潑在一個距離你5尺內的生物上、或投擲這個扁瓶最遠20尺，讓它在衝擊中破碎。無論用哪個方式，對一個目標生物進行一次遠程攻擊，將聖水視作臨時武器。若目標爲邪魔或不死生物，則它將受到{@dice 2d6}光耀傷害。
牧師或聖武士可以藉由施展特殊的儀式製造聖水。這個儀式需要花費1小時施展，使用價值25金幣的銀粉、並要求施法者消耗一個1環法術位。

item.name: 附蓋提燈
entries: 一盞附蓋提燈散發出30尺半徑的明亮光照以及再延伸30尺的微光光照。一旦被點亮，每一扁瓶(1品脫)的{@item 燈油(扁瓶裝)|phb|燈油}都可以讓它燃燒持續6小時。以一個動作，你可以降下燈蓋，將光照減弱爲5尺半徑的微光光照。

item.name: Hook of Fisher's Delight
entries: This tiny silver fishhook has a little gold feather attached to it. For it to function, the feathered hook must be tied to the end of a fishing line and immersed in enough water to fill at least a 10-foot cube. At the end of each uninterrupted hour of immersion, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, a floppy, 6-inch-long magical fish appears on the end of the hook. The color and properties of the conjured fish are determined by rolling on the Hook of Fisher's Delight table. Once the hook conjures a fish, it can't do so again until the next dawn.

entries.caption: Hook of Fisher's Delight
rows: Green with copper bands
This tasty fish provides a day's worth of nourishment to one creature that eats it. The fish loses this property and rots if it's not eaten within 24 hours of being caught.
Yellow with black stripes

Once removed from the hook, this awful-tasting fish can be thrown up to 120 feet, targeting a creature the thrower can see. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition 伏地}. The fish then disappears.
Blue with white bands

When released from the hook, this fish squirms free, sprouts wings, follows you around, and sings a beautiful tune in Aquan. It disappears after {@dice 2d4} hours or when reduced to 0 hit points. The fish uses the {@creature quipper} stat block, except that it can breathe air and has a flying speed of 30 feet.
Gold with silver stripes

This tasty fish provides a day's worth of nourishment to one creature that eats it and grants {@dice 2d10} temporary hit points to that creature. The fish loses these properties and rots if it's not eaten within 24 hours of being caught.

item.name: 音爆號角
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以說出這個號角的命令語，並接着吹響這個號角，它將釋放出一陣30尺錐形，可以在最遠600尺的距離被聽到的雷鳴音爆。每個在錐形範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將受到{@dice 5d6}雷鳴傷害並陷入{@condition 耳聾}狀態長達1分鐘。若豁免成功，則該生物只受到一半的傷害，且不會陷入{@condition 耳聾}狀態。由玻璃或水晶所製成的生物和物體在該豁免檢定上具有劣勢，且會受到{@dice 10d6}雷鳴傷害，而非{@dice 5d6}。
每次使用這個號角的魔法，都會有{@chance 20}幾率使這個號角爆炸。這陣爆炸將會對吹奏者造成{@dice 10d6}火焰傷害，並摧毀這個號角。

item.name: 靜報號角
entries: 這個號角含有4發充能。當你使用一個動作吹響它時，一個你所選擇的生物只要距離這個號角600尺內且不處於{@condition 耳聾}狀態，它可以聽見這個號角的刺耳聲響。沒有其他生物可以聽見這個號角所發出的聲音。這個號角會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d4}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Horn of the Endless Maze
entries: You can use an action to blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the Abyss appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits look like minotaurs, and use the {@creature berserker} statistics. They return to Abyss after 1 hour or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.
The horn summons {@dice 3d4 + 3} {@creature berserker||berserkers}. To use the horn, you must be proficient with all simple weapons.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned {@creature berserker||berserkers} attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

item.name: 瓦爾哈拉號角，黃銅
entries: 你可以使用一個動作去吹響這個號角。作爲回應，來自約瑟園(Ysgard)位面的戰士精魂將會出現在距離你60尺的範圍內。這些精魂使用{@creature 狂戰士}的數據。它們將在1小時之後，或當它們的生命值歸零時返回約瑟園。一旦你使用這個號角，則它直到經過7天之前都不能再被使用。
一把黃銅號角可以召喚{@dice 3d4+3}個{@creature 狂戰士}。要使用這把黃銅號角，你必須要先熟練於所有簡易武器。
若你在未滿足其先決條件的情況下吹響這個號角，則被召喚的{@creature 狂戰士}將攻擊你。若你滿足其條件，則它們將對你和你的同伴友善，並服從你的命令。

item.name: 瓦爾哈拉號角，青銅
entries: 你可以使用一個動作去吹響這個號角。作爲回應，來自約瑟園(Ysgard)位面的戰士精魂將會出現在距離你60尺的範圍內。這些精魂使用{@creature 狂戰士}的數據。它們將在1小時之後，或當它們的生命值歸零時返回約瑟園。一旦你使用這個號角，則它直到經過7天之前都不能再被使用。
一把青銅號角可以召喚{@dice 4d4+4}個{@creature 狂戰士}。要使用這把青銅號角，你必須要先熟練於中甲。
若你在未滿足其先決條件的情況下吹響這個號角，則被召喚的{@creature 狂戰士}將攻擊你。若你滿足其條件，則它們將對你和你的同伴友善，並服從你的命令。

item.name: 瓦爾哈拉號角，黑鐵
entries: 你可以使用一個動作去吹響這個號角。作爲回應，來自約瑟園(Ysgard)位面的戰士精魂將會出現在距離你60尺的範圍內。這些精魂使用{@creature 狂戰士}的數據。它們將在1小時之後，或當它們的生命值歸零時返回約瑟園。一旦你使用這個號角，則它直到經過7天之前都不能再被使用。
這把黑鐵號角可以召喚{@dice 5d4+5}個{@creature 狂戰士}。要使用這把黑鐵號角，你必須要先熟練於所有軍用武器。
若你在未滿足其先決條件的情況下吹響這個號角，則被召喚的{@creature 狂戰士}將攻擊你。若你滿足其條件，則它們將對你和你的同伴友善，並服從你的命令。

item.name: 瓦爾哈拉號角，白銀
entries: 你可以使用一個動作去吹響這個號角。作爲回應，來自約瑟園(Ysgard)位面的戰士精魂將會出現在距離你60尺的範圍內。這些精魂使用{@creature 狂戰士}的數據。它們將在1小時之後，或當它們的生命值歸零時返回約瑟園。一旦你使用這個號角，則它直到經過7天之前都不能再被使用。
這把白銀號角可以召喚{@dice 2d4+2}個{@creature 狂戰士}。
被召喚的{@creature 狂戰士}將對你和你的同伴友善，並服從你的命令。

item.name: Horned Ring
entries: Allows an attuned wearer to ignore Undermountain's magical restrictions (see "Alterations to Magic").

item.name: Horror Trinket
entries: Before you finish making a character, roll once on the Horror Trinkets table for a unique object your character has with them at the start of their adventuring career. These trinkets hint toward various horrific tales and might lead to dreadful revelations or be nothing more than grim keepsakes. At the DM's discretion any of these trinkets might also be a Mist talisman (detailed in {@book chapter 3|VRGR|3|Mist Talismans}), a focal item that can lead the bearer through the Mists to a particular Domain of Dread.

entries.caption: Horror Trinkets
rows: A picture you drew as a child of your imaginary friend
A lock that opens when blood is dripped in its keyhole
Clothes stolen from a scarecrow
A spinning top carved with four faces: happy, sad, wrathful, and dead
The necklace of a sibling who died on the day you were born
A wig from someone executed by beheading
The unopened letter to you from your dying father
A pocket watch that runs backward for an hour every midnight
A winter coat stolen from a dying soldier
A bottle of invisible ink that can only be read at sunset
A wineskin that refills when interred with a dead person for a night
A set of silverware used by a king for his last meal
A spyglass that always shows the world suffering a terrible storm
A cameo with the profile's face scratched away
A lantern with a black candle that never runs out and that burns with green flame
A teacup from a child's tea set, stained with blood
A little black book that records your dreams, and yours alone, when you sleep
A necklace formed of the interlinked holy symbols of a dozen deities
A noose that feels heavier than it should
A birdcage into which small birds fly but once inside never eat or leave
A lepidopterist's box filled with dead moths with skull-like patterns on their wings
A jar of pickled ghouls' tongues
The wooden hand of a notorious pirate
A urn with the ashes of a dead relative
A hand mirror backed with a bronze depiction of a medusa
Pallid leather gloves crafted with ivory fingernails
Dice made from the knuckles of a notorious charlatan
A ring of keys for forgotten locks
Nails from the coffin of a murderer
A key to the family crypt
A bouquet of funerary flowers that always looks and smells fresh
A switch used to discipline you as a child
A music box that plays by itself whenever someone holding it dances
A walking cane with an iron ferrule that strikes sparks on stone
A flag from a ship lost at sea
A porcelain doll's head that always seems to be looking at you
A wolf's head wrought in silver that is also a whistle
A small mirror that shows a much older version of the viewer
A small, worn book of children's nursery rhymes
A mummified raven claw
A broken pendant of a silver dragon that's always cold to the touch
A small locked box that quietly hums a lovely melody at night, but you always forget it in the morning
An inkwell that makes one a little nauseous when staring at it
An old doll made from a dark, dense wood and missing a hand and a foot
A black executioner's hood
A pouch made of flesh, with a sinew drawstring
A tiny spool of black thread that never runs out
A tiny clockwork figurine of a dancer that's missing a gear and doesn't work
A black wooden pipe that creates puffs of smoke that look like skulls
A vial of perfume, the scent of which only certain creatures can detect
A stone that emits a single endless sigh
A rag doll with two red dots on its neck
A spring-loaded toy with a missing crank
A mason jar containing a harmless but agitated, animate ooze
A black wooden die with 1's on all the faces
A child's portrait with "born" written on the back, along with next year's date
A dagger-sized shark tooth
A finger that's taken root in a small pot
A toolbox containing the remains of a dangerous but broken clockwork arachnid
A pitcher-sized, opalescent snail shell that occasionally, inexplicably shudders or tips over
The logbook of an ice-breaking ship called The Haifisch
A small portrait of you as a child, alongside your identically dressed twin
A silver pocket watch with thirteen hours marked on the face
A woodcut of a wolf devouring its own hind leg
A planchette etched with raven skulls
A moist coral figurine of a lamprey with arms, legs, and a bipedal stance
A bronze fingertrap sculpted with roaring tigers
A pearl necklace that turns red under the full moon
A fossil of a fish with humanoid features
A plague doctor's mask
A paper talisman with smudged ink
A locket containing the smeared image of an eyeless figure
A canopic jar with a lid sculpted like a goat
A jack-o'-lantern made from a small, pale gourd
A single high-heeled, iron shoe
A candle made from a severed hand
A clockwork device that beats like a heart
A blank masquerade mask
A glass eye with a live worm inside
A sheet with two eyeholes cut in it
The deed to someplace called Tergeron Manor
An ornate, wax-sealed crimson envelope that resists all attempts to open it
A mourning veil trimmed in black lace
A straitjacket covered in charcoal runes
A tattered, burlap mask with a crooked smile painted on it
A green ribbon designed to be worn as a choker
Dentures with mismatched, sharpened teeth
A warm, fist-sized egg case
A copper ring with "mine" engraved on the inside
A glass ampoule containing a neon green fluid
An eye patch embroidered with a holy symbol
A severed big toe with a nail that continues to grow
A journal that has been heavily redacted
A glove with a mouth-like design stitched on the palm
An ornate but empty reliquary made of silver and fractured glass
A ceramic figure of a cat with too many eyes
A crumpled paper ticket bearing the words "admit none"
An electrum coin with your face on one side
A shrunken gremishka head that twitches when anyone casts magic nearby
A sunburst amulet with a red stone at the center

item.name: 西風馬蹄鐵
entries: 這些鐵製的馬蹄鐵爲四個一組。當這四個馬蹄鐵都被裝在一匹馬或類似生物的蹄上，它們將讓該生物得以漂浮於離地4寸的高度，並如常移動。這個效果代表着該生物可以穿越或站在非固體或不穩固的表面，例如水或岩漿。該生物不會留下任何足跡，且無視困難地形。此外，該生物可以在一天內以正常速度移動最多12個小時而不會承受來自強行軍的{@condition 力竭}。

item.name: 加速馬蹄鐵
entries: 這些鐵製的馬蹄鐵爲四個一組。當這四個馬蹄鐵都被裝在一匹馬或類似生物的蹄上，它們將使該生物的步行速度增加30尺。

item.name: Hunter's Coat
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

The coat has 3 charges. When you hit a creature with an attack and that creature doesn't have all its hit points, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage to the target. The coat regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.
The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

item.name: 狩獵陷阱
entries: 當你使用一個動作設置它，這個陷阱會形成一個鋸齒鐵環，並在一個生物踩上它中心的壓力板時猛然咬合。這個陷阱被一條重鎖鏈綁在一個固定的物體上，像是一棵樹或一根被插入地面的釘子。一個踩上壓力板的生物必須成功通過一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，否則受到{@dice 1d4}穿刺傷害並停止移動。此後，直到該生物從該陷阱中逃脫之前，它的移動將被限制在鎖鏈的長度內（通常爲3尺長）。一個生物可以使用它的動作進行一次DC 13的力量檢定，若檢定成功則釋放自己或另一個在它觸及範圍內的生物。每一次失敗的檢定都會對受困的生物造成1 穿刺傷害。

entries.caption: Icewind Dale Trinkets
rows: A small wooden figurine of a yawning walrus, painted in red and black
A pair of scrimshaw cufflinks with an image of a fisherman on a boat engraved on them
A small iron key with a frayed blue and gold cord tied to it
A small illustrated book of Northlander myths that has pages missing
A damaged scrimshaw cameo depicting a merfolk
A stone from a burial cairn with a tiny Dwarvish rune carved into it
A ripped cloth sail with a symbol you don't recognize
An Ulu knife with a scrimshaw handle
A jar containing an unidentifiable, sweet, sticky substance
A delicate glass ball painted with snowflakes, capped by a metal loop with a tiny hook attached to it
An expedition log with missing pages and a pressed flower used as a bookmark
An owl figurine carved from whalebone
A sewing box that smells of old wood and has three spools of blue thread inside
A scrimshaw-handled ink pen with black runic designs along its length
A brooch made from a small insect encased in amber
A scrimshaw pepper shaker etched with the letter W
An old, wooden-handled ice pick stained with blood that won't wash off
A fabric doll bearing an angry expression
A set of wind chimes made from seashells
A beautiful silver tin that, when opened, emits the smell of rotting fish
A bloodstained dreamcatcher made from fishing line, gold wire, and snowy owlbear feathers
A figurine of a polar bear made of ice that never melts
A snow globe that doesn't need to be shaken
A piece of sea glass shaped like a unicorn's horn
A dark blue scarf that gets lighter in shade the higher the altitude of the wearer

item.name: Icon of Ravenloft
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: The Icon of Ravenloft is a 12-inch tall statuette made of the purest silver, weighing 10 pounds. It depicts a cleric kneeling in supplication.
The icon was given to Strahd by the archpriest Ciril Romulich, an old family friend, to consecrate the castle and its chapel.
While within 30 feet of the icon, a creature is under the effect of a {@spell 防護善惡} spell against fiends and undead. Only a creature attuned to the icon can use its other properties.

entries.name: Augury
entries: You can use an action to cast an {@spell 卜筮} spell from the icon, with no material components required. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Bane of the Undead
entries: You can use the icon as a holy symbol while using the Turn Undead or Turn the Unholy feature. If you do so, increase the save DC by 2.

entries.name: Cure Wounds
entries: While holding the icon, you can take an action to heal one creature that you can see within 30 feet of you. The target regains {@dice 3d8 + 3} hit points, unless it is an undead, a construct, or a fiend. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 解文刺青
entries: 該魔法刺青用一根特殊的針製作，呈現爲優美書法或者書寫工具的圖案。

entries.name: 刺青同調
entries: 同調此物品時，你需要將針持握，並抵在你想要讓刺青出現的那處皮膚上。當同調完成時，針頭會化爲墨水再變成刺青。若你與刺青的同調結束，刺青會消失，針頭會再次出現在你的位置中。

entries.name: 魔法書寫
entries: 當這個刺青在你的皮膚上時，你可以用你的指尖寫字，就如同一支永遠不會斷墨的墨水筆。
作爲一個動作，你可以觸摸一段至多長達一頁的文字，然後說出一個生物的名字。在接下來的24小時內，你所觸摸的文字變爲對除你和你所說出名字的生物以外所有人隱形。你們中的一個可以通過觸碰文字來解除隱形（無需動作）。使用後，直到下次黎明前，此動作不能再次使用。

item.name: Illuminator's Tattoo
entries: This tattoo contains beautiful calligraphy, images of writing implements, and the like. While this tattoo is on your skin, you can write with your fingertip as if it were an ink pen that never runs out of ink.

As an action, you can touch a piece of writing up to one page in length and speak a creature's name. The writing becomes {@condition 隱形} to everyone other than you and the named creature for the next 24 hours. Either of you can dismiss the invisibility by touching the script (no action required). Once used, this action can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Illusionist's Bracers
entries: A powerful illusionist of House Dimir originally developed these bracers, which enabled her to create multiple minor illusions at once. The bracers' power, though, extends far beyond illusions.
While wearing the bracers, whenever you cast a cantrip, you can use a bonus action on the same turn to cast that cantrip a second time.

item.name: 不動權杖
entries: 這支扁平的鐵製權杖在其中一端有着一個按鈕。你可以使用一個動作按下按鈕，並讓權杖魔法性地固定在原地。直到你或另一個生物使用一個動作再次按下按鈕，這個權杖將保持不動，即使這違反重力也一樣。這個權杖最多能負載 8,000 磅的重量，在這之上的重量將使權杖解除效果並摔落。一個生物可以使用一個動作進行一次DC 30的力量檢定，檢定成功則可以將固定住的權杖移動至多10尺距離。

item.name: Infernal Puzzle Box
entries: An infernal puzzle box is a cube-shaped container 5 to 6 inches on a side, composed of airtight, interlocking parts made from materials found in the Nine Hells. Most of these boxes are made of infernal iron, though some are carved from bone or horn. Infernal puzzle boxes are used to safeguard diabolical contracts signed between devils and mortals, even after the terms of these contracts are fulfilled. An empty infernal puzzle box weighs 3 pounds regardless of the materials used to fashion it.

When an object small enough to fit inside an infernal puzzle box is placed in it, the container magically seals shut around the object, and no magic can force the box open. The sealed box becomes immune to all damage as well. Every infernal puzzle box is constructed with a unique means of opening it. The trick to solving the puzzle is always mundane, never magical. Once a creature figures out the trick or sequence of steps needed to open a particular infernal puzzle box, that creature can open the box as an action, allowing access to the box's contents.

A creature that spends 1 hour holding an infernal puzzle box while trying to open it can make a DC 30 Intelligence ({@skill 調查}) check. If the check succeeds, the creature figures out the trick or sequence of steps needed to open the box. If the check fails by 5 or more, the creature must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, taking 42 ({@dice 12d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Infernal Tack
item.reqAttune: by a creature of evil alignment.
entries: A {@creature narzugon|MTF} binds a nightmare to its service with infernal tack, which consists of a bridle, bit, reins, saddle, stirrups, and spurs. A {@creature nightmare} equipped with infernal tack must serve whoever wears the spurs until the wearer dies or the tack is removed.

You can use an action to call a {@creature nightmare} equipped with infernal tack by clashing the spurs together or scraping them through blood. The nightmare appears at the start of your next turn, within 20 feet of you. It acts as your ally and takes its turn on your initiative count. It remains for 1 day, until you or it dies, or until you dismiss it as an action. If the nightmare dies, it reforms in the Nine Hells within 24 hours, after which you can summon it again.

The tack doesn't conjure a nightmare from thin air; one must first be subdued so the tack can be placed on it. No nightmare accepts this forced servitude willingly, but some eventually form strong loyalties to their masters and become true partners in evil.

item.name: Infiltrator's Key
entries: This mithral skeleton key was forged using the blood of twelve master thieves executed for trying to steal magic items during the Age of Arcanum.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The Infiltrator's Key grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: The key can be used as {@item 盜賊工具|phb} for the purpose of opening locks. When using the key, you are considered proficient in thieves' tools and you have advantage on ability checks made to open locks.
While holding the key, your steps are muffled, giving you advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks made to move silently.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Infiltrator's Key reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: While holding the key, you can use a bonus action to transform the key into a magic dagger or back into a key. While the key is in the form of a dagger, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to your hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.

While holding the key, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell 變造自身}, {@spell 隱形術}, {@spell 敲擊術}, or {@spell 行蹤無跡}. Once a spell has been cast using the key, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Infiltrator's Key reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: As a bonus action, you can touch the key to a floor, wall, or ceiling that is no more than 5 feet thick and cause a magical opening to appear in the surface. When you create the opening, you choose its length and width, up to 10 feet for each dimension. The opening lasts until the key passes through it to the other side, at which point it disappears (if a creature is in the opening when the doorway closes, the creature is safely shunted to the nearest unoccupied space). The key can't be used to create another opening until the next dawn.

While holding the key, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell 次元門}, {@spell 氣化形體}, or {@spell 假象術}. Once a spell has been cast using the key, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Ingot of the Skold Rune
entries: This appears to be a simple ingot of iron ore, about a foot long and a few inches across. Inspection of its surface reveals the faint, silvery outline of the skold (shield) rune. The ingot has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Runic Shield
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Shield Bond
entries: As a bonus action, choose a creature that you can see within 30 feet of you, other than yourself. Until the end of your next turn, any damage the target takes is reduced to 1, but you take half the damage prevented in this way. The damage you take can't be reduced in any way. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Shield Ward
entries: You can transfer the ingot's magic to a nonmagical item—a shield or a two-handed melee weapon-by tracing the skold rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the ingot is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Shield.
items.entry: The shield is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. Its magic gives you a +1 bonus to AC, and the first time after each of your long rests that damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you are instead reduced to 1 hit point. You must be wielding the shield to gain these benefits.

items.name: Weapon.
items.entry: The weapon is now an uncommon magic weapon. It grants you a +1 bonus to AC while you're holding it.

item.name: 墨水(1盎司小瓶裝)
entries: 墨水(1盎司小瓶裝)

item.name: Insect Repellent (block of incense)
entries: Insect repellent can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru in two forms: blocks of incense or a greasy salve. The merchant prince Kwayothe controls the sale of both. Neither kind of repellent protects against giant insects or the vile swarms of insects described in appendix A of the Monster Manual.
When lit, it burns for 8 hours and repels normal insects within a 20-foot-radius centered on it.

item.name: Insect Repellent (greasy salve)
entries: Insect repellent can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru in two forms: blocks of incense or a greasy salve. The merchant prince Kwayothe controls the sale of both. Neither kind of repellent protects against giant insects or the vile swarms of insects described in appendix A of the Monster Manual.
A gourd or vial of salve contains 20 applications of odorless grease. One application protects its wearer against normal insects for 24 hours. The salve is waterproof so it doesn't wash off in rain.

item.name: Insignia of Claws
entries: The jewels in the insignia of the Cult of the Dragon flare with purple light when you enter combat, empowering your natural fists or natural weapons.
While wearing the insignia you gain a +1 bonus to the attack rolls and the damage rolls you make with unarmed strikes and natural weapons. Such attacks are considered to be magical.

item.name: 幻象樂器
entries: 當你演奏這個樂器時，你可以在以樂器爲中心的5尺半徑球體範圍內創造出無害、虛幻的視覺效果。若你是一名吟遊詩人，則這個半徑將增加至15尺。範例視覺效果包括了發光的音符、靈體舞者、蝴蝶、和徐徐飄下的雪花。這些魔法效果不具備實體或聲音，且它們很明顯是幻象。這個效果會在你停止演奏時終止。

item.name: 撰寫樂器
entries: 這個樂器含有3發充能。當你演奏它時，你可以使用一個動作以消耗1發充能，並在距離你30尺內一處你所能看見的非魔法物體或表面上書寫一段魔法消息。這段消息的長度最多爲六個字，且被以一種你所知道的語言書寫。若你是一名吟遊詩人，則你可以額外寫下七個字，並可以選擇讓這段消息微微發光，讓其可以在非魔法黑暗中被看見。對這段消息施放{@spell 解除魔法}可以將其抹消。除此之外的情況，這段消息將在24小時之後消散。
這個樂器會在每天日出時恢復所有已消耗的充能。

item.name: 吟遊詩人樂器，安斯翠瑟豎琴
entries: 一把吟遊詩人樂器是其樂器中的精品，在各方面都優於普通樂器。這類樂器共有七種，各自以傳奇吟遊詩人學院的名字命名。未與該樂器同調的角色在嘗試演奏這個樂器的時候必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則受到{@dice 2d4}心靈傷害。
你可以使用一個動作以演奏該樂器，並施放它的其中一個法術。一旦這個樂器被用以施放法術，則直到下次日出之前它都不能再被用以施放法術。這個法術使用你的施法屬性和法術豁免DC。
當你施放一個會使任何其目標在豁免檢定失敗時陷入{@condition 魅惑}的法術時，你可以演奏這個樂器以使目標在該豁免檢定中承受劣勢。這個效果只會應用於具有姿勢或材料構材的法術。
所有吟遊詩人樂器都可以被用來施放下列法術： {@spell 飛行術}、{@spell 隱形術}、{@spell 浮空術}、和{@spell 防護善惡}。
此外，安斯翠瑟豎琴可以被用來施放{@spell 操控天氣}、{@spell 治療傷勢}(5環)、和{@spell 棘牆術}。
item.ENG_name: Instrument of the Bards, Anstruth Harp

item.name: 吟遊詩人樂器，凱納斯曼陀林

item.ENG_name: Instrument of the Bards, Canaith Mandolin

item.ENG_name: Instrument of the Bards, Doss Lute

item.ENG_name: Instrument of the Bards, Fochlucan Bandore

item.ENG_name: Instrument of the Bards, Mac-Fuirmidh Cittern

item.name: 吟遊詩人樂器，奧萊姆豎琴
entries: 一把吟遊詩人樂器是其樂器中的精品，在各方面都優於普通樂器。這類樂器共有七種，各自以傳奇吟遊詩人學院的名字命名。未與該樂器同調的角色在嘗試演奏這個樂器的時候必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則受到{@dice 2d4}心靈傷害。

此外，奧萊姆豎琴可以被用來施放{@spell 困惑術}、{@spell 操控天氣}、和{@spell 火焰風暴}。
item.ENG_name: Instrument of the Bards, Ollamh Harp

item.name: Ioun Stone of Vitality
entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity ({@skill 體操}) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.
A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.
You gain a +1 bonus to death saving throws while this luminous green-and-blue marbled sphere orbits your head.

item.name: 艾恩石，吸收
entries: 艾恩在許多世界被尊爲知識和寓言之神，而這種石頭便是以祂爲名。{@italic 艾恩石}存在着許多種類，各自有着不同形狀和顏色的獨特組合。
當你使用一個動作將其中一個這種石頭投向空中，該石頭將會以{@dice 1d3}尺的距離繞着你的頭旋轉，並賦予你一項好處。此後，另一個生物必須使用一個動作去捕捉它或網住該石頭，通過成功進行一次對抗AC 24的攻擊檢定、或成功通過一次DC 24的敏捷（{@skill 體操}）檢定，才能將它與你分開。你自己則可以使用一個動作以抓住並收起該石頭，結束它的效果。
這顆石頭具有AC 24，10點生命值，和對所有傷害的抗性。它在繞着你的頭旋轉時被視爲一個被你穿戴的物體。
當這顆淡紫色的橢圓球體繞着你的頭旋轉時，你可以使用你的反應以取消一個環階爲4環或更低，由你可以看見的生物所施放且只以你爲目標的法術。
一旦這顆石頭取消了總共20環的法術，它將耗盡它的力量，失去它的魔法並變成暗灰色。若你被指定成爲一個法術的目標，且該法術的環階高於這顆石頭剩餘的可吸收環數，則這顆石頭將無法取消它。

當這顆深紅色的球體繞着你的頭旋轉時，你的敏捷值增加2點，上限爲20。

當這顆暗藍色的菱形繞着你的頭旋轉時，你將不會被突襲。

item.name: Ioun Stone, Historical Knowledge
entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity ({@skill 體操}) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.
A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill 歷史} skill, or a +1 bonus to checks with that skill if already proficient, while this polished, steely sphere orbits your head.

entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

You are fluent in one additional language while this pulsating bit of red jeweled crystal orbits your head. The DM chooses the language bestowed by the stone.

當這顆灰玫瑰色的棱形石繞着你的頭旋轉時，你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries: 艾恩在許多世界被尊爲知識和寓言之神，而這種石頭便是以祂爲名。{@italic 艾恩石}存在着許多種類，各自有着不同形狀和顏色的獨特組合。

當這顆珍珠白色的紡錘體繞着你的頭旋轉時，只要你還擁有至少1點生命值，則你每經過一小時就能夠回覆15點生命值。

entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. You gain proficiency in the {@skill 宗教} skill, or a +1 bonus to checks with that skill if already proficient, while this tiny golden gem orbits your head.

item.name: 艾恩石，儲法
entries: 艾恩在許多世界被尊爲知識和寓言之神，而這種石頭便是以祂爲名。{@italic 艾恩石}存在着許多種類，各自有着不同形狀和顏色的獨特組合。

這顆石頭具有AC 24，10點生命值，和對所有傷害的抗性。它在繞着你的頭旋轉時被視爲一個被你穿戴的物體。
這顆亮紫色的棱形石可以將它施放的法術保存起來，並保存這些法術直到你使用它們。這顆石頭可以同時保存總計最多3環的法術。當被發現時，這顆石頭已經存有{@dice 1d4-1}環由DM選擇的法術。
通過在施放法術時觸碰這顆石頭，任何生物都可以將一個1環到3環的法術施放在這顆石頭上。這個法術當下並不會發揮任何效果，而是被保存進這顆石頭中。若這顆石頭無法容納該法術，則該法術將被浪費而不會發揮任何效果。用以施放該法術的法術位環階將會決定它在該艾恩石中所使用的空間。
當這顆石頭繞着你的頭旋轉時，你可以施放任何它所保存的法術。該法術將使用其原本施法者所使用的法術位環階、法術豁免DC、法術攻擊加值、和施法屬性，但除此之外，它仍被視作是由你施放了該法術。從這顆石頭施放的法術將不再被保存於石頭中，並釋放它原本佔據的空間。

entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.
