當你使用一個動作將其中一個這種石頭投向空中，該石頭將會以{@dice 1d3}尺的距離繞着你的頭旋轉，並賦予你一項好處。此後，另一個生物必須使用一個動作去捕捉它或網住該石頭，通過成功進行一次對抗AC 24的攻擊檢定、或成功通過一次DC 24的敏捷（{@skill 體操}）檢定，才能將它與你分開。你自己則可以使用一個動作以抓住並收起該石頭，結束它的效果。
這顆石頭具有AC 24，10點生命值，和對所有傷害的抗性。它在繞着你的頭旋轉時被視爲一個被你穿戴的物體。
當這顆淡藍色的菱形繞着你的頭旋轉時，你的力量值增加2點，上限爲20。

item.name: Ioun Stone, Supreme Intellect
entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity ({@skill 體操}) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.
A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.
You gain a +1 bonus to Intelligence checks while this faceted sphere orbits your head.

item.name: 艾恩石，維生
entries: 艾恩在許多世界被尊爲知識和寓言之神，而這種石頭便是以祂爲名。{@italic 艾恩石}存在着許多種類，各自有着不同形狀和顏色的獨特組合。
當你使用一個動作將其中一個這種石頭投向空中，該石頭將會以{@dice 1d3}尺的距離繞着你的頭旋轉，並賦予你一項好處。此後，另一個生物必須使用一個動作去捕捉它或網住該石頭，通過成功進行一次對抗AC 24的攻擊檢定、或成功通過一次DC 24的敏捷（{@skill 體操}）檢定，才能將它與你分開。你自己則可以使用一個動作以抓住並收起該石頭，結束它的效果。
這顆石頭具有AC 24，10點生命值，和對所有傷害的抗性。它在繞着你的頭旋轉時被視爲一個被你穿戴的物體。
當這顆清澈的紡錘體繞着你的頭旋轉時，你將不需要進食或飲水。

item.name: 比拉羅的鐵索
entries: 這顆鏽跡斑斑的鐵球直徑約莫3寸且重1磅。你可以使用一個動作以說出它的命令語，並將這個鐵球丟向一個距離你60尺內，你能看見，且體型爲巨型或更小的生物。隨着鐵球飛越空中，它將展開成一團糾纏在一起的金屬索帶。
進行一次遠程攻擊檢定，並使用等同於你敏捷調整值加上你熟練加值的攻擊加值。若命中，目標將被{@condition 束縛}直到你採取一個附贈動作以再次說出其命令語並釋放它。當你這麼做，或當該攻擊失手時，將會使這團索帶收縮並再度變回球體。
一個生物（包括被{@condition 束縛}的生物）可以使用一個動作並進行一次DC 20的力量檢定以嘗試破壞這團鐵索。若檢定成功，則此物品將被摧毀，且被{@condition 束縛}的生物將被釋放。若該檢定失敗，則直到24小時經過之前，該生物再次嘗試破網的行動都將自動失敗。
一旦這團索帶被使用，則它們直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 收妖瓶
entries: 這個鐵製瓶子附有一個黃銅瓶塞。你可以使用一個動作以說出這個扁瓶的命令語，選擇一個距離你60尺內且你所能看見的生物作爲目標。若目標並非原生於你現在所在位面的生物，則目標必須成功通過一次DC 17的感知豁免，否則將被囚禁在這個扁瓶內。若目標過去曾經被囚禁在這個扁瓶內，則它將在該豁免檢定中具有優勢。一旦被囚禁，該生物直到被釋放前都將待在這個扁瓶內。這個扁瓶同時只能容納一個生物。一個被囚禁在扁瓶內的生物不需要呼吸、進食、或飲水，且不會衰老。
你可以使用一個動作以拔除這個扁瓶的瓶塞，並釋放出這個扁瓶內裝載的生物。該生物將在1小時內對你和你的同伴友善，且會在這段期間內服從你的命令。若你沒有下達命令、或給了一個可能會導致它死亡的命令，則它將會自我防衛，且除此之外不採取其他動作。在這段期間結束後，該生物將根據它原本的性格和陣營行動。
{@spell 鑑定術}法術可以揭示出這個扁瓶內是否有生物存在，而唯一能知道該生物具體種類的方式只有將這個扁瓶打開。一個剛被發現的收妖瓶可能已經裝有一個由DM選擇或隨機決定的生物。

rows: 無
{@creature 奧登羅斯魔}
{@creature 魔裔}
{@creature 土巨靈(達奧)|mm|土巨靈}
惡魔(類型1)：{@creature 巴古拉魔}、{@creature 影魔}或{@creature 弗洛魔}
惡魔(類型2)：{@creature 喀嘶魔}或{@creature 狂戰魔}
惡魔(類型3)：{@creature 迷誘魔}或{@creature 蠟融妖}
惡魔(類型4)：{@creature 判魂魔}
惡魔(類型5)：{@creature 六臂蛇魔}
惡魔(類型6)：{@creature 巴洛炎魔}或{@creature 巨牛魔}
{@creature 梵天神侍}
魔鬼(高等)：{@creature 角魔}、{@creature 欲魔}、{@creature 冰魔}或{@creature 深獄煉魔}
魔鬼(次級)：{@creature 小魔鬼}、{@creature 棘魔}、{@creature 須魔}、{@creature 蝟魔}、{@creature 鏈魔}或{@creature 骨魔}
{@creature 氣巨靈(鎮尼)|mm|氣巨靈}
{@creature 火巨靈(伊夫利特)|mm|火巨靈}
元素生物(任意)
{@creature 吉斯洋基騎士}
{@creature 吉斯澤萊澤斯修士}
{@creature 隱形潛獵者}
{@creature 水巨靈(瑪利德)|mm|水巨靈}
{@creature 麥澤羅斯魔}
{@creature 夜鬼婆}
{@creature 尼卡羅斯魔}
{@creature 異域神侍}
{@creature 火蜥蜴(沙拉曼達)|mm|火蜥蜴}
史拉蟾(任意)
{@creature 熾天神侍}
{@creature 魅魔}/{@creature 夢魔}
{@creature 烏特羅斯魔}
{@creature 索爾石怪}

item.name: 鐵鍋
entries: 一個鐵鍋可以容納1加侖的液體。

item.name: 鐵牙
entries: 這把{@item 戰鎬|phb}是用一整塊鐵鍛造而成，其尖牙狀的頭部刻有古代符文。儘管這把戰鎬在被持握時顯得沉重，但當持用者憤怒地揮舞它時，卻幾乎不會感覺到它的重量。該武器免疫任何形式的鏽蝕、強酸或腐蝕——似乎沒有任何東西能在它上面留下痕跡。鐵牙內部蘊含着邪惡土元素親王{@creature Ogrémoch|pota|歐格莫克}的碎片。
你在使用這把武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+2加值。當你用它造成傷害時，目標將會額外受到{@dice 1d8}雷鳴傷害。

entries.name: 土元素掌控
entries: 當你持握鐵牙時，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你可以流利地說土族語。
你對強酸傷害具有抗性。
你獲得60尺範圍的震顫感知。在你周圍60尺的範圍內，你可以感覺到貴金屬和寶石的存在，但無法掌握它們的確切位置。
你可以對{@creature 土元素}施放{@spell 支配怪物}(DC 17)。一旦你這麼做，鐵牙的這個能力直到下次日出前都無法再被使用。

entries.name: 粉碎
entries: 鐵牙含有3發充能。你可以使用一個動作並消耗1發充能，以施放2環的{@spell 粉碎音波}(DC 17)。鐵牙會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

entries.name: 穿雲裂石之音
entries: 當位於一個土元素節點內時，你可以施展一個名爲「穿雲裂石之音」的儀式，使用鐵牙製造一個{@item 毀滅法球(土)|PotA}。一旦你施展了這個儀式，鐵牙直到下次日出前都不能再被用於施展這個儀式。

entries.name: 缺陷
entries: 鐵牙放大了持用者的破壞衝動。當你與該武器同調時，你獲得以下缺陷：「我喜歡破壞東西，並造成毀滅。」

item.name: Ivana's Whisper
entries: This poison bears a distinct scent and chemical message from Ivana Boritsi. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or experience the effects of a {@spell dream} spell created by Ivana the next time they sleep. This poison is nonmagical, and Ivana doesn't directly communicate with those affected during the dream. Rather, she creates the illusion of speaking with her intended target by alchemically crafting her message, predicting her target's reactions, and chemically encoding in her responses. She wears this poison as a perfume or hides it within gift bouquets, allowing it to convey her message later.

item.name: Izzet Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Izzet, allows you to cast {@spell chaos bolt|XGE}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Izzet's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Izzet Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Izzet guild
entries: Formed of carved and polished red and blue stone, the keyrune includes bits of cable and wire. One end resembles a humanlike head, suggesting the jagged elemental form of the {@creature galvanice weird|GGR} that it can become for a duration of 3 hours. In this form, it will serve you as a bodyguard, lift and carry things for you, act as a test subject for your experiments, or aid you in any other way that its capabilities allow.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature galvanice weird|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 閃避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: 紅鋯石
entries: 焰橘色的透光寶石。

item.name: 翡翠
entries: 淺綠色、深綠色、或白色的透光寶石。

item.name: 翡翠棋盤和純金棋子
item.ENG_name: Jade game board with solid gold playing pieces

item.name: Jade Serpent Staff
entries: This staff is broken into five pieces, each worth 100 gp for the jade alone. The entire staff can be restored with {@spell 修復術} cantrips; each casting of the spell repairs one break in the staff. If the staff is made whole, it transforms from an object into an animated jade serpent that has the statistics of a {@creature giant poisonous snake}, with these changes:

items: The serpent is a construct that understands and obeys whoever was holding the staff when it transformed.
It has immunity to poison damage and the {@condition 中毒} condition. It doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

When it drops to 0 hit points, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1, the snake turns to dust and is destroyed. On any other roll, it changes back into a staff and breaks into {@dice 1d4 + 1} pieces that must be magically mended before the staff can be used again.

item.name: Jade totem with diamond eyes (River Heralds)

entries.items: Imprinted on this staff is a fragment of a dead wizard's personality. The first character who touches the staff gains the following flaw: "I crave power above all else, and will do anything to obtain more of it." This flaw trumps any conflicting personality trait.

item.name: 碧玉
entries: 藍色、黑色、或棕色的不透光寶石。

item.name: Javelin of Backbiting
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you throw it, its normal and long ranges both increase by 30 feet, and it deals one extra die of damage on a hit. After you throw it and it hits or misses, it flies back to your hand immediately.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell 移除詛咒} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, keeping it within reach at all times. In addition, you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll using this weapon, the weapon bends or flies to hit you in the back. Make a new attack roll with advantage against your own AC. If the result is a hit, you take damage as if you had attacked yourself with the javelin.

item.name: 閃電標槍
entries: 這個標槍是一把魔法武器。當你將它投出並說出它的命令語，它將轉變成一道閃電，並覆蓋一塊5尺寬，從你向距離120尺內一個目標延伸的直線範圍。除了你和目標以外，每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗將受到{@dice 4d6}閃電傷害，成功則只受到一半的傷害。這道閃電束將在到達目標時變回標槍。對該目標進行一次遠程武器攻擊。若命中，該目標將受到來自標槍的傷害加上{@dice 4d6}閃電傷害。
這把標槍的特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用，但這把標槍仍可已被作爲魔法武器使用。

item.name: 煤玉
entries: 深黑色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 珠寶匠工具
additionalEntries: 珠寶匠工具的培訓包括加工珠寶的基本技術，以及鑑定寶石的專業知識。

additionalEntries.name: 組件
entries: 珠寶匠工具包括一把小鋸、小錘、銼刀、鉗子，和鑷子。

additionalEntries.name: 奧祕
entries: 珠寶匠工具熟練項讓你能夠了解各種寶石的魔法用途。這一能力在你對寶石或鑲嵌寶石的物品進行{@skill 奧祕}檢定時很有用處。

additionalEntries.name: 調查
entries: 當你檢查珠寶類物件時，珠寶匠工具熟練項有助於你發現可能存在的線索。

additionalEntries.name: 鑑定寶石
entries: 你能很快鑑定出寶石的種類和價值。

additionalEntries.caption: 珠寶匠工具
rows: 寶石外觀加工
鑑定寶石歷史

item.name: 壺
entries: 一個壺可以容納1加侖的液體。

item.name: Junky +1 Dagger
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this dagger, which looks like junk. When it is used, its grip frays, its blade chips, and it flakes rust. If you get a natural 1 on an attack roll while wielding this weapon, it breaks and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: 龍骨船
entries: 龍骨船和划艇主要被用於湖泊和河川。若順流而行，將水流的速度（通常爲每小時3裏）加到這個載具的速度中。這些載具無法溯着任何顯著的逆流而行，但可以藉由岸邊的動物被拖到上游。

item.name: 卡夫統靈藥
entries: 這個直徑3寸的玻璃罐中裝有{@dice 1d4+1}劑濃厚混合物，帶有淡淡的蘆薈氣味。這個玻璃罐和它內容物共重1/2磅。
以一個動作，一劑藥膏可以被服用或外敷在肌膚上。接受其使用的生物將回復{@dice 2d8+2}點生命值，解除{@condition 中毒}狀態，且任何疾病都將被治癒。

item.name: Keycharm
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Warding
entries: This small stylized key plays a vital role in the work of House Kundarak. If you cast the {@spell 警報術}, {@spell 祕法鎖}, or {@spell 守衛銘文} spell, you can tie the effect to the keycharm so that whoever holds it receives the notification from the {@spell 警報術} spell, bypasses the lock of the {@spell 祕法鎖} spell, or avoids triggering the glyph placed by the {@spell 守衛銘文} spell. In addition, the holder (who needn't be attuned to the item) can take an action to end any one spell tied to it, provided the holder knows the command word you set for ending the tied spells. The keycharm can have up to three tied spells at one time.

item.name: Khrusor, Spear of Heliod
entries: Heliod wields Khrusor, a spear blessed with the power of the sun. In his hands, it can be pitched from Nyx to any point on Theros. When Heliod lends his weapon to a mortal, it's typically so they can perform some great work in his name or as a test of their worthiness.

entries.name: Spear of the Sun
entries: This spear grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using this spear, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Sun
entries: If you are a worshiper of Heliod, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 3+.
items.entry: You gain 15 temporary hit points each dawn.

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Heliod, the spear has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Luminous
entries: The spear sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The light is sunlight.

entries.name: Sun's Retaliation
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack with the spear against that creature. On a hit, the spear deals damage as normal, and the creature is {@condition 目盲} until the start of its next turn. This property of the spear can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The spear has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell 光導箭} (1 charge), {@spell 晝明術} (3 charges, targeting the tip of the spear only), {@spell 烈日光束} (6 charges). The spear regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Destroying the Spear
entries: If taken to Erebos's palace in Tizerus, and used to sacrifice a champion of Heliod to Erebos, Khrusor is either destroyed or fundamentally twisted to Erebos's service.

item.name: Knave's Eye Patch
entries: While wearing this eye patch, you gain these benefits:

items: You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill 察覺}) checks that rely on sight.
If you have the Sunlight Sensitivity trait, you are unaffected by the trait.
You are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts or determine whether you are lying. Creatures can communicate telepathically with you only if you allow it.

item.name: Korolnor Scepter
entries: The Korolnor Scepter is one of ten Ruling Scepters of Shanatar, forged by the dwarven gods and given to the ruling houses of the ancient dwarven empire. The Korolnor Scepter's location was unknown for the longest time until a {@creature storm giant} queen, Neri, found it in a barnacle-covered shipwreck at the bottom of the Trackless Sea. The Ruling Scepters are all roughly the same size and shape, but their materials and properties vary.

The Korolnor Scepter is a tapered mithral rod as thick and long as a dwarf's forearm, with a small platinum knob at the bottom and a rounded disk adorned with a ring of seven tiny blue gems at the top.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this scepter, which can be wielded as a magic club.

You can use the properties of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, as well as the properties of the scepter itself. The scepter has 10 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expanded charges at dawn. Its properties are as follows:

items: If you are underground or underwater, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to determine the distance to the surface.
As an action: you can expend 2 charges to cast the {@spell 短訊術} spell from the scepter.

As an action: you can expend 3 charges to cast the {@spell 傳送術} spell from the scepter. If the destination is within 60 feet of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, there is no chance of a teleport error or mishap occurring.

item.name: Kyrzin's Ooze
entries: This opalescent, symbiotic goo comes sealed in a jar and slowly shifts and moves, as if endlessly exploring the jar's interior. To attune to this item, you must first drink the contents of the jar, unlocking the following properties.

entries.name: Resistant
entries: While attuned to Kyrzin's ooze, you have resistance to poison and acid damage, and you're immune to the {@condition 中毒} condition.

entries.name: Amorphous
entries: As an action, you can speak a command word and cause your body to assume the amorphous qualities of an ooze. For the next minute, you (along with any equipment you're wearing or carrying) can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Once you use this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Acid Breath
entries: As an action, you can exhale acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Once you use this property, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The ooze can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the ooze ends, as it seeps out of you.
If you die while the ooze is inside you, it bursts out and engulfs you, turning your corpse into a {@creature black pudding} allied with the daelkyr.

item.name: 長梯(10尺)
entries: 長梯(10尺)

item.name: 油燈
entries: 一盞油燈會散發出15尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。一旦被點亮，每一扁瓶(1品脫)的{@item 燈油(扁瓶裝)|phb|燈油}都可以讓它燃燒持續6小時。

item.name: 顯像提燈
entries: 當被點亮，每1品脫的燈油都可以讓這盞{@item 附蓋提燈|phb}燃燒持續6小時，並散發出30尺半徑的明亮光照以及再延伸30尺的微光光照。處於這盞提燈明亮光照範圍內的{@condition 隱形}生物和物體將變得可見。你可以使用一個動作降下燈蓋，將光照減弱爲5尺半徑的微光光照。

item.name: Lantern of Tracking
entries: This hooded lantern burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil, shedding bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

Each lantern of tracking is designed to track down a certain type of creature, which is determined by rolling on the Lantern of Tracking table. Once determined, this creature type can't be changed. While the lantern is within 300 feet of any creature of that type, its flame turns bright green. The lantern doesn't pinpoint the creature's exact location, however.

entries.caption: Lantern of Tracking
rows: Aberrations
Celestials
Constructs
Dragons
Elementals
Fey
Fiends
Giants
Monstrosities
Undead

item.name: 青金石
entries: 帶黃斑深淺藍混色的不透光寶石。

item.name: Lash of Shadows
entries: This snakeskin whip is touched by the power of Zehir and ends in five animated serpent heads.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Lash of Shadows is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 18, a Wisdom of 16, and a Charisma of 20. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Draconic.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A mad {@creature marilith} named Sizlifeth lives within the Lash of Shadows. The weapon has a short temper and experiences only extreme emotions. It is most happy when dealing harm.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The whip grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal and Draconic.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

You can attempt to poison any creature that is hit by the whip. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer the effect of one of the following poisons of your choice; once a poison other than Serpent Venom has been used, that poison can't be used again until the next dawn:

items.name: Dead Eyes.
items.entry: A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison is {@condition 中毒} for 1 hour. While {@condition 中毒} in this way, the creature is {@condition 目盲}.

items.name: Serpent Venom.
items.entry: A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison takes {@damage 3d6} poison damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the whip reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poisons increases to 15.

The weapon gains a new poison option called Ghoul's Blood. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison is {@condition 中毒} for 1 minute. While {@condition 中毒} in this way, the creature is {@condition 麻痹}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the whip reaches an exalted state, it gains the following additional properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poisons increases to 17.

The weapon gains a new poison option called Cockatrice Tears. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison begins to turn to stone and is {@condition 束縛}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition 石化} for 24 hours.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Leather Golem Armor
entries: Strange rituals have repurposed the body of a flesh golem into this partially sentient suit of leather armor. While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells and other magical effects. In addition, you gain the following properties:

items.name: Immutable Form
entries: You are immune to any spell or effect that would alter your form.

items.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: You gain resistance to lightning damage. Whenever you take lightning damage, you gain 5 temporary hit points.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This armor is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a remove curse spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the armor. In addition, while you wear the cursed armor, you gain the following properties:

items.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If you take fire damage, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever a critical hit is made against you, roll a d6. On a 6, the armor causes you to go berserk. On each of your turns while berserk, you attack the nearest creature you can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, you attack an object, with preference for an object smaller than yourself. Once the armor causes you to go berserk, it cannot be removed. You continue to attack until you are incapacitated or until another creature is able to calm you with appropriate magic (such as a calm emotions spell) or a successful DC 15 Charisma ({@skill 說服}) check.

item.name: 皮匠工具
additionalEntries: 皮革加工的知識還包括獸皮特性、皮革盔甲和類似物品的學識。

additionalEntries.name: 組件
entries: 皮匠工具包括一把小刀、一柄小木槌、一臺磨邊機、一個打孔器、一個紡錘，以及一些皮革碎料。

additionalEntries.name: 奧祕
entries: 皮匠工具熟練項在你檢查皮製魔法物品，如鞋子和部分斗篷時提供額外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 調查
entries: 當你研究皮製物品或與之相關的線索時，你具有額外的洞察力，因爲你對於皮革的專業知識能夠發現他人忽略的細節。

additionalEntries.name: 鑑定皮革
entries: 當你檢查皮革物品時，你能分辨出皮料的種類以及運用的特殊工藝。例如，你能分辨出矮人制革工藝與半身人制革工藝的不同。

additionalEntries.caption: 皮匠工具
rows: 皮革外觀加工
檢定皮革製品的歷史

item.name: 靈肉聖契
entries: 這本書的封面制以人皮，飾以白骨，觸摸時手感冰涼，併發出微微低語。這本書在被找到時，包含了以下法術： {@spell 活化死屍}, {@spell 死亡之環}, {@spell 摹造生命}, {@spell 死亡一指}, {@spell 死者交談術}, {@spell 亡靈召喚術|TCE} 和 {@spell 吸血鬼之觸}。你可以將其作爲法術書。
當你持握這本書時，你可以將其作爲你法師法術的法器。
書具有3發充能，且每天黎明時恢復 {@dice 1d3} 發已消耗的充能。你持握它時，可以通過以下方式消耗充能：

items: 如果你花費1分鐘時間研究這本書，你可以消耗1發充能來將你的一道已準備法術替換爲書中的另一道法術。新法術必須是死靈學派的法術。
作爲一個動作，你可以消耗1發充能並僞裝成亡靈10分鐘。在持續時間內，你外表上如同死者，並且不死生物會忽略你，除非你傷害它們。面對所有的外部檢查和偵測法術時，你也只會被顯示爲不死生物。此效應在你造成傷害或使一個生物進行豁免檢定時結束。

item.name: 命源刺青
entries: 該魔法刺青用一根特殊的針製作，繪有生命與重生的符號。

entries.name: 刺青同調
entries: 同調此物品時，你需要將針持握，並抵在你想要讓刺青出現的那處皮膚上。當同調完成時，針頭會化爲墨水再變成刺青。若你與刺青的同調結束，刺青會消失，針頭會再次出現在你的位置中。

entries.name: 黯蝕抗性
entries: 你獲得對黯蝕傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 生命結界
entries: 當你生命值降至0時，改爲生命值降至1。使用後，直到下次黎明前，此屬性不能再次使用。

item.name: Lifewell Tattoo
entries: This tattoo comprises symbols of life and rebirth. While this tattoo is on your skin, you have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Death Ward
entries: When you would be reduced to 0 hit points, you drop to 1 hit point instead. Once used, this benefit can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Lightbringer
entries: This +1 mace was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and made of solid brass. Named Lightbringer, this weapon glows as bright as a {@item torch|phb} when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra {@dice 1d6} radiant damage to undead creatures.

item.name: 閃電吸收刺青
entries: {#itemEntry 吸收刺青|TCE}

item.name: Living Gloves
entries: These symbiotic gloves—made of thin chitin and sinew—pulse with a life of their own. To attune to them, you must wear them for the entire attunement period, during which the gloves bond with your skin.
While attuned to these gloves, you gain one of the following proficiencies (your choice when you attune to the gloves):

items: {@skill 巧手}
{@item 盜賊工具|phb}
One kind of artisan's tools of your choice
One kind of musical instrument of your choice

entries: When you make an ability check using the chosen proficiency, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The gloves can't be removed from you while you're attuned to them, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to them. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the gloves ends, and they can be removed.

item.name: Living Loot Satchel
entries: As a rank 2 hoardsperson, you are granted the use of a living loot satchel, which is an uncommon magic item. It functions as a {@item bag of holding} and is available in a variety of colors and styles.

entries.caption: Class-Based Living Loot Satchel
rows: Barbarian
Broad belt with a dozen hanging pockets
Bard
Lute case
Cleric
Hollowed-out holy tome
Druid
Made from natural, organic, locally sourced woven fibers
Fighter
A thick, battle-scarred iron lockbox
Paladin
A metal case with fine engraving and scrollwork
Ranger
A fur-lined bindle
Rogue
A nondescript coin pouch
Sorcerer
A battered leather satchel, prone to spitting out multicolored sparks at the seams
Warlock
A patchwork monster-leather satchel with a "purely decorative" fanged mouth.
Wizard
A pocket dimension hidden up your sleeve or inside your hat

entries: The living loot satchel is a kind of magical being that safeguards the franchise's funds and valuables. Its innards are connected to a secure coffer within Head Office's vault in Waterdeep, to which the satchel periodically transfers the franchise's wealth. As an action, you can transfer any amount of your franchise funds back to your satchel with a successful DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill 巧手}) check.

entries.name: Secret Satchel
entries: As a rank 3 hoardsperson, your living loot satchel gets an upgrade to function as the replica chest used for the {@spell 李歐蒙祕藏箱} spell, becoming a rare magic item. You can open the secret chest through your living loot satchel to deposit or withdraw items—even items that wouldn't normally fit in your satchel, but which fit within the chest. Thanks to Head Office striking deals you don't want to know about with extraplanar creatures you really don't want to know about, there is no chance for the spell to end.

entries.name: That Thing You Need
entries: At rank 3, you can use a bonus action to reach into your living loot satchel and make a DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill 巧手}) check. On a success, you draw forth an item of your choice on the Adventuring Gear table in chapter 5 of the Player's Handbook. The item must be of a size that can fit into your secret chest and be worth no more than 15 gp. Once you attempt to draw five items from your satchel, you cannot draw forth any more items until the next dawn.

entries.name: Portable Hole Satchel
entries: At rank 4, your living loot satchel receives another upgrade, becoming a very rare magic item. The secret chest accessed by your satchel now has the storage capacity of a {@item portable hole}—6 feet in diameter and 10 feet deep. As before, you can place any appropriately sized object into the portable-hole-sized chest, even if it wouldn't normally fit into your satchel.

entries.name: That Expensive Thing You Need
entries: Also at rank 4, when you use your That Thing You Need feature, you can requisition any item of up to 250 gp in value, as long as it would fit into the confines of your satchel's portable hole.

item.name: Loadstone
entries: This stone is a large gem worth 150 gp.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The stone is cursed, but its magical nature is hidden; {@spell 偵測魔法} doesn't detect it. An {@spell 鑑定術} spell reveals the stone's true nature. If you use the Dash or Disengage action while the stone is on your person, its curse activates. Until the curse is broken with {@spell 移除詛咒} or similar magic, your speed is reduced by 5 feet, and your maximum load and maximum lift capacities are halved. You also become unwilling to part with the stone.

item.name: 鎖
entries: 這道鎖會附有一把鑰匙。一個熟練於{@item 盜賊工具}的生物可以不使用該鑰匙，而藉由成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷檢定將鎖打開。你的DM可以決定是否有更好的鎖在市面上以更高的價格販售。

item.name: 詭詐之鎖
entries: 這道鎖看起來就如同尋常的鎖（如同《玩家手冊》第五章所描述的類型）且附有一把鑰匙。這道鎖內部的反轉齒輪將通過魔法調整以阻撓竊賊將它打開。用以解開這道鎖所進行的敏捷檢定將具有劣勢。

item.name: Longhorn
entries: A Faerûnian flute of sophisticated make, found only in areas with skilled artisans, as in great cities or elven enclaves.

item.name: Lord's Ensemble
item.reqAttune: by a creature with a humanoid build
entries: The Masked Lords of Waterdeep don this ensemble when meeting with one another. This raiment renders each lord indistinguishable from the others. The ensemble consists of three pieces—a helm, an amulet, and a robe—that function as a single magic item when worn together, but only within the city of Waterdeep and its sewers. You become attuned to the ensemble as a single item.

entries.name: Lord's Helm
entries: This bucket helm covers your head and conceals your face. Screens over the eyes help to shroud your identity without blinding you. While you wear the helm, your voice is magically altered to sound genderless, and you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, to determine whether you are lying, to know your alignment, or to know your creature type. Creatures can communicate telepathically with you only if you allow it.

entries.name: Lord's Amulet
entries: This amulet bears the crest of Waterdeep. It functions as an {@item amulet of proof against detection and location}.

entries.name: Lord's Robe
entries: This elegant robe functions as a {@item ring of free action}, and it creates the illusion that you have a nondescript, androgynous humanoid build and stand 6 feet tall.

item.name: 貝希默的失落王冠
entries: 這頂矮人戰盔是一頂堅固的開面式鋼盔，額頭上方裝飾着一個金色的圓環，上面有七根金色的尖刺冠。當你穿戴這頂王冠時，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你具有對心靈傷害的抗性。
你在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定上具有優勢。
你可以使用一個附贈動作來激勵一個距離你60尺內，你所能看見且能構看見或聽見你的生物。在你下個回合結束前，被激勵的生物可以擲一顆{@dice d6}，並將骰出來的數字加到它所進行的一次屬性檢定、攻擊檢定、或豁免檢定中。這麼做將消耗這頂王冠的1發充能。這頂王冠含有3發充能，且會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Lost Sword
entries: The Lost Sword is a sentient lawful good {@item +1 shortsword} (Intelligence 11, Wisdom 13, Charisma 13). It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 120 feet. It communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it.
The sword's purpose is to fight evil. The sword has the following additional properties:

items: The sword continually sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. Only by destroying the sword can this light be extinguished.
A lawful good creature can attune itself to the sword in 1 minute.
While attuned to the weapon, the sword's wielder can use the sword to cast the {@spell 十字軍斗篷} spell. Once used, this property of the sword can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: 魯芭的靈魂塔羅卡
entries: 並非所有逗留於世的靈魂都是迷失在通往死後國度之路上的悲慘靈魂。有些靈魂失去活力，成爲了囚徒；它們是如此邪惡，以至於凡人不敢將它們釋放到那毫無戒心的來世。

作爲由維斯塔尼傳說中的人物創造的物品，{@i 魯芭的靈魂塔羅卡}塑造了無數英雄的命運。這套牌作出的預言也揭示了巨大的邪惡，引導它的創造者走入邪惡勢力的道路。牌組的創造者，魯芭夫人，依靠着她敏銳的直覺無數次僥倖逃離了自己的毀滅。但就算是她也無法躲過所有的邪惡。在最危急的關頭，魯芭夫人設法用命運的絲線封印住這些至惡的存在，將它們囚禁在了這套塔羅卡中。這些邪惡的靈魂被困於隱藏在卡牌洗混翻轉之中的下界空間內，靜靜地等待着命運本身也被玷污的那一天——這一天絕對會到來的。
和所有的 {@i Tarokka of Souls} 一樣，靈魂塔羅卡是由五十四張插畫精美的卡片組成的，包含十四張至高牌以及四十張被分爲錢幣，雕文，星星和寶劍四個套組的其他卡牌。

entries.name: 隨機屬性
entries: 這件神器具有以下隨機屬性，你可以通過對着{@book 《城主指南》|DMG}中的"神器"章節擲骰以決定它們:

items: 兩項 {@table 神器屬性; 弱效減益屬性|dmg|弱效減益} 屬性
兩項 {@table 神器屬性; 弱效增益屬性|dmg|弱效增益} 屬性

entries.name: 法術
entries: 持握牌組時，你可以用一個動作用牌組施展以下法術（豁免DC 18）： {@spell 通曉語言}, {@spell 偵測善惡}, {@spell 偵測魔法}, {@spell 偵測毒素或疾病}, {@spell 物品定位術} 或 {@spell 探知}。一旦你用牌組施展了某個法術，你在下一個黎明前不能再次施展該法術。

entries.name: 持久之視
entries: 持握牌組時，你爲維持 {@spell 預言術} 的專注所作的體質豁免檢定自動成功。

entries.name: 編織命運
entries: 以一個動作，你可以從牌組中抽出一張卡，從而編織15尺內你能看見的另一個生物的命運。從以下效應中選擇一項：

items.name: 幸福
items.entry: 在接下來的一小時內，該生物在攻擊檢定，屬性檢定和豁免檢定上具有優勢。

items.name: 災禍
items.entry: 在接下來的一小時內，該生物在攻擊檢定，屬性檢定和豁免檢定上具有劣勢。

items: 牌組可以如此被使用兩次，你在下一個黎明時分重獲所有已使用的次數。

entries.name: 命運的囚徒
entries: 每當你使用編織命運特性時，都有可能導致被囚禁的靈魂之一逃脫。骰一次 {@dice d100} 來對照塔羅卡中的靈魂表格。如果你骰出了至高牌之一，和它相關的靈魂就會逃脫。你可以在怪物圖鑑中找到它的數據。如果你骰出的靈魂已經逃脫了，則重骰。

entries.caption: 靈魂塔羅卡
rows: 神器Artifact
{@creature Flameskull}
野獸Beast
{@creature 縛靈}
崩毀之人Broken one
{@creature 女妖}

無辜者Innocent
{@creature 幽魂}

{@creature 木乃伊}

{@creature 縛靈}

{@creature 吸血鬼眷族}

entries: 被釋放的靈魂出現在距離你{@dice 10d10}裏以內的一個隨機地點，並開始恐嚇活着的生物。直至逃脫的靈魂被摧毀之前，它獲得牌組的編織命運特性中的幸福的效應，並且你和編織命運的原本的目標都獲得編織命運特性中的災禍的效應。

entries.name: 重洗命運
entries: 如果你在七日內沒有使用編織命運特性，你與{@i 魯芭的靈魂塔羅卡}的同調結束，並且你不能再次與之同調，直至另一個生物對你使用牌組的編織命運特性。

entries.name: 摧毀牌組
entries: {@i 魯芭的靈魂塔羅卡可以被摧毀}，前提是所有被囚禁的靈魂都被釋放並摧毀。這會揭示第十五個靈魂——一位巫妖的存在。它居住在下界卡之中，這張卡只有在其他十四個靈魂都被摧毀後纔會出現。如果巫妖被摧毀，下界卡隨之消失，靈魂塔羅卡變爲一套普通的塔羅卡，不再具有任何特性，不過其中包含了一張由DM設計的新卡。

entries.name: 魯芭夫人與維斯塔尼人
entries: 魂之塔羅卡的創造者魯芭夫人曾是維斯塔尼人中最有影響力的領導者之一。在無數個時代裏，維斯塔尼人遊蕩於墮影冥界之中，其中包括瞭如同被吸血鬼所困擾的領域——巴洛維亞之類的恐懼半位面。這些旅行者們知曉關於這些領域的許多祕密，遭遇過無數其他遊蕩於墮影冥界之驚懼中的事物。絕大多數維斯塔尼部族接受以不同方式旅行、不同出身的善意旅行者，他們歡迎那些想要在無盡路途中，在迷霧之後的朦朧幻象中覓得一處家園的人。

作爲一名半身人維斯塔尼人，魯芭夫人領導着墮影冥界中最大的一支維斯塔尼部族。她來自施特拉德伯爵與伊娃夫人所來自的相同的世界，而她創造了一個善良的、堅韌的社區——在陰影位面之中極爲少見。她帶着她的族人歡迎着旅行者，爲飢餓者提供食物，反抗着殘忍之人。她與伊娃夫人曾是友人，直到伊娃夫人與那些屬於黑夜的生物做起了交易。"我們或許會與陰影之中游蕩，"魯芭夫人說，"但我們必須成爲那些與我們同樣在陰影中游蕩的旅行者們的希望之光。"
數年之前，魯芭夫人消失在了迷霧之中，僅僅留下了魂之塔羅卡。有人說若你抽出了"迷霧"之卡，你就能聽到她善意的耳語聲。

item.name: Lute crafted of exotic wood with mother-of-pearl inlay and zircon gems (Brazen Coalition)
Luxon Beacon
entries: This dodecahedron of faintly glowing crystal is heavier than it appears. A set of handles are affixed to its sides, and it pulsates and thrums when touched.

entries.name: Fragment of Possibility
entries: A creature that touches the beacon and concentrates for 1 minute receives a Fragment of Possibility, which looks like a Tiny, grayish bead of energy that follows the creature around, staying within 1 foot of it at all times. The fragment lasts for 8 hours or until used. Once the beacon grants a Fragment of Possibility, it can't grant another until the next dawn. A creature with a Fragment of Possibility from a Luxon Beacon can't gain another Fragment of Possibility from any source.

When a creature with a Fragment of Possibility makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can expend its fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternatively, when an attack roll is made against the creature, it can expend its fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one it rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
If the original {@dice d20} roll has advantage or disadvantage, the creature rolls its {@dice d20} after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.

entries.name: Soul Snare
entries: If a follower of the Luxon who has undergone a ritual of consecution dies within 100 miles of a Luxon Beacon, their soul is ensnared by it. This soul will be reincarnated within the body of a random humanoid baby developing within 100 miles of the beacon.

item.name: 建築里拉琴
entries: 當持握這把{@item lyre|PHB}時，你可以用一個動作施展 {@spell 修復術}。當一個距離你300尺內的{@item lyre|PHB}或建築受到傷害時，你也可以用一個反應彈奏這把里拉琴，使其免疫該此次傷害以及其他同類型傷害，直到你的下個回合開始。
此外，你可以用一個動作彈奏這把{@item lyre|PHB}以施展 {@spell 鬼斧神工}, {@spell 地動術}, {@spell 穿牆術} 或 {@spell 構裝體召喚術|TCE}，直到下次黎明前，這個法術不能再以此法施展。

item.name: 瓦解之錘
entries: 當你以這把魔法武器命中一個邪魔或不死生物時，該生物將受到額外的{@dice 2d6}光耀傷害。若該目標在承受該傷害之後剩下25點或更低的生命值，則它必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則將被摧毀。若豁免成功，該生物將因你而陷入{@condition 恐懼}狀態，持續直到你的下個回合結束。
當你持握這把武器時，它將散發出20尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸20尺的微光光照。

item.name: 打擊之錘
entries: 你在使用這把魔法武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+1加值。當你使用這把硬頭錘攻擊一個構裝體時，這個加值將增加至+3。
當你在以這把武器進行的攻擊檢定中骰出了20，目標將受到額外的7點鈍擊傷害，或若目標爲構裝體，則爲額外的14點鈍擊傷害。若一個構裝體在承受該傷害之後剩下25點或更低的生命值，則它將被摧毀。

item.name: 恐懼之錘
entries: 這把魔法武器含有3發充能。當持握它時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗1發充能以釋放出一股恐懼波動。每個距離你30尺內且你所選擇的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則因你而陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。當它因這個方式而陷入{@condition 恐懼}時，該生物必須花費它的動作以儘可能的移動遠離你，且無法自願移動到距離你30尺內的空間。它也無法採取反應。它唯一能採取的動作只有{@action 疾走}動作，或是嘗試從防止它移動的效果中逃脫。若它無處可逃，則該生物可以使用{@action 閃避}動作。在它的每個回合結束時，該生物可以重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。
這把硬頭錘會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Mace of the Black Crown
entries: This mace has a haft of black iron and a ruby head with a fiendish countenance. Carrying the boon of Asmodeus, it is fit for the most powerful servants of the Nine Hells.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Mace of the Black Crown is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 20, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common and Infernal.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A greedy {@creature erinyes} named Xartaza lives within the Mace of the Black Crown. Xartaza wants to recruit more souls for Asmodeus, so the weapon pushes its wielder toward lawful evil actions by manipulating the wielder's dreams. A former Blood War general, Xartaza hates demons and relishes crafting sound battle plans in any conflict.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The mace grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Infernal.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

While holding the mace, you can use a bonus action to speak its Infernal command word, causing flames to erupt from the head. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the mace is ablaze, it deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you are no longer holding the mace.

While holding the mace, you can use an action to summon an {@creature imp}. Any devil you summon with this mace is friendly to you and your companions for the duration. The imp obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it and returns to the Nine Hells 10 minutes after you summoned it. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the mace reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 2d6}.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature bearded devil}.
You have resistance to poison damage while holding this weapon.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the mace reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 3d6}. Fire damage dealt by the mace ignores resistance to fire damage.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature barbed devil}.
You have resistance to fire damage while you hold this weapon.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Macuahuitl
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this longsword, which is made of laminated wood, and inset with jagged teeth of obsidian. It deals an extra {@dice 2d6} damage to any creature of the plant type.

item.name: Maddgoth's Helm
entries: While you wear this helm and are inside Maddgoth's castle, on its roof, or in its courtyard, you have immunity to all damage. If the helm is taken from the castle, it turns to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: 放大鏡
entries: 這面透鏡可以助你看清楚小東西。它也可以在生火時用來代替碎石和打火鐵。使用放大鏡生火需要聚焦如同陽光一般明亮的光線、可以點燃的火種、以及大約5分鐘的時間以點燃火焰。一面放大鏡可以讓你在任何用以評估或審視小型或精細物體的屬性檢定中獲得優勢。

item.name: 孔雀石
entries: 帶紋深淺綠混色的不透光寶石。

item.name: 怨恨
entries: 受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態長達1小時。陷入中毒狀態的生物同時也將陷入{@condition 目盲}狀態。

item.name: 鐐銬
entries: 這組金屬拘束器可以束縛住小型或中型的生物。從鐐銬中逃脫需要成功通過一次DC 20的敏捷檢定。破壞它們則需要成功通過一次DC 20的力量檢定。每一組鐐銬都附有一把鑰匙。一個熟練於{@item 盜賊工具}的生物可以不使用該鑰匙，而藉由成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷檢定將鐐銬的鎖打開。鐐銬具有15點生命值。

item.name: 法術抗性披肩
entries: 當你穿戴這件斗篷時，你在對抗法術的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

item.name: 強身健體手冊
entries: 這本書記載着關於健康和飲食的訣竅，且它的文本充滿着魔力。若你在6天或更短的期間內花費了總共48小時的時間研讀這本書的內容，並實踐它的指示，則你的體質值和體質值上限都將增加2點。這本手冊接着將失去它的魔力，並在一個世紀之後恢復。

item.name: 黏土魔像手冊
entries: 這本手冊記載着製造特定種類魔像所需要的知識和咒語。其種類由DM選擇或隨機決定。你必須要是一名擁有至少二個5環法術位的施法者，才能夠解讀並使用這本手冊。一個無法使用魔像手冊，但嘗試閱讀它的生物將受到{@dice 6d6}心靈傷害。
要製造一個{@creature 黏土魔像}，你必須消耗30天的時間，在不受打擾的情況下工作，手持着這本手冊且每天不能休息超過8小時。你同時必須花費65,000金幣以購買其所需的物資。一但你完成該魔像的製造，這本書將會在一陣魔焰中被消耗。當這本手冊燒成的灰燼撒在該魔像身上，它將會隨之活化。它將處於你的控制下，且它能理解並服從你的口頭命令。

item.name: 血肉魔像手冊
entries: 這本手冊記載着製造特定種類魔像所需要的知識和咒語。其種類由DM選擇或隨機決定。你必須要是一名擁有至少二個5環法術位的施法者，才能夠解讀並使用這本手冊。一個無法使用魔像手冊，但嘗試閱讀它的生物將受到{@dice 6d6}心靈傷害。
要製造一個{@creature 血肉魔像}，你必須消耗60天的時間，在不受打擾的情況下工作，手持着這本手冊且每天不能休息超過8小時。你同時必須花費50,000金幣以購買其所需的物資。一但你完成該魔像的製造，這本書將會在一陣魔焰中被消耗。當這本手冊燒成的灰燼撒在該魔像身上，它將會隨之活化。它將處於你的控制下，且它能理解並服從你的口頭命令。

item.name: 增益鍛鍊手冊
entries: 這本書記載着如何適當的鍛鍊的訣竅，且它的文本充滿着魔力。若你在6天或更短的期間內花費了總共48小時的時間研讀這本書的內容，並實踐它的指示，則你的力量值和力量值上限都將增加2點。這本手冊接着將失去它的魔力，並在一個世紀之後恢復。

item.name: 鋼鐵魔像手冊
entries: 這本手冊記載着製造特定種類魔像所需要的知識和咒語。其種類由DM選擇或隨機決定。你必須要是一名擁有至少二個5環法術位的施法者，才能夠解讀並使用這本手冊。一個無法使用魔像手冊，但嘗試閱讀它的生物將受到{@dice 6d6}心靈傷害。
要製造一個{@creature 鋼鐵魔像}，你必須消耗120天的時間，在不受打擾的情況下工作，手持着這本手冊且每天不能休息超過8小時。你同時必須花費100,000金幣以購買其所需的物資。一但你完成該魔像的製造，這本書將會在一陣魔焰中被消耗。當這本手冊燒成的灰燼撒在該魔像身上，它將會隨之活化。它將處於你的控制下，且它能理解並服從你的口頭命令。

item.name: 迅捷行動手冊
entries: 這本書記載着如何協調和平衡運動的訣竅，且它的文本充滿着魔力。若你在6天或更短的期間內花費了總共48小時的時間研讀這本書的內容，並實踐它的指示，則你的敏捷值和敏捷值上限都將增加2點。這本手冊接着將失去它的魔力，並在一個世紀之後恢復。

item.name: 石魔像手冊
entries: 這本手冊記載着製造特定種類魔像所需要的知識和咒語。其種類由DM選擇或隨機決定。你必須要是一名擁有至少二個5環法術位的施法者，才能夠解讀並使用這本手冊。一個無法使用魔像手冊，但嘗試閱讀它的生物將受到{@dice 6d6}心靈傷害。
要製造一個{@creature 石魔像}，你必須消耗90天的時間，在不受打擾的情況下工作，手持着這本手冊且每天不能休息超過8小時。你同時必須花費80,000金幣以購買其所需的物資。一但你完成該魔像的製造，這本書將會在一陣魔焰中被消耗。當這本手冊燒成的灰燼撒在該魔像身上，它將會隨之活化。它將處於你的控制下，且它能理解並服從你的口頭命令。

item.name: 地圖或卷軸筒
entries: 這個圓筒狀的皮套可以容納最多10張捲起的紙或5張捲起的羊皮紙。

item.name: Marble font with gold inlay (Legion of Dusk)
Mask of the Beast
entries: This wooden mask is shaped in the likeness of a beast's visage and has 3 charges. While wearing the mask you can expend 1 charge and use the mask to cast the {@spell 化獸爲友} spell as an action. The mask regains all expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Mask of the Dragon Queen
entries: Individually, the five dragon masks resemble the dragons they are named for. When two or more of the dragon masks are assembled, however, they transform magically into the Mask of the Dragon Queen. Each mask shrinks to become the modeled head of a chromatic dragon, appearing to roar its devotion to {@creature Tiamat|RoT} where all the masks brought together are arranged crown-like on the wearer's head. Below the five masks, a new mask shapes itself, granting the wearer a draconic visage that covers the face, neck, and shoulders.

While you are attuned to and wear this mask, you can have any of the properties from any one mask. Additionally, you gain the Damage Absorption from each of the five dragon masks, and you gain five uses of the Legendary Resistance property.

item.name: 泥瓦匠工具
additionalEntries: 泥瓦匠工具允許你製造石質或磚制建築。

additionalEntries.name: 組件
entries: 泥瓦匠工具包括泥刀、錘子、鑿子、刷子、和角尺。

additionalEntries.name: 歷史
entries: 你的專業知識有助於你確定一座石質建築的建造日期和用途，以及可能是誰建造了它。

additionalEntries.name: 調查
entries: 當你檢查石質建築中的區域時，你具有額外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 察覺
entries: 你可以在石牆或地板上發現不規則的地方，從而更容易找到陷阱門和祕密通道。

additionalEntries.name: 拆遷
entries: 你對磚石結構的知識可以讓你發現牆壁的薄弱點。你的武器攻擊會對這種建築造成雙倍傷害。

additionalEntries.caption: Mason's Tools
rows: 在石牆上開個小洞
找出石牆的薄弱點

item.name: 僞裝刺青
entries: 該魔法刺青用一根特殊的針製作，顯現爲你所想要的樣子。

entries.name: 刺青同調
entries: 同調此物品時，你需要將針持握，並抵在你想要讓刺青出現的那處皮膚上。當同調完成時，針頭會化爲墨水再變成刺青。若你與刺青的同調結束，刺青會消失，針頭會再次出現在你的位置中。

entries.name: 液態油墨
entries: 作爲一個附贈動作，你可以將刺青變爲任意顏色或圖紋，並移動到你皮膚上的任意區域。無論其有着什麼形態，它看起來總是一個刺青。它的尺寸最小可爲一枚銅幣，大則可覆蓋你的全身。

entries.name: 易容自我
entries: 作爲一個動作，你可以使用刺青施展 {@spell 易容術} 法術（識破DC 13）。使用刺青施展這道法術後，直到下次黎明前，不能再次用刺青施展。

item.name: Masquerade Tattoo
entries: This tattoo appears on your skin as whatever you desire. As a bonus action, you can shape the tattoo into any color or pattern and move it to any area of your skin. Whatever form it takes, it is always obviously a tattoo. It can range in size from no smaller than a copper piece to an intricate work of art that covers all your skin.

entries.name: Disguise Self
entries: As an action, you can use the tattoo to cast the {@spell 易容術} spell. Once the spell is cast from the tattoo, it can't be cast from the tattoo again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Master's Amulet
entries: Every {@creature shield guardian} has an amulet magically linked to it. A shield guardian can have only one corresponding amulet, and if that amulet is destroyed, the shield guardian is {@condition incapacitated} until a replacement amulet is created. A shield guardian's amulet is subject to direct attack if it isn't being worn or carried. It has AC 10, 10 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Crafting an amulet requires 1 week and costs 1,000 gp in components.

A shield guardian's solitary focus is to protect the amulet's wearer. The amulet's wearer can command the guardian to attack its enemies or to guard the wielder against attack. If an attack threatens to injure the wearer, the construct can magically absorb the blow into its own body, even at a distance.

A spellcaster can store a single spell within a shield guardian, which can then cast the spell on command or under specific conditions. Many a wizard has been rendered helpless by enemies, only to surprise those foes when its shield guardian unleashes potent magical power.

item.name: Masterpiece painting in mahogany frame with gold inlay (Legion of Dusk)
Mastix, Whip of Erebos
entries: Erebos wields Mastix, a whip capable of extending like an impossibly long shadow. In the hands of the god of the dead, the whip snares the reluctant dead and drags them into his realm. When Erebos grants his weapon to a mortal follower, it's typically to reclaim a powerful soul or to humiliate Heliod.

entries.name: Whip of the Dead
entries: Erebos's whip seethes with the enervating energy of the Underworld. This magic whip grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using this whip, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Additionally, when you make an attack with the whip on your turn, you can increase the range of the attack to 300 feet. This property of the weapon can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Blessing of the Dead
entries: If you are a worshiper of Erebos, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 1+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property—a burden Erebos imposes to test his faithful.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Erebos, the whip has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Erebos's Claim
entries: While carrying the whip, you can use an action to cast either {@spell 死亡之環} or {@spell 支配怪物} (targeting only undead) from the whip. The save DC for these spells is 18. Once you use the whip to cast a spell, that spell can't be cast from it again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Whip
entries: To destroy the whip, it must be taken to the heights of Mount Hiastos in Nyx, unraveled by a Returned, and left to bask in continual daylight for one month.

item.name: Matalotok
entries: Matalotok, the Frost Father, is an ancient hammer fashioned by Thrym, the god of frost giants. The favored weapon of the demon lord {@creature Kostchtchie|BGDIA}, Matalotok is frigid to the touch and wreathed in mist.

You are immune to cold damage while holding Matalotok. Whenever it deals damage to a creature, the hammer radiates a burst of intense cold in a 30-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) cold damage.

item.name: Matchless Pipe
entries: A switch made of flint is built into the bowl of this fine wooden smoking pipe. With a few flicks of the switch, the pipe lights itself.

item.name: 讀心勳章
entries: 這枚勳章含有3發充能。當配戴它時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗1發充能以從它施放{@spell 偵測思想}法術（豁免DC 13）。這枚勳章會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。

item.name: Menga leaves (1 ounce)
entries: The dried leaves of a menga bush can be ground, dissolved in a liquid, heated, and ingested. A creature that ingests 1 ounce of menga leaves in this fashion regains 1 hit point. A creature that ingests more than 5 ounces of menga leaves in a 24-hour period gains no additional benefit and must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition 昏迷} for 1 hour. The {@condition 昏迷} creature awakens if it takes at least 5 damage on one turn.
A healthy menga bush usually has {@dice 2d6} ounces of leaves. Once picked, the leaves require 1 day to dry out before they can confer any benefit.

item.name: 商用天秤
entries: 一副天秤包括了秤、盤面、以及總重最多2磅的各式砝碼。你可以使用天秤精準地測量小型物體的重量，像是貴金屬或貿易商品，以幫助你判定它們的價值。

item.name: 野炊工具組
entries: 這個錫盒內裝有一個杯子和一組簡單的餐具。這個盒子兩面被鉗在一起，且其中一面可以被當作烹飪鍋、而另一面則作爲餐盤或淺碗被使用。

item.name: 午夜之淚
entries: 服用這種毒藥的生物不會受到任何影響，直到午夜的鐘聲響起。若此毒藥在這之前尚未被中和，該生物將必須進行一次DC 17的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到31 ({@dice 9d6})毒素傷害，若豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

item.name: 琉克歐的非凡機僕
entries: {@creature Mighty Servant of Leuk-o|TCE} 是一臺具有非凡的力量，身高10尺的機器，以使用它的那位臭名昭著的軍閥命名，當有人駕駛時，它會變成一個活化的構裝生物。它的身軀由一種來歷不明的黑色合金打造，在常見的描述中，它就像一個比例失調的矮人和一隻巨型甲蟲的結合。機僕內部的空間足夠容納1噸的載重和一個內置的艙室，兩個中型生物能夠從這裏控制它——並帶來一場勢不可擋的毀滅。
關於機僕來歷的傳說更多僅是猜測而非事實，其中通常會提及異界的存在，奧斯世界神祕的屏障峯，以及被稱爲"{@i Machine of Lum the Mad}）"的相關裝置。關於這臺裝置的起源和操作的細節能夠在一本名爲《金屬意志》的書中尋得。這本書是一本奇械師的祕卷，由瘋子盧姆的後代盧姆大師（Lum the Maestro）撰寫，當時她正在試圖重組被拆散已久的{@i 琉克歐的非凡機僕}。

entries.name: 危險同調
entries: 兩個生物能同時與機僕進行同調。如果第三個人試圖和機僕同調，則無事發生。
機僕的控制艙室可以通過其背部的一扇艙門進入，當沒有生物與之同調時，這扇艙門很容易開啓。與這件神器同調需要兩個小時，可以作爲長休的一部分進行。
在此期間，你必須進入機僕的內部，調試它的控制設備。當駕駛員進行同調時，任何在機僕外部和其50尺內的生物或建築都有50%可能在同調過程中被其毀滅鐵拳攻擊意外擊中一次。每當有一個生物試圖將自己與之同調時，都會發生這一過程。

entries.name: 控制機僕
entries: 當有任何生物與神器同調時，同調的生物能夠像打開其他們一樣輕鬆地打開艙門。其他生物則需要通過DC 25的{@item 盜賊工具|PHB}檢定才能打開艙門。一道對艙門施展的 {@spell 敲擊術} 法術能夠讓艙門在施法者下個回合開始之前開啓。
一個生物能夠以10尺移動力進出艙門。在機僕內部的生物和物件對源自外部的效應具有全掩護。內部的控制艙能夠讓內部的生物毫無阻擋地看到外面的景象。
當你在機僕內部時，你能通過控制系統控制其行動。在你（每一個與之同調的生物）的回合中，你能以以下方式命令機僕：

items: 打開或關閉艙門（不需要動作，一回合一次）
讓機僕移動最大爲其速度的距離（不需要動作）
以一個動作，你能命令機僕執行其數據版中的動作或之外的其他動作。
當一個生物觸發來自機僕的藉機攻擊時，你能以你的反應動作命令機僕對該生物進行一次毀滅鐵拳攻擊。

entries: 當沒有生物與之同調時，神器只是一件不會活動的物件。

entries.name: 械中幽靈
entries: 在迎來死亡時，強大的軍閥琉克歐的靈魂被吸入這臺神器之中，併成爲能讓它活化的力量。機僕會採取特別是能造成破壞自行攻擊和移動。每24小時一次，由DM決定，無人駕駛的機僕會進行一次這樣的動作。
如果機僕失去其一半或一半以上的生命值，每個與之同調的生物必須成功通過DC 20的感知豁免，否則被 {@condition 魅惑} 長達24小時。當因此被 {@condition 魅惑} 時, 生物會縱情破壞，試圖毀滅一切建築並攻擊一切機僕視野中未與之同調的生物。如果可能的話，它會盡量操作機僕，並從那些威脅到神器的生物開始攻擊。

entries.name: 自毀
entries: 通過拉動一系列的槓桿並按下按鈕，機僕的兩位駕駛員能夠令它自爆。當機僕的駕駛員與之同調時，自毀密碼並不會被透露給他們。如果密碼被找到（由DM決定如何發現），則需要與之同調的駕駛員從機僕內部，在連續三回合耗費他們的動作輸入密碼。但是，如果駕駛員們開始輸入自毀密碼的過程，機僕會使用其械中幽靈特性並令兩位駕駛員相互對立。

如果船員們成功輸入了密碼，第三輪結束時，機僕會自爆。以機僕爲中心半徑100尺球狀區域內每個生物必須進行DC 25敏捷豁免檢定。豁免失敗的情況下，生物會受到87 ({@damage 25d6}) 力場傷害, 87 ({@damage 25d6}) 閃電傷害和 87 ({@damage 25d6}) 雷鳴傷害。 豁免成功的情況下，該生物受到一半的傷害。範圍內的物件和建築受到三倍傷害，機僕體內的生物會立即被殺死，並不會留下任何遺骸。
自毀不會立即破壞機僕。相反， {@dice 2d6} 日後， 它的部分—：左臂，左腿，右臂，右腿，上部軀幹和下部軀幹會在爆炸1000裏內的隨機地點從天空落下。如果這些部分被帶到彼此的5尺內，它們會重新連接並再度組裝成機僕。

entries.name: 破壞機僕
entries: 機僕能夠被兩種方式破壞。在其自毀之後，它散落的碎片能夠在它古代奧爾曼人創造者的一座鍛造神廟中被融化。如果機僕與盧姆的機器相撞，兩件神器都會在規模範圍和傷害是機僕自毀的三倍的爆炸中毀滅。

item.name: 軍用鞍座
entries: 軍用鞍座支撐着騎手，幫助你在戰鬥中活動的坐騎上保持坐姿。它讓你在任何爲了維持騎乘時所做的檢定中獲得優勢。

item.name: Mind Flayer Skull
entries: While you have the skull in your possession, you are {@condition 隱形} to mind flayers, as is anything you are wearing or carrying.

item.name: 心靈之鞭
entries: 當在任何除了{@creature 奪心魔}以外的生物手中時，心靈之鞭的功能就如同一把普通的鞭子。若它在一名奪心魔的手中，則這把魔法武器將如同撕扯下生物血肉一般剝奪它的求生意志，對任何它所命中的目標造成額外的{@dice 2d4}心靈傷害。任何受到來自心靈之鞭的心靈傷害的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則將在智力、感知、魅力豁免中承受劣勢長達1分鐘。該生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

item.name: 攝心魔鏡
entries: 當這個4尺高的鏡子被間接觀察時，它的表面將顯現出生物們模糊的影像。這面鏡子重50磅，且它具有AC 11和10點生命值，且具有對鈍擊傷害的易傷。它將在生命值被歸零時破裂並被摧毀。
若這面鏡子被懸掛在一個垂直表面上且你距離它5尺之內，則你可以使用一個動作以說出它的命令語並啓動它。它將維持被啓動的狀態直到你使用一個動作再次說出其命令語。
任何除了你以外，在這面鏡子處於啓動狀態時在距離鏡子30尺內看見自己鏡面倒影的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的魅力豁免，否則將連同任何它正穿戴或攜帶的事物一起被囚禁在鏡子內十二個異次元牢房之一。若該生物知曉這面鏡子的性質，則進行該豁免檢定時將具有優勢。構裝體將自動通過這個豁免檢定。
一間異次元牢房是一個充斥着厚重濃霧的無限區域，且其能見度被濃霧降低至10尺。被囚禁在鏡中牢房的生物不會衰老，且它們不需要進食、飲水、或睡眠。一個倍囚禁在牢房內的生物可以使用允許其進行位面旅行的魔法從中逃脫。除此之外的狀況，該生物將被限制在牢房內直到被釋放。
若這面鏡子囚禁住一個生物，但其十二個異次元牢房都已經被佔據，則這面鏡子將隨機釋放一個被囚禁的生物以容納新的囚犯。一個被釋放的生物將出現在處於鏡子視線範圍內的一處未被佔據空間，但背對着鏡子。若這面鏡子被打碎，則所有它囚禁的生物將被釋放，並出現在其附近的未被佔據空間中。
當距離鏡子5尺之內時，你可以使用一個動作以說出一個被囚禁在其中的生物的名子、或說出特定的牢房編號。被指名、或者被囚禁於指定編號牢房內的生物將以影像的形式出現在鏡子的表面。接着，你和該生物將可以如常溝通。
以類似的方式，你可以使用一個動作以說出第二個命令語，並釋放一個被囚禁於鏡中的生物。被釋放的生物將連同它的所有物一同出現在鏡子附近的一處未被佔據空間，且背對着鏡子。

item.name: Mirror of the Past
entries: The holder of this platinum hand mirror can learn something about the history of a specific object or creature by taking an action to gaze into the mirror and think of the target. Instead of the holder's reflection, the mirror presents scenes from the target's past. Information conveyed is accurate, but it is random and cryptic, and presented in no particular order. Once it is activated, the mirror gives its information for 1 minute or less, then returns to normal. It can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mizzium Apparatus
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: Innovation is a dangerous pursuit, at least the way the mages of the Izzet League engage in it. As protection against the risk of an experiment going awry, they have developed a device to help channel and control their magic. This apparatus is a collection of leather straps, flexible tubing, glass cylinders, and plates, bracers, and fittings made from a magic-infused metal alloy called mizzium, all assembled into a harness. The item weighs 8 pounds.

While you are wearing the mizzium apparatus, you can use it as an arcane focus. In addition, you can attempt to cast a spell that you do not know or have prepared. The spell you choose must be on your class's spell list and of a level for which you have a spell slot, and you must provide the spell's components.

You expend a spell slot to cast the spell as normal, but before resolving it you must make an Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕}) check. The DC is 10 + twice the level of the spell slot you expend to cast the spell.

On a successful check, you cast the spell as normal, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability modifier. On a failed check, you cast a different spell from the one you intended. Randomly determine the spell you cast by rolling on the table for the level of the spell slot you expended. If the slot is 6th level or higher, roll on the table for 5th-level spells.
If you try to cast a cantrip you don't know, the DC for the Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕}) check is 10, and on a failed check, there is no effect.

entries.caption: 1st-Level Spells
rows: {@spell 燃燒之手}
{@spell chaos bolt|XGE}
{@spell 七彩噴射}
{@spell 妖火術}
{@spell 雲霧術}
{@spell 雷鳴波}

rows: {@spell 朦朧術}
{@spell 造風術}
{@spell 灼熱金屬}
{@spell 馬友夫強酸箭}
{@spell 灼熱射線}
{@spell 粉碎音波}

entries.caption: 3rd-Level Spells
rows: {@spell 恐懼術}
{@spell 假死術}
{@spell 火球術}
{@spell 氣化形體}
{@spell 雪雨暴}
{@spell 臭雲術}

{@spell 艾伐黑觸手}
{@spell 冰風暴}

rows: {@spell 活化物體}
{@spell 死雲術}
{@spell 寒冰錐}
{@spell 焰擊術}

item.name: Mizzium Mortar
entries: This short tube, about 2 feet long and 6 inches in diameter, is made from mizzium, a magically enhanced metal alloy forged by the Izzet League. The end that's pointed toward a target is open, and a glowing ball of molten metal can be seen at the other end as long as the mortar has at least 1 charge remaining.
The mortar has 4 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Molten Spray
entries: You can expend 1 charge as an action to loose a 30-foot cone of molten mizzium. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 5d4} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Mizzium Bombard
entries: You can expend 3 charges as an action to launch a hail of molten projectiles in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 5d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Breastplate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, you have resistance to fire damage. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Half Plate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, you have resistance to fire damage. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Plate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, you have resistance to fire damage. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks.

item.name: Monster Hunter's Pack
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item chest|phb}
a {@item crowbar|phb}
a {@item hammer|phb}
three wooden stakes
a {@item holy symbol|phb}
a {@item holy water (flask)|phb|flask of holy water}
a set of {@item manacles|phb}
a {@item steel mirror|phb}
a {@item oil (flask)|phb|flask of oil}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
3 {@item torch|phb|torches}

item.name: Moodmark Paint
entries: This thick, black paint is stored in a small jar, containing enough paint to apply moodmarks to one creature. The paint is dabbed on the face in spots or markings that often resemble the eyes of insects or spiders. Applying the paint in this way takes 1 minute.

For the next 8 hours, the marks change to reflect your mental state. A creature that can see you and makes a successful DC 10 Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check can discern whether you are happy, sad, angry, disgusted, surprised, or afraid, as well as the main source of that emotion. For example, you might communicate fear caused by a monster you just saw around the corner, grief at the loss of a friend, or happiness derived from pride in your performance in combat. A dark elf has advantage on this check.

item.name: 月刃
item.reqAttune: by an elf or half-elf of neutral good alignment
entries: 在所有精靈所製造的魔法武器中，月刃是最具價值，也最被謹慎守護的。在遠古時期，幾乎每個精靈貴族家庭都擁有這麼一把長劍。幾個世紀以來，其中一些月刃已經從這個世界上消失，它們的魔法也隨着家族血脈的滅絕而消散。還有一些則伴隨其持用者消失在履行崇高使命的過程中。因此，只有寥寥幾把月刃被保存了下來。
月刃由親代傳給子女，代代相傳。這把劍會選擇它的持有者，並與這個人保持終生的聯繫。若持有者死亡，則其另一名繼承人將可以繼承這把劍。若是沒有任何適合的繼承人存在，則這把劍將進入休眠狀態，其功能等同一把普通長劍，直到一個配得上它的靈魂發現它，並要求獲得它的力量。
一把月刃同時只會服侍於一個主人。與它同調的過程需要在一名精靈攝政王的王宮、或在崇拜精靈諸神的神殿中舉行一種特殊的儀式。
月刃不會服侍於任何它認爲懦弱、乖僻、墮落、或不願保護精靈一族的人。若這把劍拒絕了你，則你在接下來的24小時內所進行的屬性檢定、攻擊檢定、和豁免檢定中都具有劣勢。若這把劍接受了你，則你將與之同調，且一個新的符文將出現在它的刀刃上。你將維持與這把武器的同調直到你死亡，或是這把武器被摧毀。
月刃每服侍過一個主人，它的刀刃上就會浮現一個符文（通常會有共計{@dice 1d6+1}個符文）。第一個符文永遠是讓使用這把武器所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+1加值。在這之後的每一個符文都將賦予該月刃一個額外的特性。由DM自行選擇每個特性或從月刃特性表中隨機決定。

entries.caption: 月刃特性
rows: 將它在攻擊檢定和傷害骰上的加值提升1點，最高到+3。若這把月刃已經具有+3加值，則重新擲骰。
這把月刃獲得一個隨機決定的弱效特性（參見《地下城主指南》第143頁的「特殊性質」）。
這把月刃獲得靈巧屬性。
這把月刃獲得投擲屬性（射程20/60尺）。
這把月刃具有如同一把{@item 防禦者}的功能。
這把月刃會在骰出19或20的時候造成重擊。
當你使用這把月刃以一次攻擊命中目標時，該攻擊將造成額外的{@dice 1d6}揮砍傷害。
當你使用這把月刃命中一個特殊類型的生物（像是龍、邪魔、或不死生物）時，目標將額外受到{@dice 1d6}點下列其中一種類型的傷害：強酸、冷凍、火焰、閃電、雷鳴。
你可以使用一個附贈動作以讓這把月刃發出耀眼的閃光。每個距離你30尺內且可以看見你的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 目盲}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。這個特性直到你在與這把武器同調時完成一次短休之前都不能再被使用。
這把月刃具有如同一枚{@item 法術保存戒指}的功能。
只要你尚未喚出精靈陰影，你就可以使用一個動作以喚來一個精靈陰影。這個精靈陰影將出現在距離你120尺內的一處未被佔據空間。它使用{@creature 陰影}的遊戲數據，但其陣營爲絕對中立，免疫於驅散不死的效果，且無法創造新的陰影。這個生物處於你的控制下，由你決定它將如何行動和移動。它將持續存在直到它的生命值歸零，或你以一個動作將它解消。
這把月刃具有如同一把{@item 斬首之劍}的功能。

entries.name: 智能
entries: 月刃是一把中立善良的智能魔法武器，它具有12點智力、10點感知、和12點魅力值。它具有聽覺和120尺範圍的黑暗視覺。
當它想要傳達某個它所感覺到的事物時，這把武器會通過傳遞情緒、並通過持用者的手傳送一陣刺痛般的感覺來進行交流。當持用者處於冥想或睡眠時，它也可以通過夢境或影像以進行更細緻的交流。

entries.name: 個性
entries: 每一把月刃都尋求着精靈族的進步和理想。勇氣、忠誠、美麗、音樂、和生命都是這些追求的一部份。
這把武器與其決心侍奉的家族血脈緊緊聯繫在一起。一旦它與一名和它有共同理想的持有者創建聯繫，它的忠誠就不會動搖。
若說月刃有什麼缺點，那就是它的過度自信。一旦決定了自己的持有者，它就認定只有對方能夠持用自己，即使其持有者並不符合精靈的理想也一樣。

item.name: 月長石
entries: 淡藍色光輝的白色透光寶石。

item.name: Moorbounder
entries: Beasts of burden are common throughout Xhorhas, and often horses and other riding animals are the best or only option. For those who require speed and have a little more coin to spend, the best option is often a moorbounder. However, moorbounders that haven't undergone proper training or established bonds of trust with their masters tend to attack and even eat their riders.
Moorbounders can cost anywhere from 300 to 500 gp each. They're often cheaper and more abundant in towns on the wastes than in cities like Rosohna.

item.name: 苔紋瑪瑙
entries: 帶灰或綠色蘚狀斑紋的粉紅色或黃白色透光寶石。

item.name: Mummy Rot Antidote
entries: White dust swirls constantly within this pale gray potion. When you drink the potion, it cures you of mummy rot.

item.name: Muroosa Balm
entries: This paste made from the muroosa bush is known to help prevent sunburn, but it is also a fire retardant. After spending 1 minute applying a quarter pint of muroosa balm to your skin, you gain resistance against fire damage for 1 hour.
A dose of muroosa balm sufficient for treating sunburn costs 1 gp.

item.name: 神祕鑰匙
entries: 一個問號被刻在這把鑰匙的頭部。這把鑰匙有{@chance 5}的幾率解開任何它所插入的鎖。一旦它解鎖了什麼，這把鑰匙將會隨之消失。

item.name: 自然斗篷
entries: 這件斗篷能隨着你周圍的環境改變顏色和材質。當穿戴着斗篷時，你可以使用其作爲你施展德魯伊和遊俠法術的法器。
當你處於一處有着輕度遮蔽的區域時，你可以用一個附贈動作進行 {@action 躲藏} 即便你能被直接觀察到。

item.name: Navigation Orb
entries: A navigation orb is a hollow, 7-foot-diameter sphere of thin, polished mithral with a large skye (cloud) rune embossed on its outer surface. The orb levitates 10 feet above the ground and is keyed to a particular cloud castle, allowing you to control that castle's altitude and movement while the orb is inside the castle. If the orb is destroyed or removed from its castle, the castle's altitude and location remain fixed until the orb is returned or replaced.
As an action, you can cause one of the following effects to occur if you are touching the orb:

The castle moves at a speed of 1 mph in a straight line, in a direction of your choice, until the castle stops or is made to stop, or until another action is used to change its direction. If this movement brings the castle into contact with the ground, the castle lands gently.
The castle, if it is moving, comes to a gradual stop.
The castle makes a slow, 90-degree turn clockwise or counterclockwise (turning a northerly view into a westerly view, for example). The castle can turn while it is moving in a straight line.
Any creature touching the orb knows the altitude of the base of the castle above the ground or water below it.

item.name: 領航工具
entries: 這一套儀器被用於海上的領航作業。熟練於領航工具讓你能夠繪製航線圖並跟隨航線前進。此外，這些工具也能讓你將你的熟練加值加到任何你在爲了避免於海上迷航時所進行的屬性檢定中。
additionalEntries: 領航工具熟練項可以幫助你根據星象來導航。它還幫助你研究海圖和地圖，同時增強你的方向感。

additionalEntries.name: 組件
entries: 導航的工具包括六分儀、羅盤、卡尺、直尺、羊皮紙、墨水和鵝毛筆。

additionalEntries.name: 生存
entries: 領航工具的知識有助於避免迷路，也能讓你推斷最有可能出現道路和定居點的位置。

additionalEntries.name: 觀測
entries: 通過仔細測量，你可以確定你在航海圖上的位置以及當前的時間。

additionalEntries.caption: 領航工具
rows: 地圖導航
海圖定位

item.name: 適應項鍊
entries: 當穿戴這條項鍊時，你可以在任何環境中正常呼吸,且你在對抗有害氣體或蒸氣（像是{@spell 死雲術}和{@spell 臭雲術}效果、吸入式毒藥、和某些龍的噴吐武器）時所進行的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

item.name: Necklace of electrum medallions with red and blue tournalines (Brazen Coalition)
火球項鍊
entries: 這條項鍊上掛有{@dice 1d6+3}顆珠子。你可以使用一個動作取下其中一顆珠子，並將它投擲到最多60尺遠的地方。當它抵達其投射軌跡的終點時，這顆珠子將會如同3環的{@spell 火球術}法術（豁免DC 15）般爆炸。
你能夠以一個動作同時投出複數顆珠子，或甚至將整串項鍊扔出。當你這麼做時，每一顆額外的珠子都會使該{@spell 火球術}的環階增加1環。

item.name: Necklace of jade and pink pearls (River Heralds)
念珠項鍊
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladin
entries: 這條項鍊上掛有{@dice 1d4+2}顆由海藍寶石、黑珍珠、或黃玉製成的魔法珠子。它同時掛有許多非魔法珠子，由像是琥珀、血石、黃水晶、珊瑚、翡翠、珍珠、或石英等石質材料製成。若一顆魔法珠被從這條項鍊上摘除，則這顆珠子將失去它的魔法。
總共六種魔法珠的存在。DM將選擇或隨機決定這條項鍊上每一顆魔法珠的種類。一條項鍊上可以有着超過一顆相同種類的魔法珠。要使用魔法珠，你必須要先穿戴這條項鍊。每顆魔法珠內都含有一個法術，且你能夠以一個附贈動作從它施放（若需要豁免，則使用你的法術豁免DC）。一旦一顆魔法珠內的法術被施放，則該魔法珠直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

rows: 祝福
{@spell 祝福術}
治癒
{@spell 治療傷勢}(2環) 或 {@spell lesser 次級復原術}
恩賜
{@spell 高等復原術}
打擊
{@spell 烙印斬}
召喚
{@spell 異界盟友}
風行
{@spell 御風而行}

item.name: 串着粉紅小珍珠的項鍊
item.ENG_name: Necklace string of small pink pearls

item.name: 黯蝕吸收刺青
entries: {#itemEntry 吸收刺青|TCE}

item.name: Needle of Mending
entries: This weapon is a magic dagger disguised as a sewing needle. When you hold it and use a bonus action to speak its command word, it transforms into a dagger or back into a needle.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with the dagger. While holding it, you can use an action to cast the {@spell 修復術} cantrip from it.

item.name: Nepenthe
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit a fiend or an undead with it, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d10} radiant damage.

While you hold the drawn sword, it creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around you. You and all creatures friendly to you in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If you have 17 or more levels in the paladin class, the radius of the aura increases to 30 feet.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Nepenthe is a sentient, neutral evil weapon with an Intelligence of 10, a Wisdom of 8, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. It can read and understand Elvish. It can also speak Elvish, but only through the voice of its wielder, with whom the sword can communicate telepathically.

entries.name: Personality
entries: In its lifetime, the sword has beheaded thousands of criminals, not all of whom were guilty of the crimes for which they were convicted. The sword cannot distinguish the guilty from the innocent. With each beheading, it hungers for more justice and blood. The sword is corrupt and irredeemable.

item.name: Nether Scroll of Azumar
entries: Unlike most scrolls, a Nether Scroll of Azumar is not a consumable magic item. It takes 30 days of concentrated study—at least 8 hours per day—to attempt to understand this scroll. After completing this study, you must make a DC 25 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. If this check fails, you take {@damage 16d10} psychic damage, and you can attempt the check again after another 30 days of concentrated study.
When you succeed on the check, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22. Once you gain this benefit, you can't use this scroll to increase your Intelligence again.
You gain advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries: When you gain the scroll's benefits, a {@creature stone golem} magically appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of you and acts as your ally. If you die, the golem turns to dust.

item.name: Nib
entries: Copper coin about the size of a thumbnail (1 nib = 1 common copper coin)

item.name: Night Caller
entries: This whistle is carved from transparent crystal, and it resembles a tiny dragon curled up like a snail. The name Night Caller is etched on the whistle in Dwarvish runes. If a character succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕} or {@skill 歷史}) check, the character recalls lore that says the {@creature duergar} made several such whistles for various groups in an age past.

If you blow the whistle in darkness or under the night sky, it allows you to cast the {@spell 活化死屍} spell. The target can be affected through up to 10 feet of soft earth or similar material, and if it is, it takes 1 minute to claw its way to the surface to serve you. Once the whistle has animated an undead creature, it can't do so again until 7 days have passed.
Once every 24 hours, you can blow the whistle to reassert control over one or two creatures you animated with it.

item.name: Nightfall Pearl
entries: Used to summon night, this 6-inch-diameter, jet-black orb is cold to the touch. You can spend 10 minutes to activate it, causing the area within 10 miles of it at the moment of activation to become night even if it is daytime. This night lasts for 24 hours, until you cancel it as an action, or until your attunement to the pearl ends. Once used, the pearl can't be used again for 24 hours.

item.name: Nimblewright Detector
entries: To activate the nimblewright detector, a character must hold down its trigger. When the activated device comes within 500 feet of a nimblewright other than Nim, the umbrella begins to spin, whir, and click. The spinning, whirring, and clicking accelerates as the distance to the target lessens, reaching maximum velocity and volume when a nimblewright other than Nim is within 30 feet of the device.

item.name: 諾澤爾的驚奇顏料
entries: 這些顏料通常會被發現於{@dice 1d4}個罐子內，並被與一支畫筆一起裝在一個精美的木製盒子內（總重1磅）。這些顏料讓你能夠藉由使用它們在二次元平面上繪畫以創造出三次元的物體。當你專注於你所想物體的形象時，顏料將從筆刷流繪而出，並形成該物體。
每罐顏料都足以覆蓋一個1,000平方尺的表面，並讓你創造出最大10,000立方尺的無生命物體或地形特徵，例如一扇門、一個坑洞、花朵、樹木、隔間、房室、或是武器。繪製100平方尺的東西將會花費10分鐘的時間。
當你完成一次繪畫時，你所描繪的物體或地形特徵將會變爲真實、非魔法的物體。因此繪製在牆上的門將會創造出一扇真正的門，並可以被正常打開並被通過。繪製在地板上的坑洞將會創造出一個真實的坑洞，且其深度將被計入你創造物體的空間總體積中。
藉由這些顏料所創造的事物無法具有超過25金幣的價值。若你繪製一件有着在這支上價值的物體（例如鑽石或金塊），則儘管該物體看起來真實可信，但仔細觀察便會揭露它是由石膏、骨頭、或其他不值錢的材料所製成。
若你繪製出某種形式的能量（像是火焰或閃電），則其能量將會在你完成繪製的那一瞬間出現並立刻消散，且不會對任何事物造成傷害。

item.name: 誓仇弓
entries: 當你將箭搭在這把弓上時，它將以精靈語悄聲低語：「速殲我敵。」當你使用這把武器以進行一次遠程攻擊，你可以作爲命令語誦唸：「速亡負我之人。」直到它死亡、或直到七日後的日出之前，你所攻擊的目標將成爲你的仇敵。你同時只能擁有一個這樣的仇敵。當你的仇敵死亡，你可以在下次日出之後再選擇一個新的仇敵。
當你使用這把武器對你的仇敵進行一次遠程攻擊檢定，你在該檢定中具有優勢。此外，你的目標將無法得益於全掩護以外的掩護，且你不會因爲長射程而承受劣勢。若該攻擊命中，你的仇敵將受到額外的{@dice 3d6}穿刺傷害。
只要你的仇敵仍然活着，你將在使用所有其他武器的攻擊檢定中具有劣勢。

item.name: 黑曜石
entries: 黑色的不透光寶石。

item.name: Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to AC and resistance to poison damage while you wear this armor. In addition, you gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition 被擒} condition on yourself.

item.name: 鑲有金飾和嵌物的黑曜石雕像
item.ENG_name: Obsidian statuette with gold fittings and inlay

item.name: Obviator's Lenses
entries: Also at rank 2, you gain the use of an uncommon magic item taking the form of a pair of spectacles, a spyglass, a monocle, or any other device with one or two lenses. When you look through the obviator's lenses, you use a bonus action to make them function as {@item eyes of minute seeing} or {@item eyes of the eagle}. Once you make this choice, it cannot be changed until the next dawn.

entries.name: Enhanced Lenses
entries: At rank 4, your obviator's lenses gain additional power and become a rare magic item. The lenses now function as both {@item eyes of the eagle} and {@item eyes of minute seeing}.

Additionally, you can focus the power of the lenses to gain accuracy in combat, gaining advantage on a weapon attack roll (no action required). If that attack hits, roll one additional weapon damage die. This property of the lenses can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Occultant Abacus
entries: Head office grants you the use of a unique item known as an occultant abacus (sometimes just referred to as an occultant), whose beads resemble tiny skulls.

entries.name: Read the Kill
entries: Also at rank 1, your occultant abacus not only tracks your franchise's kills, it helps you determine the impact of those kills on the franchise's fate. Over a period of 1 minute, you can study a creature killed by someone in your franchise within the last 24 hours, then grant the character who slew it a {@dice d10}. Once within the next hour, that character can add the {@dice d10} to an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. If it's not clear who administered the killing blow, you grant this benefit to a random creature involved in the fight. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

rows: Using a tiny bellows to pump one last breath into a corpse.
Reading the entrails with special reading-the-entrails glasses.
Burning a small piece of the body and looking for shapes in the smoke.
A cautious, reasoned, professional guesstimate.
Careful measurements. The distance between nostrils. The difference between the index finger and the middle finger. The elasticity of the ear lobe.
You take a long, careful look, and then decide based on which fellow franchisee has been nice to you lately.

entries.name: Eldritch Occultant
entries: Starting at rank 2, your occultant abacus becomes an uncommon magic item that can track lives both eliminated and saved. While holding your occultant abacus within 5 feet of a creature killed within the past 24 hours, you can cast the {@spell 卜筮} spell. The course of action you inquire about with the spell does not need to have any connection to the dead creature. This property of the occultant abacus can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Bring Out Your Dead
entries: Also at rank 2, you regain the use of your Read the Kill feature after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Bead of Instant Karma
entries: At rank 3, one of the beads on your occultant abacus channels the power of instant karma, turning the occultant abacus into a rare magic item. As a reaction, you can target one creature you can see that is about to attempt an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, either granting advantage or imposing disadvantage on the roll. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Bead of Diverted Karma
entries: At rank 4, one of the beads on your occultant abacus allows you to divert karma to where it's needed, turning the occultant abacus into a very rare magic item. While the bead is unused, you know automatically when any creature you can see is about to make an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw with disadvantage. When such a roll is made, you can use a reaction to grant a {@dice d10} to a different creature you can see. That creature can add the {@dice d10} to any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next minute. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Correct the Balance
entries: As a rank 4 occultant, you learn that sometimes the death of a creature has unintended consequences. Within seven days of a creature's death, you can use your occultant abacus to divine ways to reverse or mitigate events resulting from that death. As an action, make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill 宗教}) check. On a success, you learn the relevant information based on the nature of the creature and its place in the world.
If you fail the check, this property of the occultant abacus can't be used again until the next dawn. If you succeed on the check, this property can't be used again until dawn seven days later.

item.name: 燈油(扁瓶裝)
entries: 燈油通常以可以容納1品脫的陶製扁瓶販售。以一個動作，你可以將燈油潑在一個距離你5尺內的生物上、或投擲它最遠20尺，讓它在衝擊中破碎。對一個目標生物或物體進行一次遠程攻擊，將燈油視作臨時武器。若命中，目標被燈油覆蓋。若目標在燈油乾涸之前（約1分鐘）受到任何火焰傷害，則目標將因燃燒的燈油而受到額外的5點火焰傷害。你也可以將扁瓶中的燈油倒在地面，只要該表面爲平面，燈油將可以覆蓋一塊5尺平方的區域。若被點燃，則燈油將燃燒持續2輪，並對任何進入該區域或在該區域結束它回合的生物造成5點火焰傷害。一個生物每回合只會受到此傷害一次。

item.name: 乙太化之油
entries: 這瓶混濁的灰色油珠會在容器外成形並迅速蒸發。這瓶油膏可以塗抹一個體型爲中型或更小的生物以及它所穿戴和攜帶的裝備（體型每比中型大一級，就需要再額外使用一瓶）。塗抹乙太化之油需要花費10分鐘的時間。被影響的生物將獲得{@spell 跨入乙太界}法術的效果，持續1小時。

item.name: 鋒銳之油
entries: 這瓶透明的膠狀油中閃爍着微小、極細的銀色碎片。這瓶油膏可以塗抹一把揮砍或穿刺武器、或最多5發揮砍或穿刺彈藥。塗抹這瓶油膏需要花費1分鐘的時間。持續1小時，被塗抹的物品將變爲魔法物品，且在攻擊檢定和傷害骰中具有+3加值。

item.name: 滑溜之油
entries: 這瓶黏稠的黑色油膏在容器內顯得厚實而沉重，但在傾倒時卻會輕快的流動。這瓶油膏可以塗抹一個體型爲中型或更小的生物以及它所穿戴和攜帶的裝備（體型每比中型大一級，就需要再額外使用一瓶）。塗抹這瓶油膏需要花費10分鐘的時間。被影響的生物將獲得{@spell 行動自如術}法術的效果，持續8小時。
或者，這瓶油膏能夠以一個動作被倒在地上，覆蓋一片10尺平方的區塊，並在該區域內拷貝{@spell 油膩術}法術的效果，持續8小時。

item.name: 腐精油
