entries: {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA} has kept this item in his possession for over a century. The Ring of Winter is a golden band that resizes to fit snugly on the finger of its wearer. A thin layer of frost coats the outside of the ring, which normal heat can't melt. The ring feels ice cold to the touch and initially numbs the hand that wears it, but this cold ceases to be felt by one who is attuned to this ring.

The Ring of Winter is sentient and tries to take control of any creature that wears it (see "Sentient Magic Items" chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). If it succeeds, the ring compels its wearer to cause undue harm to everyone and everything around it, in a cold-hearted attempt to incur the wrath of enemies and bring the wearer's doom.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Ring of Winter is a sentient chaotic evil item with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 17. The ring communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it, and it has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 60 feet. The ring craves destruction, and it likes inflicting indiscriminate harm on others.

entries.name: Nondetection
entries: The Ring of Winter defies attempts to magically locate it. Neither the ring nor its wearer can be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

entries.name: Frozen Time
entries: As long as you wear the ring, you don't age naturally. This effect is similar to suspended animation, in that your age doesn't catch up to you once the ring is removed. The ring doesn't protect its wearer from magical or supernatural aging effects, such as the Horrifying Visage of a {@creature ghost}.

entries.name: Cold Immunity
entries: While attuned to and wearing the ring, you have immunity to cold damage and don't suffer any ill effects from extreme cold (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon's Master Guide).

entries.name: Magic
entries: The Ring of Winter has 12 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can expend the necessary number of charges to activate one of the following properties:

items: You can expend 1 charge as an action and use the ring to lower the temperature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you can see within 300 feet of you. The temperature in that area drops 20 degrees per minute, to a minimum of -30 degrees Fahrenheit. Frost and ice begin to form on surfaces once the temperature drops below 32 degrees. This effect is permanent unless you use the ring to end it as an action, at which point the temperature in the area returns to normal at a rate of 10 degrees per minute.

You can cast one of the following spells from the ring (spell save DC 17) by expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell 畢格比之掌} (2 charges; the hand is made of ice, is immune to cold damage, and deals bludgeoning damage instead of force damage as a clenched fist), {@spell 寒冰錐} (2 charges), flesh to ice (3 charges; as {@spell 石化術} except that the target turns to solid ice with the density and durability of stone), {@spell 冰風暴} (2 charges), {@spell 歐提路克冰凍法球} (3 charges), {@spell 雪雨暴} (1 charge), {@spell 荊棘叢生} (1 charge; the spikes are made of ice), or {@spell 冰牆術} (2 charges).

You can expend the necessary number of charges as an action and use the ring to create either an inanimate ice object (2 charges) or an animated ice creature (4 charges). The ice object can't have any moving parts, must be able to fit inside a 10-foot cube, and has the density and durability of metal or stone (your choice). The ice creature must be modeled after a beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The ice creature has the same statistics as the beast it models, with the following changes: the creature is a construct with vulnerability to fire damage, immunity to cold and poison damage, and immunity to the following conditions: {@condition 魅惑}, {@condition 力竭}, {@condition 恐懼}, {@condition 麻痹}, {@condition 石化}, and {@condition 中毒}. The ice creature obeys only its creator's commands. The ice object or creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of you. It melts into a pool of normal water after 24 hours or when it drops to 0 hit points. In extreme heat, it loses 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points per minute as it melts. Use the guidelines in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide to determine the hit points of an inanimate object if they become necessary.

entries.name: Other Properties
entries: The Ring of Winter is rumored to possess other properties that can be activated only by an evil being whose will the ring can't break. Frost giants have long believed that the ring can be used to freeze entire worlds, while a {@creature djinni} in the service of a Calishite pasha once claimed that the ring could be used to summon and control white dragons, as well as the mighty ice primordial named Cryonax.

entries.name: Destroying the Ring
entries: The ring is nigh indestructible, resisting even the most intense magical heat. If it is placed on the finger of the powerful archfey known as the Summer Queen, the ring melts away and is destroyed forever.

item.name: X光視覺戒指
entries: 當穿戴此戒指時，你可以使用一個動作以說出它的命令語。當你這麼做時，你在1分鐘內將可以看穿並看透固體物質。這個視覺具有30尺半徑。對你而言，在這個半徑範圍內的固態物體將呈現透明，且不會阻礙光線的通過。這個視覺可以穿透1尺厚的石頭、1寸厚的尋常金屬、或最多3尺厚的木頭或泥土給阻擋。更厚的物質以及一層薄薄的鉛都將阻礙這個視覺。
每當你在完成一次長休之前再次使用這枚戒指，你將必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則獲得一級{@condition 力竭}。

item.name: Rings of Shared Suffering
entries: These rings come in linked pairs. If you possess the Mark of Sentinel, you can use a bonus action to form a link to the creature attuned to the other ring; from then on, whenever that creature suffers damage, they only suffer half of that damage and you take the rest. This effect continues until you end it as a bonus action or until you or the other creature removes their ring. This effect isn't limited by range. A creature cannot be attuned to more than one ring of shared suffering.

item.name: 百眼法袍
entries: 這件長袍被飾以許多眼睛一般的圖紋。當你穿着這件長袍時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 這件長袍讓你得以看見所有方向，且你在依賴於視覺的感知（{@skill 察覺}）檢定中具有優勢。
你具有120尺範圍的黑暗視覺。
你可以看見120尺範圍內，{@condition 隱形}的生物和物體，你也可以看見該範圍內位於乙太位面的事物。

entries: 這件長袍上的眼睛無法被閉上或轉移視線。儘管你可以閉上或移開你自己的雙眼，但當你穿着這件長袍時，你永遠不會被視作閉上或移開了眼睛。
施放於該長袍的{@spell 光亮術}法術、或施放於距離該長袍5尺內的{@spell 晝明術}法術，都會使你陷入{@condition 目盲}狀態長達1分鐘。在你的每個回合結束時，你可以進行一次體質豁免（{@spell 光亮術}的話DC 11，{@spell 晝明術}的話則DC 15），豁免成功則解除{@condition 目盲}狀態。

item.name: 虹光法袍
entries: 這件法袍含有3發充能，且它會在每天日出時恢復{@dice 1d3}發已消耗的充能。當你穿着它時，你可以使用一個動作並消耗1發充能以使這件衣物散發出奪目鮮豔的變幻圖紋，持續直到你的下個回合結束。在這段期間，這件長袍將散發出30尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。可以看見你的生物將在對你進行的攻擊檢定中具有劣勢。此外，在這件長袍的能力被啓動期間，任何處於其明亮光照中且可以看見你的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則將被{@condition 震懾}直到該效果結束。

item.name: Robe of Serpents
entries: A robe of serpents is a stylish silk garment that is popular among wealthy nobles and retired assassins. The robe is emblazoned with {@dice 1d4 + 3} stylized serpents, all brightly colored.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can transform one of the robe's serpents into a {@creature giant poisonous snake}. The snake instantly falls from the robe, slithers into an unoccupied space next to you, and acts on your initiative count. The snake can tell friendly creatures from hostile ones and attacks the latter. The snake disappears in a harmless puff of smoke after 1 hour, when it drops to 0 hit points, or when you dismiss it (no action required). Once detached, a snake can't return to the robe. When all of the robe's snakes have detached, the robe becomes a nonmagical garment.

item.name: 星辰法袍
entries: 這件黑色或暗藍色的長袍上繡着許多白色或銀色的星星。當你穿着它時，你在豁免檢定中獲得+1加值。
在這件長袍的前襟附近，有着六顆特別大的星星。當穿着這件長袍時，你可以使用一個動作將其中一個這些星星摘下，並使用它以一個5環法術施放{@spell 魔法飛彈}。在每天日落時，{@dice 1d6}顆被摘逐的星星將會重新出現在這件長袍上。
當你穿戴這件長袍時，你可以使用一個動作以和任何你所穿戴和攜帶的事物一起進入星界位面。你將持續待在該處，直到你使用一個動作返回你原本所在的位面。你將重新出現在你之前佔據的空間，或若該空間已經被佔據，則出現在最近的一處未被佔據空間。

item.name: Robe of Summer
entries: This elegant garment is made from fine cloth in hues of red, orange, and gold. While you wear the robe, you have resistance to cold damage. In addition, you are comfortable as if the temperature were that of a balmy day, so you suffer no ill effects from the weather's temperature extremes.

item.name: 大法師法袍
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 這件優雅的衣物是由白色、灰色、或黑色的精緻布料製成，並飾以銀色的符文。這件長袍的顏色反映着這個物品被創造時所對應的陣營。白色長袍代表善良，灰色代表中立，而黑色代表邪惡。你無法與不符合你陣營的大法師長袍同調。
你在穿着這件長袍時獲得下列好處：

items: 若你未穿戴護甲，則你的基本護甲等級爲15 + 你的敏捷調整值。
你在對抗法術或其他魔法效果所進行的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
你的法術豁免DC和法術攻擊加值各自增加2點。

item.name: 雜貨法袍
entries: 這件長袍上打有各種顏色和形狀的補丁。當穿着這件長袍時，你可以使用一個動作撕下其中一塊補丁，使它變成它所呈現的物體或生物。一旦最後一塊補丁被撕下，這件長袍將變爲一件普通的衣物。
這件長袍有着以下每種補丁各兩個：

items: {@item 匕首|phb}
{@item 牛眼提燈|phb}（裝滿燈油且被點燃）
{@item 鋼面小鏡|phb}
{@item 長杆(10尺)|phb|10尺長杆}
{@item 麻繩(50尺)|phb|麻繩}(50尺, 盤繞狀態)
{@item 麻袋|phb}

entries: 此外，這件長袍有着{@dice 4d4}塊其它補丁，由DM選擇隨機決定這些補丁的種類。

rows: 裝有100金幣的錢袋
價值500金幣的銀製箱櫃（1尺長，6寸寬度和深度）
一扇鐵門（最多10尺寬，10尺高，其中一側有着門閂），你可以將其放置在一處你所能觸及的通路開口；它將改變形狀以適應於該通道，貼合，並將自己拴起
10顆價值各100金幣的寶石
木製長梯(24尺長)
一個附有{@item 鞍囊|phb}的{@creature 騎用馬}
陷坑(一個10尺邊長立方體)。你可以將其放置在距離你10尺內的地面上
4瓶{@item 治療藥水|dmg}
一艘{@item 划艇}(12尺長)
寫有一個1到3環法術的{@item 法術卷軸}
2只{@creature 獒犬|mm}
一扇窗戶(2尺x4尺，最多2尺深)，你可以將其放置在所能觸及的垂直表面上
一個{@item 便攜型攻城錘|phb}

item.name: 吸收權杖
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用你的反應以吸收一個只以你爲目標，且不具備範圍效果的法術時。被吸收的法術效果將被取消，且該法術的能量（而非法術本身）將被保存進這把權杖之中。這股能量有着等同該法術被施放時所用的環階。這把權杖從它製成到毀滅總共只能吸收最多50環階的能量。一旦這把權杖吸收了50環階的能量，它將無法再吸收任何能量。若你被一個這把權杖無法保存的法術作爲目標，則這把權杖將不會對該法術產生任何效果。
當你與這把權杖同調時，你將知曉這把權杖已經吸收了總共多少環階的能量，以及它現在正保存着多少環階的法術能量。
若你是一個正持握這把權杖的施法者，你可以將這把權杖內保存的能量轉變成法術位，以用來施放你已準備或已知的法術。你創造出法術位的環階只能等於或低於你所擁有法術位環階，且最高爲5環。你仍如原本一樣施法，只是改爲消耗這把權杖保存的能量代替你的法術位。舉例來說，你可以用這把權杖保存的3環能量以作爲一個3環的法術位。
這種權杖在被發現時已經存有總共{@dice 1d10}環階的法術能量。當一把權杖無法再吸收法術能量，且沒有任何剩餘能量時，它將變爲非魔法物品。

item.name: 警示權杖
entries: 這把權杖有着附有凸緣的端頂，且具有下列特性。

entries.name: 警示
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你在感知（{@skill 察覺}）檢定和先攻檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 法術
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用一個動作以從它施放下列其中一個法術：{@spell 偵測善惡}、{@spell 偵測魔法}、{@spell 偵測毒素或疾病}或{@spell 識破隱形}。

entries.name: 防護靈光
entries: 以一個動作，你可以將這把權杖的手柄末端插在地上，這把權杖的端頂將散發出60尺半徑的明亮光照和再延伸60尺的微光光照。當處於其明亮光照範圍時，你和任何對你友善的生物將在AC和豁免檢定上獲得+1加值，且可以察覺到任何同樣處於該明亮光照內，{@condition 隱形}的敵意生物所在的位置。
這把權杖的端頂將在10分鐘之後、或當一個生物使用一個動作將權杖從地面拔起時停止發光，並結束這個效果。這個特性直到下次日出前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 王者力量權杖
entries: 這把權杖有着一個附有凸緣的端頂，且它具有如同一把{@item 硬頭錘+3|phb|魔法硬頭錘}的功能，讓使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+3加值。這把權杖具有一系列關聯於沿着其杖柄設置的六個按鈕的特性。它也具備其他三個特性，細節如下。

entries.name: 六個按鈕
entries: 你能夠以一個附贈動作按下這把權杖六個按鈕中的其中一個。一個按鈕的效果將持續直到你按下另一個不同的按鈕，或直到你再次按下同個按鈕，並讓這把權杖恢復其原本的型態。
若你按下按鈕1：這把權杖將隨着烈焰刀刃迸發自權杖凸緣端頂的另一端，而變爲一把{@item 焰舌}（由你選擇這把劍的類型）。
若你按下按鈕2：這把權杖的凸緣端頂將摺疊收起並長出兩片新月形的斧刃，將這把權杖轉變成一把{@item 戰斧+3|dmg|魔法戰斧}，讓使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+3加值。
若你按下按鈕3：這把權杖的凸緣端頂將摺疊收起，從權杖尖端伸出矛尖，並讓權杖的手柄伸長成6尺長的杖柄，將這把權杖轉變成一把{@item 矛+3|dmg|魔法矛}，讓使用它所進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上獲得+3加值。
若你按下按鈕4：這把權杖將變形成一根長度由你指定，但最多50尺長的爬杆。在它如花崗岩般堅硬的表面上，其底端的巖釘和頂端的三個爪鉤可以把爬杆牢牢固定住。爬杆上每隔1尺的距離都會伸出一根3寸長的水平橫槓，構成了一個梯子。這個爬杆可以承受最多4,000磅的重量。超重或是失去固定點將會使這把權杖變回其原本的型態。
若你按下按鈕5：這把權杖將變形成一把手持式戰鬥攻城錘，並附與其使用者在用以破壞門、路障、或其他障礙物時所進行的力量檢定中獲得+10加值。
若你按下按鈕6：這把權杖將變回或維持其原本的型態，並指出地磁北極的方向（若權杖在使用這個功能時所在的位置並沒有地磁北極，則什麼事都不會發生。）。這把權杖同時會使你知曉你自己在地下或地上的大致深度或高度。

entries.name: 汲取生命
entries: 當你使用這把權杖以一次近戰攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以強迫該目標進行一次DC 17的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將受到額外的{@dice 4d6}黯蝕傷害，且你回覆等同於該黯蝕傷害一半的生命值。這個特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

entries.name: 麻痹
entries: 當你使用這把權杖以一次近戰攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以強迫該目標進行一次DC 17的力量豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將陷入{@condition 麻痹}狀態長達1分鐘。目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。這個特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

entries.name: 驚駭
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用一個動作以強迫每個距離你30尺內且你所能看見的生物進行一次DC 17的感知豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將因你而陷入{@condition 恐懼}長達1分鐘。陷入{@condition 恐懼}的目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。這個特性直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 復活權杖
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladin
entries: 這把權杖含有5發充能。當你持握它時，你可以使用一個動作以從它施放下列其中一個法術：{@spell 治癒術}(消耗1發充能)或{@spell 復活術}(消耗5發充能)。
這把權杖會在每天日出時恢復1發已消耗的充能。若這把權杖內的充能被減少到0發，骰一顆{@dice d20}。若結果爲1，則這把權杖將在一陣強光中消失無蹤。

item.name: Rod of Retribution
entries: This adamantine rod is tipped with a glowing crystalline eye. The rod has 3 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn.

When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you damages you while you are holding this rod, you can use your reaction to expend 1 of the rod's charges to force the creature to make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d10} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: 統治權杖
entries: 你可以使用一個動作以展示這把權杖，並命令每個距離你120尺內，你所選擇且你能看見的生物服從於你。每個目標都必須成功通過一次DC 15的感知豁免，否則被你{@condition 魅惑}長達8小時。當被這個方式{@condition 魅惑}時，該生物將把你視爲它所信賴的領導者。若目標被你或你的同伴傷害、或被命令去運行某項違反它天性的行爲、則這個{@condition 魅惑}結束。這把權杖直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: 庇護權杖
entries: 當持握這把權杖時，你可以使用一個動作去啓動它。這把權杖接着將立刻把你和其他最多199個你所能看見的自願生物傳送到一個位於異位面空間的樂園福地。由你決定這個樂園呈現的樣貌，它可以是寧靜的花園、迷人的林間空地、熱鬧的酒館、無垠的宮殿、熱帶海島、幻想嘉年華會、或任何你所能想像到的美景。無論其環境性質如何，這座樂園都含有足夠其訪問者維生所需的水和食物。除此之外，所有樂園內可交互的事物都只能在這個異位面空間中存在。舉例來說，在樂園的花園中摘下的花朵將在被帶出異位面空間時消失。
訪問者在樂園中每度過一小時，就會如同它消耗了1顆生命骰一樣回覆生命值。同時，儘管樂園中的時間會如常流動，但在樂園中的生物並不會因此老化。訪問者們可以待在樂園中的時間等同於200天除以在場生物的數量（向下取整）。
當停留時間用盡，或你使用一個動作結束它時，所有訪問者將重新出現它們在你啓動這把權杖時所佔據的位置，或另一處距離該位置最近的未被佔據空間。這把權杖直到經過10天之前都不能再被使用。

item.name: Rod of the Vonindod
entries: The {@creature fire giant} Duke Zalto hired a wizard to craft several of these adamantine rods. Each measures 4 feet long, weighs 100 pounds, and is sized to fit comfortably in a {@creature fire giant||fire giant's} hand. The rod has two prongs at one end and a molded handle grip on the opposite end.

The rod has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} of its expended charges daily at dawn. As an action, you can grasp it by the handle and expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell 物品定位術} spell from it. When the rod is used to detect objects made of adamantine, such as fragments of the Vonindod construct, its range increases to 10 miles.

item.name: 攀爬繩
entries: 這條60尺長的絲質繩索重3磅，且可以承受最多3,000磅的重量。若你持握繩索的其中一端並使用一個動作說出其命令語，繩索將會活化。以一個附贈動作，你可以命令繩索的另一端向着你所選擇的目的地移動。繩索的另一端將在你第一次命令它的回合移動10尺距離，並在你接下來的每個回合時移動10尺，直到它抵達目的地、伸展至它的最大長度、或直到你命令它停止。你也可以命令這個繩索牢牢綁住一個物體或是將自己鬆綁、自己打結或解結、或將自己盤起以方便你攜帶。
若你命令這個繩索打結，它將以1尺的間距沿着自己打好幾個大結。打完結後，這個繩索的長度將會縮短至50尺，且讓用於攀爬它的檢定獲得優勢。
這個繩索具有AC 20和20點生命值。只要它還具有最少1點生命值，繩索每過5分鐘就可以回覆1點生命值。若繩索的生命值歸零，則它將被摧毀。

item.name: 糾纏繩
entries: 這條繩索長30尺且重3磅。若你持握繩索的其中一端並使用一個動作說出其命令語，則它的另一端將射向並纏繞住一個距離你20尺內且你所能看見的生物。該目標必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則將被{@condition 束縛}。
你可以藉由使用一個附贈動作並說出另一個命令語以釋放該生物。被這條繩索{@condition 束縛}的目標也可以使用一個動作以進行一次DC 15的力量或敏捷檢定（由目標決定）。若檢定成功，則該生物將掙脫這條繩索的{@condition 束縛}。
這個繩索具有AC 20和20點生命值。只要它還具有最少1點生命值，繩索每過5分鐘就可以回覆1點生命值。若繩索的生命值歸零，則它將被摧毀。

item.name: 縫接繩
entries: 你可以將這條50尺長的麻繩切成任意數量個較小的繩段，並接着使用一個動作說出一個命令語，並使這些繩段縫接爲一體。這些繩段必須彼此連接，否則將無法使用。若其中一個繩段被遺失或摧毀，則這條縫接繩將因此永遠比原本短一截。

item.name: Rotor of Return
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Constitution saving throws. You periodically receive flashbacks of old memories, and you can unerringly recall any event that took place within the previous 30 days.

entries.name: Borrow Object
entries: You name a mundane item with a value of 50 gp or less and it appears in your hand or at your feet. This can be any item that appears in chapter 5, "{@book Equipment|PHB|5}," of the Player's Handbook, or any similar item selected with the DM's permission. The summoned item is transported to you from somewhere else in the world, but it is generic in nature, so that you might call for a longsword but you cannot borrow a specific creature's longsword. The item vanishes 10 minutes after it appears. Once you use this feature of the rotor of return, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Recall Code
entries: As an action, you can set your current location as a point of return locked to the rotor. Anytime thereafter, you can use a bonus action to teleport to the rotor's point of return as long as you are within 500 feet of that point. Once you use the rotor of return to teleport, this feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by the DM.

item.name: 划艇
entries: 龍骨船和划艇主要被用於湖泊和河川。若順流而行，將水流的速度（通常爲每小時3裏）加到這個載具的速度中。這些載具無法溯着任何顯著的逆流而行，但可以藉由岸邊的動物被拖到上游。假如冒險者打算將划艇攜帶上陸，則一艘划艇的重量爲100磅。

item.name: 紅寶石
entries: 透紅色到深緋色的透光寶石。

item.name: 戰法師紅石
entries: 蝕刻着怪異符紋，這個1寸直徑的紅寶石讓你得以使用一把簡易或軍用武器作爲你法術的法器。要使這個特性發揮效果，你必須藉由將這顆紅寶石按壓在該武器上長達至少10分鐘，以使它附著於該武器上。在這之後，除非你以一個動作摘下它、或該武器被摧毀，否則這顆紅寶石將不會被從武器上被移除。即使是{@spell 反魔法結界}也無法使其掉落。若你終止與這顆紅寶石的同調，則這顆紅寶石將從該武器上掉落。

item.name: Ruin's Wake
entries: This spear is made from the ivory bone of an ancient gold dragon and carved with an Orc hymn to Gruumsh.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruin's Wake is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 20, a Wisdom of 16, and a Charisma of 22. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Orc.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A slaughter-loving {@creature balor} named Yarrowish lives within Ruin's Wake. The weapon desires only to draw blood and pushes its wielder to solve problems with violence.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The spear grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal and Orc.

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to any target it hits. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with this weapon, it flies back to your hand.

As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can make a melee attack with Ruin's Wake with advantage against the attacker. You can't use this property again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the spear reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra piercing damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 2d8}.

When you hurl the spear and speak a command word, it transforms into a bolt of lightning, forming a line 5 feet wide that extends out from you to a creature you can see within 120 feet of you. Each creature in the line, excluding you, must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Ruin's Wake then returns to your hand. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the spear reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.

While holding the spear, you can let out a battle cry as a bonus action. Each creature you choose within 30 feet of you gains advantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with an attack from the spear, you can regain hit points equal to the damage you dealt with the attack. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Ruinblade
entries: Ruinblade is a unique weapon possessed by {@creature Moghadam|IMR}, the architect of the Tomb of Horrors. A symbol of his authority, Moghadam carries the weapon during the time frame of the adventure to intimidate the tomb's workers. (In later years, after {@creature Acererak|ToA} trapped Moghadam in the completed tomb as an undead archwraith, Moghadam was able to use the weapon as his own phylactery.)

A small jade version of the green devil face of the Tomb of Horrors is fashioned into the hilt of the weapon, with the blade extending from its open mouth. The blade always appears ruined and rusting, and causes its surroundings to appear reflected in the blade as if in a state of decay.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit an undead creature with it, the attack deals an extra {@dice 1d8} force damage.
In addition, the weapon has the following properties:

entries.name: Blighted Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell 枯萎術} spell from the weapon (DC 15). Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until the next dawn.

entries.name: Destructive Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell 解離術} spell from the weapon, but can target only a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force. Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until dawn seven days later.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a remove curse spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon.
The weapon must take direct part in the destruction of 1,000 gp worth of materials and objects every seven days, or a conflict arises between you and the weapon at the end of the seventh day.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruinblade is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 15, a Wisdom of 8, and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon can speak, read, and understand Common, and can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is a rough, ruined echo. While you are attuned to it, Ruinblade also understands every language you know.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Ruinblade speaks either with a dolorous or frenetic tone, depending on its mood. That mood improves when the sword is actively engaged in acts of destruction, but worsens if the blade is left inactive too long.

The weapon's purpose is to ruin and unmake existing objects, so that its owner can rebuild the world from a blank slate. It thus encourages its wielder to engage in constant destruction, claiming that this will allow the creation of a more superior vision from the ruin of what came before.

item.name: Ruinstone
entries: A fiery red crystal the size of a human palm.

Once per day as a bonus action, a villain can activate the ruinstone to undo one deed they have performed. The possibilities here are broad, but in combat it's simplest to allow them the opportunity to "rewind" one action and take it again, or to reroll a failed saving throw (if it can still take actions).

Each use of the artifact has a terrible side effect: someone known to the wielder is also erased from reality. After the villain uses the ruinstone, roll a {@dice d20}: on a 5-20, one of their allies disintegrates, on an 1-4, one of the player characters disintegrates.

If a creature bound its soul to the ruinstone in the "Thalivar's Beacon" quest, the artifact explodes when used and the creature who is bound to it disintegrates, disappearing from reality and can only be brought back with a {@spell 祈願術} spell, or similar magic.

item.name: Ryath Root
entries: Any creature that ingests a ryath root gains {@dice 2d4} temporary hit points. A creature that consumes more than one ryath root in a 24-hour period must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer the {@condition 中毒} condition for 1 hour.

item.name: 麻袋
entries: 一個麻袋可以容納最多1立方尺或30磅重的裝備。

item.name: 騎兵鞍座
entries: 當騎乘於配有這副鞍座的坐騎時，只要你的意識清醒，你就不會在非自願的情況下落馬，且對該坐騎所進行的攻擊檢定將具有劣勢。

item.name: Saint Markovia's Thighbone
entries: Saint Markovia's thighbone has the properties of a {@item mace of disruption}. If it scores one or more hits against a {@creature vampire} or a {@creature vampire spawn} in the course of a single battle, the thighbone crumbles into dust once the battle concludes.

As a youth, Markovia followed her heart and became a priest of the Morninglord soon after her eighteenth birthday. She proved to be a charismatic proselytizer and, before the age of thirty, had gained a reputation for allowing no evil to stand before her.

Markovia had long considered Strahd a mad tyrant, but only after his transformation into a {@creature vampire} did she dare to challenge him. As she rallied her followers and prepared to march on Castle Ravenloft, Strahd sent a group of {@creature vampire spawn} to her abbey. They confronted Markovia and were destroyed to a one.

Suffused with confidence born of a righteous victory, Markovia advanced on Castle Ravenloft. A great battle raged from the catacombs to the parapets. In the end, Markovia never returned to Barovia, and Strahd long afterward walked with a limp and a grimace of pain. It is said that he trapped Markovia in a crypt beneath his castle, and her remains linger there yet.
The essence of Markovia's saintliness passed partly into her bones as the rest of her body decomposed. Her remaining thighbone is imbued with power that inflicts grievous injury on the undead.

{@item Mace of Disruption}. When you hit a fiend or an undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra {@dice 2d6} radiant damage. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature becomes {@condition 恐懼} of you until the end of your next turn.
While you hold this weapon, it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

item.name: 紅縞瑪瑙
entries: 紅白帶狀紋路的不透光寶石。

item.name: 防護聖甲蟲
entries: 若你將這個甲蟲外型的徽章持握在手中長達1輪，它的表面將會浮現出銘文，並揭示出它的魔法性質。當你擁有它時，它將提供二個好處：

items: 你在對抗法術的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
這個聖甲蟲含有12發充能。若你在一次對抗死靈法術或源自於不死生物的傷害性效果的豁免檢定中失敗，你可以使用你的反應以消耗1發充能，並使該失敗的豁免變爲豁免成功。這個聖甲蟲會在它的最後一發充能被消耗時被摧毀並粉碎成塵。

item.name: 學者套裝
entries: 內含：

items: 一個{@item 揹包|phb}
一本{@item 書|phb|學科書}
一瓶{@item 墨水(1盎司小瓶裝)|phb|墨水}
一支{@item 墨水筆|phb}
10張{@item 羊皮紙(一張)|phb|羊皮紙}
一小袋沙
一把小刀

item.name: 急速彎刀
entries: 你在使用這把魔法武器進行的攻擊檢定和傷害骰上具有+2加值。此外，你可以在你的每個回合以一個附贈動作使用它進行一次攻擊。

item.name: Scorpion Armor
entries: This suit of plate armor is fashioned from {@creature giant scorpion} chitin. While wearing this armor, you gain the following benefits:

items: The armor improves your combat readiness, granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren't {@condition 無力}.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on your Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on saving throws made to resist the effects of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

entries.name: Curse
entries: This armor is cursed. Whenever you don or doff it, you must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 100 ({@dice 10d10 + 45}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Only a {@spell 祈願術} spell can remove the armor's curse.

item.name: Scribe's Pen
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Scribing
entries: You can use this pen to write on any surface. You decide whether the writing is visible or {@condition 隱形}, but the writing is always visible to a person with the Mark of Scribing.
Any creature with the Mark of Scribing can use an action to touch the {@condition 隱形} writing, making it visible to all.
If you use the pen to write on a creature that isn't a construct, the writing fades after 7 days.

item.name: 防護異怪卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止異怪類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個異怪將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護野獸卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止野獸類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個野獸將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護天界生物卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止天界生物類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個天界生物將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護元素卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止元素類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個元素將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護精類卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止精類類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個精類將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護邪魔卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止邪魔類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個邪魔將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護植物卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止植物類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個植物將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: 防護不死生物卷軸
entries: 使用一個動作閱讀此卷軸將會展開一道環繞着你的隱形屏障延伸形成一個5尺半徑、10尺高的圓柱體。這道屏障會持續5分鐘，並阻止不死生物類型的生物進入或影響任何在圓柱體內的任何事物。這個圓柱體會以你爲中心隨着你移動。然而，若你這樣移動而導致一個不死生物將進入圓柱體內，則此效果結束。一個生物可以藉由使用一個動作進行一次DC 15的魅力檢定以嘗試克服這個屏障。若檢定成功，則該生物終止這個屏障對它的影響。

item.name: Scroll of Tarrasque Summoning
entries: Using an action to read the scroll causes the {@creature tarrasque} (see the creature's entry in the Monster Manual) to appear in an unoccupied space you can see within 1 mile of you. The tarrasque disappears when it drops to 0 hit points and is hostile toward all creatures other than itself.

item.name: Scroll of the Comet
entries: By using an action to read the scroll, you cause a comet to fall from the sky and crash to the ground at a point you can see up to 1 mile away from you. You must be outdoors when you use the scroll, or nothing happens and the scroll is wasted.

The comet creates a 50-foot-deep, 500-foot-radius crater on impact. Any creature in that radius must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 30d10} force damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one. All structures in the crater are destroyed, as are all nonmagical objects that aren't being worn or held.

item.name: 索敵飛鏢
entries: 這款小飛鏢飾有像風一樣的螺旋紋路，橫跨整個鏢柄。
當你低聲說出「搜索」並投擲這個飛鏢時，它會在距離你120尺內的範圍尋找你所選擇的目標。你必須曾經見過該目標，但你在當下並不需要看到它。若目標不在射程內，或者你與它之間沒有可通行的路徑，飛鏢將會掉落在地，且它的魔法也將消耗殆盡。否則的話，氣元素之力將會立即引導飛鏢穿過空中，直達目標。飛鏢可以穿過1寸寬的開口，並且可以改變飛行方向來繞過轉角。
當飛鏢抵達目標時，目標必須成功通過一次DC 16的敏捷豁免，否則將受到{@dice 1d4}穿刺傷害和{@dice 3d4}閃電傷害。在這之後，飛鏢上的魔法將被消耗，變成一個普通的飛鏢。

item.name: Sekolahian Worshiping Statuette
entries: Skillfully carved from sandstone, this 1-foot-tall statuette depicts a shark twisting through the water with its mouth open. If any Tiny sea-dwelling animal is within 1 inch of the statuette's mouth, the shark flashes to life and deals 1 piercing damage to it. The shark can deal damage in this way no more than once per hour.

item.name: Selesnya Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Selesnya, allows you to cast {@spell 魅惑人類}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Selesnya's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Selesnya Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Selesnya guild
entries: Carved from white and green marble in the shape of a wolf's head, this keyrune transforms into a {@creature dire wolf}. The wolf persists for 8 hours. Its Intelligence is 6, and it understands Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak those languages. While it is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with each other telepathically.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature dire wolf}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 閃避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Sending Stone
entries: Also at rank 1, you are given use of an Acquisitions Incorporated sending stone, an uncommon magic item that resembles a gemstone in a bold setting. It functions like a normal sending stone, except that it has no matching stone and allows communication with Head Office, specific secretarians you know, and the secretarian nearest your location. You must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕}) check to establish contact. Once the stone is successfully used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
Making contact with another secretarian assumes that they are in possession of their own sending stone.

entries.caption: Quirks of Your Sending Stone
rows: It's a flip stone.
It gets great reception everywhere except in your headquarters.
It sometimes picks up other magical conversations.
It's the perfect size, shape, and weight to be used as a skipping stone.
It heats up when you use it, to the extent that it once burned through your gloves.
It has an obnoxious ringtone that you can't work out how to change.
It fails to notify you of incoming messages except for a faint pulsating glow.
It's voice activated, so that every time you talk to someone, it tries to send a message to someone else.

entries.name: Rumor Mill
entries: Also at rank 2, whenever your franchise begins a major quest or mission, make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill 歷史}) check. On a success, you can learn up to three rumors related to creatures or organizations involved in the mission, which come to you through your sending stone. These rumors reflect current or historical knowledge possessed by Acquisitions Incorporated or the organization's many contacts.

entries.name: Improved Rumor Mill
entries: At rank 3, when you use your Rumor Mill feature, the DM provides you with a sense of which parts of a particular rumor are inaccurate, if any. You do not necessarily learn the truth behind those false rumors.

item.name: 傳訊石
entries: 傳訊石兩兩成對，各爲一塊被雕刻成互相匹配的光滑石頭構成，也因此成對的傳訊石相當容易辨識。當你觸碰其中一顆石頭，你可以使用一個動作以從它施放{@spell 短訊術}法術。該法術的目標爲另一顆石頭的攜帶者。若沒有任何生物攜帶另一顆石頭，則你會在你使用這顆石頭的同時知道這個事實，且不會施放該法術。
一旦{@spell 短訊術}被藉由這顆石頭施放，則它們直到下次日出之前都不能再被使用。若這對傳訊石的其中一顆石頭被摧毀，則另一顆將會變爲非魔法物體。

item.name: 哨衛之盾
entries: 當持握這面盾牌時，你在先攻檢定和感知（{@skill 察覺}）檢定中具有優勢。這面盾牌飾有一隻眼睛的符號。

item.name: Serpent Scale Armor
entries: This suit of magic armor is made from shimmering scales. While wearing it, you can apply your full Dexterity modifier (instead of a maximum of +2) when determining your Armor Class. In addition, this armor does not impose disadvantage on your Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

item.name: 蛇毒
entries: 這種毒藥必須從死亡或陷入{@condition 無力}狀態的{@creature 巨毒蛇}身上採集獲取。受害於這種毒藥的生物必須成功通過一次DC 11的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到10 ({@dice 3d6})毒素傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

item.name: Serpent's Fang
entries: This single-edged magic sword is made from the scrimshawed fang of a giant serpent. Its hilt changes shape to adjust to the grasp of any creature that picks it up. The weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d10} poison damage to any target it hits.

item.name: 墮影冥界印記刺青
entries: 該魔法刺青用一根特殊的針製作，繪有深色的抽象圖案。

entries.name: 刺青同調
entries: 同調此物品時，你需要將針持握，並抵在你想要讓刺青出現的那處皮膚上。當同調完成時，針頭會化爲墨水再變成刺青。若你與刺青的同調結束，刺青會消失，針頭會再次出現在你的位置中。

entries.name: 陰影精粹
entries: 你獲得60尺 {@sense 黑暗視覺} , 並且你在敏捷 ({@skill 隱匿}) 檢定上具有優勢。

entries.name: 幽影防禦
entries: 當你受到傷害時，你可以用一個反應變爲非實體形態，將受到的傷害減半。直到下次日落前，這個反應不能再次使用。

item.name: Shadowfell Brand Tattoo
entries: This tattoo is dark in color and abstract. While it's on your skin, you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks.

entries.name: Shadowy Defense
entries: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to become shadowy and insubstantial for a moment, reducing the damage you take by half. Once used, this reaction can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: 墮影冥界碎晶
entries: 這塊黯淡冰冷的水晶摸起來如鉛般沉重，滿溢着墮影冥界的絕望。作爲一個動作，你可以將碎晶附上一件微型物件（如一把武器或一塊珠寶）或摘下。當同調結束時它會掉落下來。當你持握或穿戴碎晶時，你可以將其作爲法器使用。
當你持握或穿戴碎晶，並在一道法術上應用一種超魔法選項時，你可以暫時詛咒一個該法術的目標生物：選擇一項屬性，直到你的下個回合結束前，目標生物在該屬性的屬性檢定和豁免檢定上具有劣勢。

item.name: Shard
entries: Silver coin, slightly smaller than the nib (1 shard = 10 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Shard of the Ise Rune
entries: This shard of ice is long and slender, roughly the size of a dagger. The ise (ice) rune glows within it. The shard has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Frigid Touch
entries: As an action, you can touch a body of water and freeze the water in a 10-foot-radius sphere around the spot you touched. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Frost Friend
entries: You have resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: Icy Mantle
entries: As an action, you can touch yourself or another creature with water on your finger. The water creates an icy mantle of protection. The next time within the next minute that the target takes bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage, that damage is reduced to 0, and the mantle is destroyed. Once you use this property, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Winters Howl
entries: As an action, you can cast {@spell 雪雨暴} (spell save DC 17). You regain this ability after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Frost
entries: You can transfer the shard's magic to a nonmagical item—a cloak or a pair of boots-by tracing the ise rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the shard is destroyed, and the rune appears in blue on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Cloak.
items.entry: The cloak is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, you have resistance to fire damage, and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隱匿}) checks made while in snowy terrain.

items.name: Boots.
items.entry: The pair of boots is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, you ignore difficult terrain while walking, and you can walk on water.

item.name: Shard of the Kalt Rune
entries: This long, slender shard of ice is roughly the size of a dagger. The kalt rune—the rune of ice—glows within the shard. When first grasped, the shard emits a painful cold that leaves your hand and arm numb. That feeling passes after a moment, allowing the shard to be handled normally.

entries.name: Frigid Touch (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the kalt rune on the surface of  any volume of water. The water freezes in a 10-foot radius around the spot where you scribed the rune.

entries.name: Frost Friend (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you have resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: Icy Mantle (Simple Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe the kalt rune using water onto yourself or another creature. The water instantly freezes into a mantle of protective ice that does not hinder movement or action. The next time the creature takes bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage, that damage is reduced to zero and the icy mantle is destroyed.

entries.name: Freezing Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: As an action, you scribe this rune using water onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The rune freezes in place, and the creature must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 12 + the level of the expended spell slot). On a failure, the creature takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage plus {@damage 1d8} cold damage per level of the expended spell slot, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of your next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and its speed is not affected.

entries.name: Ice Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using water onto a melee or ranged weapon, or onto up to 20 pieces of ammunition. The weapon or ammunition gains a ghostly white aura and deals cold damage instead of piercing, slashing, or bludgeoning damage.
In addition, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon or ammunition a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Winter's Howl (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast sleet storm as an action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

item.name: Shatterspike
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. If it hits an object, the hit is automatically a critical hit, and it can deal bludgeoning or slashing damage to the object (your choice). Further, damage from nonmagical sources can't harm the weapon.

item.name: Shatterstick
entries: A shatterstick is a nonmagical, 12-inch-long, 4-pound stake made of blue-tinged infernal iron mined on Cania, the eighth layer of the Nine Hells. When embedded in earth or pounded into solid rock, the stake emits a seismic vibration in a 20-foot radius centered on itself for 1 minute, shaking the ground in that area for the duration. When the effects ends, the shatterstick breaks apart, becoming useless, and all structures within 20 feet of it take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage.

item.name: Shawm
entries: A double-reed instrument similar to an oboe or a bassoon, popular with gnomes, who have developed some bellows-powered versions.

item.name: Shield Guardian Amulet
entries: The amulet is a 4-inch-wide disk composed of silver-framed wood, with a rune carved into its face. A {@spell 偵測魔法} spell reveals a magical aura of enchantment around the amulet.

Every {@creature shield guardian} has an amulet magically linked to it. A shield guardian can have only one corresponding amulet, and if that amulet is destroyed, the shield guardian is {@condition 無力} until a replacement amulet is created.

A shield guardian's amulet is subject to direct attack if it isn't being worn or carried. It has AC 10, 10 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Crafting an amulet requires 1 week and costs 1,000 gp in components.

A shield guardian's solitary focus is to protect the amulet's wearer. The amulet's wearer can command the guardian to attack its enemies or to guard the wielder against attack. If an attack threatens to injure the wearer, the construct can magically absorb the blow into its own body, even at a distance.

A humanoid that attunes to this amulet knows the distance and direction of the shield guardian, provided the amulet and the guardian are on the same plane of existence. As an action, the amulet's attuned wearer can try to reactivate the shield guardian, doing so with a successful DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕}) check. Reactivation can only be attempted while the amulet and guardian are within 10 feet of each other.

item.name: 表情之盾
entries: 這面盾牌正面的形狀就如同一張臉。當持握這面盾牌時，你可以使用一個附贈動作以改變這張臉的表情。

item.name: 遠見之盾
entries: 一個精通於製作魔法物品的{@creature 奪心魔}會藉由從智能類人生物身上摘下一顆眼睛，並以魔法植入一面非魔法盾牌的外層表面來創造出一面遠見之盾。一旦這顆眼睛被植入，這面盾牌便成爲一個魔法物品，且該{@creature 奪心魔}可以將這面盾牌賜予一名奴僕、或將它掛在其巢穴中的牆上。只要這面盾牌與它的創造者處於相同的存在位面，該{@creature 奪心魔}就可以通過這面盾牌上的眼睛視物，且這顆眼精將具有60尺半徑範圍的黑暗視覺。當通過這顆魔法眼睛窺視時，該{@creature 奪心魔}可以使用它的心靈震爆動作，就如同它站在這面盾牌後方一樣。
若一面遠見之盾被摧毀，則創造它的{@creature 奪心魔}將陷入{@condition 目盲}狀態長達{@dice 2d12}小時。

item.name: 飛彈吸引之盾
entries: 當持握這面盾牌時，你具有對遠程武器攻擊所造成傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 詛咒
entries: 這面盾牌受到詛咒。與它同調會使你受到詛咒，並持續直到你被作爲{@spell 移除詛咒}法術或其他類似魔法的目標。移除這面盾牌並不能終止這個詛咒。每當一次瞄準距離你10尺內一個目標的遠程武器攻擊被進行，這個詛咒都會使你代替它成爲該攻擊的目標。

item.name: Shield of the Hidden Lord
entries: The Shield of the Hidden Lord is of celestial origin and serves as a prison for the pit fiend Gargauth, whose mortal followers revere it as a god. Over time, Gargauth's evil has warped the shield's appearance, so that its celestial motif and designs have become twisted into a fiendish face that subtly moves in disturbing ways.
While holding this shield, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Shield of the Hidden Lord is sentient as long as it imprisons Gargauth. While sentient, the shield has the following properties:

items: The shield has an Intelligence of 22, a Wisdom of 18, and a Charisma of 24, as well as hearing and {@sense 真實視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.
The shield can speak, read, and understand Common and Infernal, and it can communicate telepathically with any creature it can sense within 120 feet of it. Its voice is a deep, hollow whisper.

The shield has 3 charges. You can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast {@spell 火球術} or 2 charges to cast {@spell 火牆術} from the shield (save DC 21 for each). The {@spell 火牆術} spell lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required). The shield regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

Anytime during your turn, the shield can choose to radiate an aura of dread for 1 minute. (This is not a power of the shield that you control.) Any creature hostile to you that starts its turn within 20 feet of the shield must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition 恐懼} until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this power of the shield for the next 24 hours. Once the shield uses this power, it can't use it again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Gargauth's Personality
entries: Gargauth desperately seeks freedom but can't escape on its own. The pit fiend won't reveal its true nature, referring to itself only as the Hidden Lord. It drops hints and subtle suggestions that it is an angel trapped in an unholy prison. If released from the shield, the pit fiend honors the terms of whatever bargain it struck to facilitate its escape.

While trapped in the shield, Gargauth carefully steers the shield's current owner toward committing acts of cruelty and domination, hoping to condemn the individual's soul to the Nine Hells. Conflict occurs if the shield's owner does anything that would make it more difficult for Gargauth to escape its prison, such as leaving the shield in a place where others are unlikely to find it.

Gargauth doesn't know how to escape from the shield. The pit fiend believes (incorrectly) that it can break free of the shield if it's brought to the Nine Hells, for it's convinced that the shield's powers are weaker there.

entries.name: Freeing Gargauth
entries: Casting {@spell 反制善惡} on the shield has a 1 percent chance of freeing the pit fiend, or automatically succeeds if the spell is cast by a {@creature solar}, a {@creature planetar}, or an archdevil. A god can release the pit fiend by touching the shield and speaking Gargauth's name. When released, Gargauth appears in a random, unoccupied space as close to the shield as possible.

item.name: Shield of the Uven Rune
entries: This shield is made from the scale of an ancient white dragon. It has a rune burned into its outward-facing side. A character who examines the rune and succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill 歷史}) check recognizes it as an uven ("enemy" in Giant) rune that confers great power.
While holding the shield, you benefit from the following properties.

entries.name: Winter's Friend
entries: You are immune to cold damage.

entries.name: Deadly Rebuke
entries: Immediately after a creature hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to deal {@dice 3d6} necrotic damage to that creature.

entries.name: Bane
entries: You can cast the {@spell 災禍術} spell from the shield (save DC 17). The spell does not require concentration and lasts for 1 minute. Once you cast the spell from the shield, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Vengeance
entries: You can transfer the shield's magic to a nonmagical weapon by tracing the uven rune on the weapon with one finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the shield is destroyed, and the rune is etched or burned into the chosen weapon. This weapon becomes a rare magic item that requires attunement. It has the properties of a +1 weapon. The bonus increases to +3 when the weapon is used against one of the following creature types, chosen by you at the time of the magic weapon's creation: aberrations, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, giants, or undead.

item.name: Shiftweave
entries: When a suit of shiftweave is created, up to five different outfits can be embedded into the cloth. While wearing the clothing, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to transform your outfit into your choice of one of the other designs contained within it. Regardless of its appearance, the outfit can't be anything but clothing. Although it can duplicate the look of other magical clothing, it doesn't gain their magical properties.

item.name: 帶有金色刺繡的絲綢長袍
絲繩(50尺)
entries: 繩索，無論是由大麻或絲綢製成，都具有2點生命值，且可以藉由一次DC 17的力量檢定將它給掙斷。

item.name: Silken Spite
entries: The blade of this rapier is made of spider silk. Its onyx pommel is tipped with a ruby cut in the shape of a spider, and the blade carries the blessing of Lolth.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Silken Spite is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 13, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, Elvish, and Undercommon.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A murderous {@creature yochlol} named Sinnafex lives within Silken Spite. The weapon speaks in whispers, pushing its wielder to trust no one and to kill those who cause the slightest personal offense.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The rapier grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: You can speak, read, and write Abyssal, Elvish, and Undercommon.
You have {@sense 黑暗視覺} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense 黑暗視覺}, being attuned to the rapier increases the range of your {@sense 黑暗視覺} by 60 feet.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

You can use an action to cause poison to coat the rapier's blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature. That creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition 中毒} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition 昏迷} while {@condition 中毒} in this way. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the creature awake.

While carrying the rapier, you can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. Additionally, you can't be caught in webs of any sort and can move through webs as if they were difficult terrain.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: The rapier grants the following benefits in its awakened state:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poison increases to 15.

While holding the rapier, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 15): {@spell 死雲術}, {@spell 黑暗術}, {@spell 浮空術}, or {@spell 蛛網術}. Once a spell has been cast using the rapier, that spell can't be cast from the rapier again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: The rapier grants the following benefits in its exalted state:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poison and spells cast from the weapon increases to 17.
Magical darkness doesn't impede your {@sense 黑暗視覺}.

While holding the weapon in dim light or darkness, you can use a bonus action to teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light or darkness. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: 銀幣(sp)
entries: 一般的貨幣會有數個不同的幣值單位在市面上流通，且其面額會根據鑄造它們所使用的金屬的相對價值來決定。三種最常見的貨幣是金幣(gp)、銀幣(sp)、和銅幣(cp)。
一枚金幣，可以讓一個角色購買一個腰包、50尺的優質繩索、或一頭山羊。一名純熟（但並不傑出）的工匠每天可以賺取一枚金幣。儘管金幣本身並不常被直接使用，但黃金仍然是衡量財富的標準單位。當商人們商談着的交易涉及價值千百金幣的貨物或服務，其交易本身通常不會涉及貨幣的交換。更確切的說，金幣只是衡量價值的標準，而實際交易中使用的則是金條、信用狀、或其他值錢的商品。
一枚金幣值十枚銀幣，銀幣是普通人之間最盛行的貨幣。一枚銀幣可以僱傭一名勞動者工作一整天、購買一扁瓶的燈油、或是在簡陋旅館的一夜休眠。
一枚銀幣值十枚銅幣，銅幣則常見於勞動者和乞丐之間。一枚銅幣能買一根蠟燭、一支火炬、或是一支粉筆。
除此之外，使用其他貴重金屬鑄造的罕見貨幣有時也會出現在寶藏中。珀金幣(ep)和鉑金幣(pp)源自於衰落帝國和失落的王國，且當它們被用於交易時也偶爾會引起猜忌與懷疑。一枚珀金幣價值五枚銀幣，而一枚鉑金幣則價值十枚金幣。
一枚標準貨幣的重量約爲三分之一盎司，所以五十枚貨幣重約一磅。

item.name: 銀白銀和黃金制的胸針
鑲有月長石的銀質酒杯
銀龍鱗甲
entries: 龍鱗甲是以某一種龍族的鱗片所製成的護甲。有時候龍族會收集自己褪下的鱗片並將它們送給類人生物。其他時候，則是由獵人們小心地剝取並保存死去龍族的鱗片。無論如何，龍鱗甲都具有相當高的價值。當穿着這個護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值，你在對抗龍族的駭人威儀和噴吐武器的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你獲得對冷凍傷害的抗性。
此外，你能夠以一個動作專注於你的感官，以用魔法辨別出距離你30裏內最近的銀龍所在的距離和方位。這個特殊動作直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Silver headdress with amber and red-coral feathers (Sun Empire)
附有寶石墜飾的銀製項鍊
item.ENG_name: Silver necklace with a gemstone pendant

item.name: Silver necklace with an amber pendant (Sun Empire)
Silver shoulder piece with amber and garnet (Sun Empire)
Silver Sword
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has psionic ability
entries: You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell 星界投影} spell), you can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

item.name: 劍柄鑲有煤玉的鋼質鍍銀長劍
item.ENG_name: Silver-plated steel longsword with jet set in hilt

item.name: Simic Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Simic, allows you to cast {@spell 腳底抹油}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Simic's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Simic Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Simic guild
entries: This keyrune is assembled from coral, mother-of-pearl, and chrome and adorned with the spirals and curves characteristic of Simic ornamentation. The head resembles the shell of a sea creature. On command, the keyrune turns into a {@creature category 1 krasis|GGR} that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. The transformation lasts for up to 5 hours.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature category 1 krasis|GGR} that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action 閃避} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Sinda berries (10)
entries: These berries are dark brown and bitter. A full-grown sinda berry bush has {@dice 4d6} berries growing on it. A bush plucked of all its berries grows new berries in {@dice 1d4} months. Picked berries lose their freshness and efficacy after 24 hours.

Fresh sinda berries can be eaten raw or crushed and added to a drink to dull the bitterness. A creature that consumes at least ten fresh sinda berries gains advantage on saving throws against disease and poison for the next 24 hours.

item.name: Siren Song Lyre
entries: You can use an action to play this lyre and cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell 化獸爲友}, {@spell 魅惑人類}, {@spell 注目術}, {@spell 暗示術}. If the spell requires a saving throw, the spell save DC is 13.
Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Skyblinder Staff
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic quarterstaff. While holding it, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls.

If a flying creature you can see within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll against you, you can use your reaction to hold the staff aloft and cause it to flare with light. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll, and it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition 目盲} until the start of its next turn.

item.name: Sled Dog
entries: A sled dog (use the {@creature wolf} stat block in appendix A of the Monster Manual) costs 50 gp and can pull 360 pounds.
Sled dogs must take a short rest after pulling a sled for 1 hour; otherwise, they gain one level of {@condition 力竭}.

item.name: Sling Bullets of Althemone
entries: The sling bullets come in a pouch, which contains {@dice 1d4 + 4} bullets. Roll on the Magic Sling Bullets table for each bullet to determine its magical property.

You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with each of these bullets. If a bullet misses its target, the bullet teleports back into the pouch. Once a bullet hits a target, the bullet loses its magic.

entries.caption: Magic Sling Bullets
rows: {@b Banishment.} A creature that takes damage from this bullet must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be banished as though affected by the {@spell 放逐術} spell.

{@b Fulguration.} On a hit, this bullet deals an extra {@damage 2d8} lightning damage to its target. All other creatures within 10 feet of the target must each succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} thunder damage.
{@b Stunning.} On a hit, this bullet deals an extra {@damage 1d10} force damage, and the target is {@condition 震懾} until the end of your next turn.

{@b Tracking.} A creature that takes damage from this bullet is marked with a glowing rune where the bullet hit. The mark lasts 24 hours. While the creature is marked, you always know the direction to it.

item.name: 蛛行拖鞋
entries: 當你穿着這雙便鞋時，你可以在垂直表面上下移動、或甚至在天花板上下顛倒的移動，而無須使用你的雙手。你獲得等同於你步行速度的攀爬速度。然而，這雙拖鞋並不能讓你用這個方式在滑溜的表面上移動，像是覆蓋着冰或油的表面。

item.name: 鑲有紅寶石的小型黃金雕像
item.ENG_name: Small gold statuette set with rubies

item.name: 鑲在彩繪木框中的小鏡子
item.ENG_name: Small mirror set in a painted wooden frame

item.name: 鐵匠工具
additionalEntries: 鐵匠工具允許你加工金屬，加熱它來塑性變形、修復損壞，或者把鋼錠加工成有用的物品。

additionalEntries.name: 組件
entries: 鐵匠工具包括錘子、鉗子、木炭、破布和磨刀石。

additionalEntries.name: 奧祕、歷史
entries: 當你檢查金屬物體，比如武器時，你的專業知識會給你額外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: 調查
entries: 在調查護甲、武器或其他金屬製品時，你可以發現他人可能會忽略的線索並作出推論。

additionalEntries.name: 修復
entries: 當你能夠使用工具並且具備一處足以使金屬熱塑變形的明火時，你每花費1個小時的工作時間，就能爲一件損壞的金屬製品恢復10點生命值。

additionalEntries.caption: 鐵匠工具
rows: 磨刀
修復一套護甲
熔解非魔法金屬物件

item.name: 煙霧榴彈
entries: 以一個動作，一個角色可以將榴彈投擲到最多60尺遠的一點。若使用榴彈發射器，該角色可以將榴彈投射到最多120尺遠的位置。
在煙霧榴彈着地後再經過一輪，它將釋放出一團煙霧並在20尺半徑的範圍內創造出一個被重度遮蔽的區域。有着和風（至少時速10裏）可以在4輪內將它吹散；有着強風（時速20裏或更高）可以在1輪內將它吹散。

item.name: Smokepowder
entries: Smokepowder is a magical explosive chiefly used to propel a bullet out of the barrel of a firearm. It is stored in airtight wooden kegs or tiny, waterproof leather packets. A packet contains enough smokepowder for five shots, and a keg holds enough smokepowder for five hundred shots.

If smokepowder is set on fire, dropped, or otherwise handled roughly, it explodes and deals fire damage to each creature or object within 20 feet of it: {@dice 1d6} for a packet, {@dice 9d6} for a keg. A successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw halves the damage.
Casting {@spell 解除魔法} on smokepowder renders it permanently inert.

item.name: Snowshoes
entries: Snowshoes reduce the likelihood of their wearer getting stuck in the deep snow.

item.name: Songhorn
entries: A recorder, a simple type of flute, usually carved from wood.

item.name: Soothsalts
entries: Soothsalts are derived from a naturally occurring crystalline substance discovered throughout the wilds of the Miskath Strand. The crimson crystals have been mined from cavernous veins like those in the mouth of the Miskath Pit and found within smaller geode formations near sites ravaged by the Calamity. Soothsalts are consumed orally in lozenge-sized doses, and frequent users can be identified by the telltale crimson stain around their mouths. A creature subjected to a dose of soothsalts gains advantage on all Intelligence checks for {@dice 1d4} hours.
For each dose of soothsalts consumed, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of {@condition 力竭}—an effect which is cumulative with multiple doses.

item.name: Soul Bag
entries: When an evil humanoid dies as a result of a {@creature night hag}'s Nightmare Haunting, the hag catches the soul in this black sack made of stitched flesh. A soul bag can hold only one evil soul at a time, and only the night hag who crafted the bag can catch a soul with it. Crafting a soul bag takes 7 days and a humanoid sacrifice (whose flesh is used to make the bag).

item.name: Soul Coin
entries: Soul coins are about 5 inches across and about an inch thick, minted from infernal iron. Each coin weighs one-third of a pound, and is inscribed with Infernal writing and a spell that magically binds a single soul to the coin. Because each soul coin has a unique soul trapped within it, each has a story. A creature might have been imprisoned as a result of defaulting on a deal, while another might be the victim of a night hag's curse.

entries.name: Carrying Soul Coins
entries: To hold a soul coin is to feel the soul bound within it—overcome with rage or fraught with despair.

An evil creature can carry as many soul coins as it wishes (up to its maximum weight allowance). A non-evil creature can carry a number of soul coins equal to or less than its Constitution modifier without penalty. A non-evil creature carrying a number of soul coins greater than its Constitution modifier has disadvantage on its attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

entries.name: Using a Soul Coin
entries: A soul coin has 3 charges. A creature carrying the coin can use its action to expend 1 charge from a soul coin and use it to do one of the following:

items.name: Drain Life.
items.entry: You siphon away some of the soul's essence and gain {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points.

items.name: Query.
items.entry: You telepathically ask the soul a question and receive a brief telepathic response, which you can understand. The soul knows only what it knew in life, but it must answer you truthfully and to the best of its ability. The answer is no more than a sentence or two and might be cryptic.

entries.name: Freeing a Soul
entries: Casting a spell that removes a curse on a soul coin frees the soul trapped within it, as does expending all of the coin's charges. The coin itself rusts from within and is destroyed once the soul is released. A freed soul travels to the realm of the god it served or the outer plane most closely tied to its alignment (DM's choice). The souls of lawful evil creatures released from soul coins typically emerge from the River Styx as {@creature lemure} devils.

A soul can also be freed by destroying the coin that contains it. A soul coin has AC 19, 1 hit point for each charge it has remaining, and immunity to all damage except that which is dealt by a {@item hellfire weapon|bgdia} or an infernal war machine's furnace (see "{@adventure Soul Fuel|bgdia|11|Soul Fuel}").
Freeing a soul from a soul coin is considered a good act, even if the soul belongs to an evil creature.

entries.name: Hellish Currency
entries: Soul coins are a currency of the Nine Hells and are highly valued by devils. The coins are used among the infernal hierarchy to barter for favors, bribe the unwilling, and reward the faithful for services rendered.

Soul coins are created by Mammon and his greater devils on Minauros, the third layer of the Nine Hells, in a vast chamber where the captured souls of evil mortals are bound into the coins. These coins are then distributed throughout the Nine Hells to be used for goods and services, infernal deals, dark bargains, and bribes.

item.name: 至尊膠
entries: 這個乳白色的黏稠物質可以把任意兩個物體永久性的黏在一起。它必須被保存在一個內壁塗抹了{@item 滑溜之油}的扁瓶或罐子中。當被發現時，該容器將裝有{@dice 1d6+1}盎司的至尊膠。
一盎司的至尊膠可以覆蓋1尺平方的表面。至尊膠的凝固需要1分鐘。一旦它凝固，則被它黏接在一起東西只能通過使用{@item 萬溶劑}、{@item 乙太化之油}或{@spell 祈願術}法術才能被分開。

item.name: Speaking Stone
entries: The key to long-distance, virtually instantaneous communication across Khorvaire is House Sivis's network of message stations. Each station contains at least one speaking stone, which is carved from a Siberys dragonshard and inscribed with arcane symbols that uniquely identify it. If you're a gnome with the Mark of Scribing, you can touch the stone and use an action to cast the {@spell 短訊術} spell from it. The target is any other speaking stone whose location or unique sequence of symbols you know. A creature within 5 feet of the stone hears the message as if they were the target.
In a Sivis message station, a gnome is always on duty by the speaking stone, listening for messages that might come in and transcribing them for delivery to their intended recipients.

item.name: Spear of Backbiting
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you throw it, its normal and long ranges both increase by 30 feet, and it deals one extra die of damage on a hit. After you throw it and it hits or misses, it flies back to your hand immediately.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell 移除詛咒} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, keeping it within reach at all times. In addition, you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll using this weapon, the weapon bends or flies to hit you in the back. Make a new attack roll with advantage against your own AC. If the result is a hit, you take damage as if you had attacked yourself with the spear.

item.name: Spell Bottle
entries: This glass bottle can store one spell of up to 5th level at a time. When found, roll a {@dice d6} and subtract 1; the total determines the level of spell in the bottle (the DM chooses the spell, and 0 means the bottle is empty). A swirling blue vapor fills the bottle while it contains a spell.
When the bottle is empty, any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 5th level into it by touching it while casting. The spell has no effect other than to be stored in the bottle.

While holding the bottle, you can cast the spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The bottle becomes empty once the spell is cast.

If you're holding the empty bottle when you see a creature casting a spell within 60 feet of you, you can open the bottle as a reaction in an attempt to interrupt the spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell has no effect, and it is stored in the bottle. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an Intelligence check. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the spell has no effect, and it is stored in the bottle.

item.name: Spell Gem (Amber)
entries: An amber spell gem can contain one spell from any class's spell list. You become aware of the spell when you learn the gem's properties. While holding the gem, you can cast the spell from it as an action if you know the spell or if the spell is on your class's spell list. Doing so doesn't require any components, and doesn't require attunement. The spell then disappears from the gem.
An amber spell gem can store up to 4th level spells. Spells cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 15 and an attack bonus of {@hit 9}.

You can imbue the gem with a spell if you're attuned to it and it's empty. To do so, you cast the spell while holding the gem. The spell is stored in the gem instead of having any effect. Casting the spell must require either 1 action or 1 minute or longer, and the spell's level must be no higher than the gem's maximum. If the spell belongs to the school of abjuration and requires material components that are consumed, you must provide them, but they can be worth half as much as normal.
Once imbued with a spell, the gem can't be imbued again until the next dawn.
Deep gnomes created these magic gemstones and keep the creation process a secret.

item.name: 法術卷軸(1環)
entries: 一張法術卷軸上以神祕暗語記載了一個法術。如果該法術在你的職業法術列表上，則你可以閱讀此卷軸並施放該法術且無需提供任何法術構材。不然的話，你無法理解此卷軸的內容。藉由閱讀卷軸來施放法術的過程需要花費該法術原本的施法時間。一旦該法術被施放，此卷軸上的文本將隨之消散，卷軸本身也將粉碎成塵。若施法過程被中斷，則此卷軸不會因此消失。
若卷軸上的法術在你的職業法術列表上，但其環階高於你目前所能施展的等級，則你必須進行一次使用你施法屬性的屬性檢定以決定你是否施放成功。檢定DC爲11。若檢定失敗，此法術將從卷軸上消失而沒有任何其他效果。
一旦卷軸上的法術被施放，卷軸上的文本將隨之消散，卷軸本身也將粉碎成塵。
由此卷軸施放的法術具有13的豁免DC，以及{@hit 5}的攻擊加值。
一個記載於法術卷軸上的法師法術可以如同其記載於法術書上一樣被抄寫。當一個法術被從卷軸上抄寫時，抄寫者必須成功通過一次DC 11的智力（{@skill 奧祕}）檢定。若檢定成功，則該法術被成功抄寫。無論檢定成功與否，此法術卷軸都將因此毀壞。

一個記載於法術卷軸上的法師法術可以如同其記載於法術書上一樣被抄寫。當一個法術被從卷軸上抄寫時，抄寫者必須成功通過一次DC 16的智力（{@skill 奧祕}）檢定。若檢定成功，則該法術被成功抄寫。無論檢定成功與否，此法術卷軸都將因此毀壞。

item.name: 法術卷軸(7環)
entries: 一張法術卷軸上以神祕暗語記載了一個法術。如果該法術在你的職業法術列表上，則你可以閱讀此卷軸並施放該法術且無需提供任何法術構材。不然的話，你無法理解此卷軸的內容。藉由閱讀卷軸來施放法術的過程需要花費該法術原本的施法時間。一旦該法術被施放，此卷軸上的文本將隨之消散，卷軸本身也將粉碎成塵。若施法過程被中斷，則此卷軸不會因此消失。
若卷軸上的法術在你的職業法術列表上，但其環階高於你目前所能施展的等級，則你必須進行一次使用你施法屬性的屬性檢定以決定你是否施放成功。檢定DC爲17。若檢定失敗，此法術將從卷軸上消失而沒有任何其他效果。

item.name: 法術書
entries: 對法師而言不可或缺，法術書是一本有着100頁空白羊皮紙頁的皮封書冊，適合用於紀錄法術。

item.name: 抗法盾牌
entries: 當持握這面盾牌時，你在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且以你爲目標的法術攻擊將具有劣勢。

item.name: Spellshard
entries: This polished Eberron dragonshard fits in the hand and stores information similar to a book. The shard can hold the equivalent of one book that's no more than 320 pages long. A shard can be created blank or already filled with information. When the shard is created, the creator can set a passphrase that must be spoken to access the information stored within.

While holding the shard, you can use an action to open your mind to the shard, seeing its content in your mind. On subsequent rounds, reading the text or scribing new text on blank "pages" in the shard requires concentration (as if concentrating on a spell) and takes the same amount of time it takes you to read and write normally. Thinking of a particular phrase or topic draws you to the first section in the shard that addresses it.
A wizard can use a spellshard as a spellbook, with the usual cost in gold and time to "scribe" a spell into the shard.

item.name: 蘊法刺青（1環）
entries: 該魔法刺青用一根特殊的針製作，包含着一道 {@filter 1環法術|spells|level=1}, 用魔法針紋在你的身上。爲了使用此刺青，你必須持針抵住你的皮膚，並說出命令語。針會變爲墨水，化爲刺青，在你的皮膚上顯現爲你喜歡的樣子。刺青在你身上時，你可以施展那道法術而不需要材料成分。在你施展這道法術時，刺青會在法術的持續時間內發出微光。法術結束時，刺青會從你的皮膚上消失。
此法術的施法屬性調整值 +3; 豁免DC 13 ；攻擊加值 +5。

item.name: 蘊法刺青(1st Level)
